With You All The Way

story_txt:
With You All The Way  


 



 

 

 

 


 

 

Follow us on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter!

story: N/A

My name is Rémy Moriconi, i was born in France in Nice in 1999 and i am the son of an entrepreneur.

Coming from a family of watchmakers working in a large Swiss watch manufacter, i have been passionate about watches and watchmaking since my childhood.

Being in search of a unique sports watch with very high quality characteristics, i conclued a real observation... A watch combining all its advantages at a very often expensive selling price (even on entry level), which is a real budget that some people can afford.

When i graduated from my graduate watchmaking schools, i had the idea of a great project taking this observation into account... Create a watch brand that addresses this real problem !

"Offer high quality watches at the right price !"

This is why the creation of the 100% French brand Moriconi has seen the light of day.

 

 

The french watchmaking house Moriconi is a human and family business created in July 2019 and which promises to offer you the best watch and to make your wrist attractive at the best quality/price ratio !

It is with only 5.000€ and a lot of work, determination and time sacrified that the Moriconi project is launched.

 

 

Through this project that we really care about, we want :

 

 

The Moriconi specifications allow us to offer you high quality watches in limited quantities and in numbered editions, the settings and quality controls of which are carried out in France.

The problem we were faced with was finding a watch for you with a luxury feel for a really affordable price and we made it ! 

Only for you ! 

 

 

 

The funds raised through the Indiegogo campain will be used to :

 

 

You will have understood... Without you support, our beautiful project is not imaginable ! So let's team up together !

 

 

 

 

Inspired by elegance and sportiness, the MR-01 is the first collection of Moriconi men's watches.

Numbered at only 200 pieces, it comes in 2 different colors : BLACK or BLACK AND PINK

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Each Moriconi watch is designed in France, our sources of inspirations are sporting and elegant trends.

Following our exacting specifications and after many drawing and samples later, we created the MR-01, the first Moriconi watch collection for men.

 

 

All Moriconi watches are unique in their design and are represented to accompany you in all your adventures.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

To meet the requirements of our specifications and at the same time you respond in terms of confort, aesthetics, durability and quality, we have chosen as the main material of the case 316L stainless steel.

 

Why 316L stainless steel ?

The size of the MR-01 case is "45mm in diameter" and "11mm in thickness", size simply perfect for a man's wrist !

The black colors of the case is achieved through PVD treatment (physical vapor desposition) with a polished/brushed finish.

 

TECHNICAL SHEET OF THE MR-01 BLACK CASE :

 

 

The black dial of the MR-01 BLACK surprise with details and its satin sun finish !

The owten part as the countess of the chronographs welcome a white graduation, which brings a real touch of sportiness to the dial !

The date window is visible and positioned at 4 o'clock !

 

 

TECHNICAL SHEET OF THE MR-01 BLACK DIAL :

 

 

The needles of the MR-01 are so called "dauphine" needles, we have brought our sporty design, in particular to the hour needle which we have converted into a "skeleton dauphine needle".

The needles and indexes of the MR-01 benefit from meticulous work in particular with regard to the polished finish which brings shine and luster to the watch.

 

 

The needles and indexes of the MR-01 are to display super luminova, which allows you to read the time in absolute darkness, while keeping the Moriconi design elegant and sporty.

 

 

The chronograph seconds counter needle and the hour counter needle (position at 6 o'clock) are both painted in red, which really brings a reminder of sportiness to the watch.

 

 

Each Moriconi needles and index are carefully assembled needle respecting watchmaking traditions !

 

TECHNICAL SHEET OF NEEDLES AND INDEX MR-01 BLACK :

 

 

 

We are really committed to providding you with quality at a truly affordable price ! This is the reason why we have the choice of assembling the MR-01 collection of a Swiss quartz chronograph movement Ronda 5030.D date at 4 o'clock.

 

Why the Swiss Ronda 5030.D movement ?

 

Indeed, we made a strong choice by wanting to assemble the MR-01 with a Swiss quartz movement Ronda. We made this choice because the 5030.D has already proven its quality because it is already widely used by many watch brands such as for example (Victorinox, Edox, TW Steel...)

But we obviously chose because it brings together many advantages for daily use, it is recognized for its high quality over time, its reliability and its excellent precision.

 

Fonction of the Swiss movement Ronda 5030.D :

 

The Swiss quartz movment Ronda 5030.D is a sure quality value for your wrist and your everyday life !

 

TECHNICAL SHEET OF THE SWISS MOVEMENT RONDA 5030.D :

 

 

 

The back of the MR-01 is a screwed back in 316L stainless steel, polished finish.

 

Why a screwed back ?

 

We decided to assemble a screwed caseback on the MR-01 collection because the screwed caseback have several advantageous characteristics because it improves and reinforces the waterproofness to the maximum and protected the inside of the watch from dust and moisture.

 

 

As the MR-01 is a unique piece, we decided to number only the first 100 pieces !

The numbering of your watch will be visible on the bottom of your watch !

 

TECHNICAL SHEET OF THE MR-01 BLACK BOTTOM :

 

 

Moriconi bracelets are unique and can only be adapted to the MR-01 collection !

The MR-01 collection has an ultra-resistant genuine rubber strap, the strap attachment system is the 316L stainless steel pin buckle, BLACK PVD finish.

 

 

What does the MR-01 BLACK rubber bracelet contribute include (249€) ?

 

 

TECHNICAL SHEET OF THE RUBBER STRAP MR-01 BLACK :

 

We decided to make the genuine rubber strap for this unique piece, because this strap is really versatile !

It goes in the water and dries very quickly, does not cause any alteration, ages very well, goes with any type of clothing and of course they are very confortable.

These are really all its advantages for you daily life that have led us to manufacture this type of strap for the comfort of your wrist !

 

 

The sapphire glass will be assembled on each of the Moriconi watches because it has many advantages for the use of a watch on a daily basics !

It is very resistant to scratches and extreme durability, which gives it a low rate of scratches a breaks.

 

 

In terms of classification of mineral hardness, the sapphire glass is in second position, only the diamond comes in front of it... !

Sapphire glass is much more expensive to produce than other types of watch glasses, but at Moriconi quality for our customers commes first !

 

TECHNICAL SHEET OF SAPPHIRE GLASS MR-01 BLACK :

 

 

Thanks to our demanding specifications, we are really happy to be able to offer you a perfect water resistant of 10 ATM, about 100 meters.

Whether it is splashing, immersion or even aquatic sports, your watch will withstand it in complete safety !

 

 

TECHNICAL SHEET OF THE WATERPROOFING OF THE MR-01 BLACK :

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We have already started manufacturing the dials (finished) and cases.

The manufacture of all the bracelets as well as the needles is finished !

The 4 crucial manufacturing steps are now complete !

The silkscreen printing of all cases are finished.

The assembly of all MR-01 is now finished !!!!

Now it's time to deliver orders from our contributors via Indiegogo and our website www.mrmoriconi.com

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

To meet the requirement of our specifications and at the same time you respond in terms of confort, aesthetics, durability and quality, we have chosen as the main material of the case 316L stainless steel.

 

Why 316L stainless steel?

 

Because it has many advantages, it is very resistant to corrosion, does not cause any allergies and offers an exceptional final result.

This type of alloy may not speak to you, but it is the most widely used steel in luxury watchmaking !

The size of the MR-01 case is "45mm in diameter" and "11mm in thickness", size simply perfect for a man's wrist !

The black and pink colors of the case is achieved through PVD treatment (physical vapor desposition) with a polished/brushed finish.

 

 

TECHNICAL SHEET OF THE MR-01 BLACK AND PINK CASE :

 

 

The White dial of the MR-01 BLACK AND PINK surprise with details and its satin sun finish !

The owten part as the counters of the chronographs welcome a white graduation, which brings a real touch of sportiness to the dial !

The date window is visible and positioned at 4 o'clock.

 

 

TECHNICAL SHEET OF THE MR-01 BLACK AND PINK DIAL :

 

 

The needles of the MR-01 are so called "dauphine" needles, we have brought our sporty design, in particular to the hour needle which we have converted into a "skeleton dauphine needle".

The needles and indexes of the MR-01 benefit from meticulous work, in particular with regard to the polished finish which brings shine and luster to the watch.

 

 

The needles and indexes of the MR-01 are to display super luminova, which allows you to read the time in absolute darkness, while keeping the Moriconi design elegant and sporty.

 

 

The chronograph seconds counter needle and the hour counter needle (position at 6 o'clock) are both painted in red, which really brings a reminder of sportiness to the watch.

 

 

Each Moriconi needles and index are carefully assembled needle respecting watchmaking traditions !

 

TECHNICAL SHEET OF NEEDLES AND INDEX MR-01 BLACK :

 

 

 

We are really committed to providding you with quality at a truly affordable price ! This is the reason why we have the choice of assembling the MR-01 collection of a Swiss quartz chronograph movement Ronda 5030.D date at 4 o'clock.

 

Why the Swiss Ronda 5030.D movement ?

 

Indeed, we made a strong choice by wanting to assemble the MR-01 with a Swiss quartz movement Ronda. We made this choice because the 5030.D has already proven its quality because it is already widely used by many watch brands such as for example (Victorinox, Edox, TW Steel...).

But we obviously chose because it brings together many advantages for daily use, it is recognized for its high quality over time, its reliability and its excellent precision.

 

Fonction of the Swiss movement Ronda 5030.D :

 

 

The Swiss quartz movement Ronda 5030.D is a sure quality value for your wrist and your everyday life !

 

TECHNICAL SHEET OF THE SWISS MOVEMENT RONDA 5030.D :

 

 

 

The back of the MR-01 is a screwed back in 316L stainless steel, polished finish.

 

Why a screwed back ?

 

We decided to assemble a screwed caseback on the MR-01 collection bacause the screwed caseback have several advantageous characteristics because it improves and reinforces the waterproofness to the maximum and protected the inside of the watch from dust and moisture.

 

 

As the MR-01 is a unique piece, we decided to number only the first 100 pieces !

The numbering of your watch will be visible on the bottom of your watch !

 

TECHNICAL SHEET OF THE MR-01 BLACK AND PINK BOTTOM :

 

 

Moriconi bracelet are unique and can only be adapted to the MR-01 collection !

The MR-01 collection has an ultra-resistant genuine rubber strap, the strap attachment system is the 316L stainless steel pin buckle, PINK PVD finish.

 

 

What does the MR-01 BLACK AND PINK Rubber bracelet contribute include (249€) ?

 

 

TECHNICAL SHEET OF THE RUBBER STRAP MR-01 BLACK AND PINK :

 

We decided to make the genuine rubber strap for this unique piece, because this strap is really versatile !

It goes in the water and dries very quickly, does not cause any alteration, age very well, goes with any type of clothing and of course they are very comfortable.

These are really all its advantages for your daily life that have led us to manufacture this type of strap for the comfort of your wrist !

 

 

The sapphire glass will be assembled on each of the Moriconi watches because it has many advantages for the use of a watch on a daily basics !

It is very resistant to scratches and extreme durability, which gives it a low rate of scratches or breaks.

 

 

In terms of classification of mineral hardness, the sapphire glass is in second position, only the diamond comes in front of it... !

Sapphire glass is much more expensive to produce than other types of watch glasses, but at Moriconi quality for our customers comes first !

 

TECHNICAL SHEET OF SAPPHIRE GLASS MR-01 BLACK AND PINK :

 

 

Thanks to our demanding specifications, we are really happy to be able to offer you a perfect water resistant of 10 ATM, about 100 meters.

Whether it is splashing, immersion or even aquatic sports, your watch will withstand it in complete safety !

 

 

TECHNICAL SHEET OF THE WATERPROOFING OF THE MR-01 BLACK AND PINK :

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We have already started manufacturing the dials (finished) and cases.

The manufacture of all the bracelets as well as the needles is finished !

The 4 crucial manufacturing steps are now complete !

The silkscreen printing of all cases are finished.

The assembly of all MR-01 is now finished !!!!

Now it's time to deliver orders from our contributors via Indiegogo and our website www.mrmoriconi.com

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Moriconi international warranty is 5 YEARS on all Moriconi watches, but only for the launches of numbered models we offer you the LIFETIME WARRANTY !

At Moriconi, we are proud to respect our demanding specifications in order to offer you watches made to last !

We are able to offer you such a guarantee because we are certain of the quality of our watches since we systematically use components which are as reliable as possible for you daily life.

 

 

 

You are probably wondering how you will receive your watch !

Well, your MR-01 watch will be delivered in a leatherette box on the outside and white velor on the inside.

The capacity of this box with include x1 watch of your choice, accompanied by your certificate of authenticity.

 

 

The added bonus of Moriconi packaging is that all of our cases are screen-printed in France, in Vence by people with different disabilities.

The main mission of our employee the E.S.A.T (establishment and service of assistance throught work) is to promote the social and professional integration of people with different disabilities, whether mental or physical.

 

 

We are really proud and happy to have the opportunity to collaborate with this medico-social establishment !

 

 

 

 

Worldwide delivery is usually 35€, but exceptionally for the Indiegogo campaingn we offer worldwide delivery !

A Moriconi X Indiegogo exclusive ! 

 

 

Your Moriconi watch and/or accessories will be sent to you from our head office in France by a private carrier. We will start shipping your watch in December 2020.

We will contact you directly by email to tell you the tracking number of your package. For security reasons, your watch will only be returned to you against your signature.

Please note : If you live outside the European Union, you are responsible for taxes and customs duties that may be apllicable in your country.

All Moriconi watches have a 20 day returns policy ! More details here.

 

 

For each MR-01 sold, the French watchmaking house Moriconi understakes to pay 1€ for an association that supports and helps families of sick or orphaned children.

 

 

The association in question is " LA TEAM J'ADORE CT'AMBIANCE !!!! ".

This French association organizes various gatherings whether it be car baptisms, lottery or concerts in order to raise funds and then donate it to families of sick, paralyzed, disabled or orphaned children.

 

 

The funds collected during the Indiegogo campaign will mainly be used to finance the necessary operations or equipment which is often very expensive that the families of sick children or orphans unfortunately cannot finance.

It's a simple and exciting way for us to support a great cause together ! 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Unfortunately the risk 0 does not exist... Nevertheless, we are more than convinced that our collaborators and us, will respect the announced timetable.

We have a more than solid plan, all will be implemented to meet this goal ! We have already made several functional samples.

We will send you updates during the campain to let you know the development proceess of your watch.

We will make a huge effort for our contributors and our community ! So, whatever obstacles in our path, we will keep moving forward and provide you with the best service possible !

The entire Moriconi team thanks you for believing is us !

 

 

Our challenges through this campain is of course to finance the MR-01 collection with your support but not only, we see in the long term !

Our challenge is simple and full of ambition. We want to revitalize French watchmaking by offering our customers and putting on the watch market high quality watches in limited quantities and in numbered editions at prices really accessible to all ! And that with real after-sales service !

Only, these challenges will not be achieved without you ! This is why the entire Moriconi team would like to thank you wholeheartedly for your support and for your contribution !

To reach as many people as possible and bring this project to fruition we are asking friends, families and various blog to help us spread the word and share our campain and our project without moderation !

This project is together that we will succeed !

 

 

 

 

Want to see more photos ? Or do you have questions ? Or do you just need more information ?

No problem ! We are proud to be available for you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week !

So don't hesitate !

opportunity to collaborate with this medico-social establishment !    Worldwide delivery is usually 35€, but exceptionally for the Indiegogo campaingn we offer worldwide delivery !A Moriconi X Indiegogo exclusive !   Your Moriconi watch and/or accessories will be sent to you from our head office in France by a private carrier. We will start shipping your watch in December 2020.We will contact you directly by email to tell you the tracking number of your package. For security reasons, your watch will only be returned to you against your signature.Please note : If you live outside the European Union, you are responsible for taxes and customs duties that may be apllicable in your country.All Moriconi watches have a 20 day returns policy ! More details here.  For each MR-01 sold, the French watchmaking house Moriconi understakes to pay 1€ for an association that supports and helps families of sick or orphaned children.  The association in question is " LA TEAM J'ADORE CT'AMBIANCE !!!! ".This French association organizes various gatherings whether it be car baptisms, lottery or concerts in order to raise funds and then donate it to families of sick, paralyzed, disabled or orphaned children.  The funds collected during the Indiegogo campaign will mainly be used to finance the necessary operations or equipment which is often very expensive that the families of sick children or orphans unfortunately cannot finance.It's a simple and exciting way for us to support a great cause together !              Unfortunately the risk 0 does not exist... Nevertheless, we are more than convinced that our collaborators and us, will respect the announced timetable.We have a more than solid plan, all will be implemented to meet this goal ! We have already made several functional samples.We will send you updates during the campain to let you know the development proceess of your watch.We will make a huge effort for our contributors and our community ! So, whatever obstacles in our path, we will keep moving forward and provide you with the best service possible !The entire Moriconi team thanks you for believing is us !  Our challenges through this campain is of course to finance the MR-01 collection with your support but not only, we see in the long term !Our challenge is simple and full of ambition. We want to revitalize French watchmaking by offering our customers and putting on the watch market high quality watches in limited quantities and in numbered editions at prices really accessible to all ! And that with real after-sales service !Only, these challenges will not be achieved without you ! This is why the entire Moriconi team would like to thank you wholeheartedly for your support and for your contribution !To reach as many people as possible and bring this project to fruition we are asking friends, families and various blog to help us spread the word and share our campain and our project without moderation !This project is together that we will succeed !    Want to see more photos ? Or do you have questions ? Or do you just need more information ?No problem ! We are proud to be available for you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week !So don't hesitate !

story:
We got started in the sustainable fashion game with our Hemp Eyewear 7 years ago. During this time we have developed a deep understanding of the properties of hemp, and now we are delighted to introduce to you our brand new range of hemp watches. 

 

You can specify your own watch dial, highlight colour and strap colour to make your watch truly individual. 

 

 

Choose 'UNIQUE BIRD' reward in order to add a custom engraving of up to 15 characters to the back-plate. 

 

 

The world is moving towards a more positive relationship with hemp. This is largely due to the popularity of CBD oil in the health industry and the increasing decriminalisation of cannabis across North America. We have been contributing to this perception change for the last 7 years with our Hemp Eyewear, and now we introduce our new line of watches, Hemp MVMNT.

With our Hemp MVMNT watches we aim to showcase yet another possibility of the super crop that is hemp, and to promote the use of alternative eco-materials in general.

The coming decades will require us all to think and live more sustainably. Be a part of the movement and join us on this journey. 




 

 

Renewable technology is at the core of what we do. Our leading-edge hemp fibre material uses organic plant fibres to create a solid non-plastic material. By combining our material with 100% vegan pineapple leather straps our watches help keep the planet green.

 

We value creativity, innovation and self expression. We strive to maintain our ingenuity by pioneering new technologies and focusing on innovation at our core. Why be the same as everyone else when you can stand out from the crowd?

 

We’ve partnered with the incredible organisation, 1% For The Planet, in order to give 1% of every watch sale to approved environmental nonprofits. Our whole business is based on hemp, so it is only right that we do our part to preserve the natural environment that provides us with this resource.

 

Hemp MVMNT is elegant. It’s a statement for change, for a future where unexpected materials are found in unexpected places. 

The hemp’s beauty comes from it’s randomness. Magnified by the contrast between the bright, clean stainless steel components, the result is a classy timepiece with a natural twist.

The inherent structure of the randomly aligned hemp fibres means every Hemp MVMNT watch is identical while also being as unique as the person who wears it.


 

‘Original’ is clean and simple. This pared back design takes away the frills and presents a clean, modern, stylish watch. The minute markers are not visible, because life isn’t about counting the minutes. Coming in at 8mm thick - or should we say thin? - with a chamfered bottom edge, ‘original’ is slim, sustainable and unassuming. Available with a charcoal or not-quite-white dial, with either gold-plated or stainless steel highlight colours. There is plenty of room for you to find the watch that feels the most you.

 

The ‘Four Twenty Special’ features a subtle, embossed 420 on the face, letting you know when it’s time to work and when it’s time to play. This watch is a call for conversation and a call to let loose. A symbolic reminder of the work and play balance that is so often swept aside in a hectic lifestyle. ‘Four Twenty’ represents changing times, presenting canna-culture in a stylish, subtle way. The watch is available in silver or gold highlight colours, both featuring the greenest of seconds hands and a reminder for that oh-so-important time of the day.

 

 

The outer casing of the watch is the star of the show. Made using our hemp material, the unique patterns mean no two watches are the same. Well they are, but only where it matters. Each case is manufactured on a high-precision CNC, to be sure that the beautiful randomness is only present in the fibres. 


 

We’ve partnered with ANANAS ANAM, producers of Piñatex®, to create a range of beautiful pineapple leather watch straps.

This is a 100% vegan and organic alternative to traditional animal leather, which can be unethically sourced and environmentally damaging. Instead these watch straps are made from the fibre of pineapple leaves that pile up as a direct result of agricultural waste.

Choose from a selection of 6 coloured straps to personalise your Hemp MVMNT watch to you.

Depending on the reward tier you select you will be receiving 1 or 2 straps. You will also be able to add-on additional straps after the campaign ends, when you are making your colour selections. 

 

We believe in the philosophy of 'repair not replace'. Old, battery-powered watch sitting at the back of a draw no longer working familiar to anyone? 

Along with instructions provided in the packaging, our easily removable back-plate will allow you to quickly and easily change the battery at home.

As with all watches you can of course take it to a watch repair shop to carry out the battery change instead. We're trying to empower you, not scare you! 

 

All straps come with a quick release feature, so if you want to purchase additional straps they can be changed in seconds, keeping your watch dynamic and exciting.

 

We are offering three styles with the same unisex watch body. All watches are 37mm in diameter, with a 16mm wide strap. Smallest wrist size is 14cm and largest wrist size is 20cm. After thorough testing, we found these dimensions to be the ideal unisex size, suiting most wearers.

 

 

Organic hemp fibre before processing.

Early stages of prototyping, designing the watch and developing the process on the CNC machine.

Hand finishing the prototypes with a rotary tool.

We went through hundreds of iterations before deciding on our three dial designs.

Engraving the back-plate of the watch.

Testing different pineapple leather colours to make our collection of straps.

Fitting the hands to the prototypes.

Assembling the watches and comparing our final prototype to our early development (top right).

 

We create the hemp watch cases in our Edinburgh workshop using unique technology developed through years of making glasses with hemp. 

The cases will be mated with the Miyota 5Y30 quartz movements and other internal components by our assembly partners in Hong Kong, who use their expertise in watch assembly to ensure high quality.

We complete the assembly back in Edinburgh by fitting the pineapple leather straps, and carry out quality assurance checks before packing the watches.

 

We care about our customers and we care about the planet.

As manufacturers and designers, it's our responsibility to control the lifecycle of our products. That's why we offer our hempcare repair policy. 

Each purchase of a watch comes with a 2 year warranty, during which we will repair or replace your watch due to manufacturing, material or operational defects. 

After the warranty you will still be covered by our lifetime guarantee, which means we will endeavour to repair or replace your watches so they can be worn for as long as possible.

If you are contacting us after your warranty a small contribution may be requested from Hemp MVMNT depending on the watch condition and if caused by human breakage.

 




 

 

 


 

Whether you are purchasing a single or multiple Hemp MVMNT watches, the process is simple...

Click here or scroll back to the top of this page and select your reward.

 

Here is a quick reminder of the options:
 

 

Thanks for supporting our project and backing the world’s first hemp watch project!
 


*Please note: your card will not be charged payment until the end of the campaign*

story:
A project for the past year that we've been working together with jewelry experts developing multiple prototypes and perfecting our designs and it's doing so in an unforgettable way. Aerotec is pleased to announce the new Sea Hunt line of premium watches made for the sports enthusiast and anyone with an eye for high quality tool watch.  

The Sea Hunt Line is designed to withstand depths of 500 meters and to maintain functionality and style in conditions that would be ruinous to lesser models. Featuring an Italian aged leather strap, a 316L stainless-steel case and Super-Luminova hands and indexes, the Sea Hunt is a distinctive design that is both attention-getting and useful for anyone seeking outdoor adventure.    

The Sea Hunt will be offered in 3 dials, you can choose from three different dial colors, blue or burgundy brushed or black Meteorite dial.

Each dial has its own unique advantages. 

Crystal

The Sea Hunt is equipped with a 3.3mm thick double domed sapphire glass. The double domed feature gives the watch a nice vintage look while still showing the dial from many angles. The crystal will have a double layer of Anti Reflective (AR) coating on the inside of the crystal to reduce reflections.  

Ceramic Bezel 

The bezel plays an important role in our design, the bezel itself is made of stainless steel with ceramic insert and filled with C3 lume at the 12 o'clock marking and has a 120 clicks unidirectional mechanism.

Improvement made for production.

There will be a small improvements made from the BEZEL to the production pieces that you will received. production unit will comes with a 0.4mm slimmer than the prototype pieces.

Crown 

We believe in attention to the finest details and the Sea Hunt is the perfect example. Everything from the sapphire glass to the screw-down crown accentuates the beauty and personality of the timepiece.  The brushed case and the uniquely design caseback with a small sapphire crystal window enhances the luxurious style and rugged look.     

The Sea Hunt diver is tested and rated at 50 ATM / 500m of water resistance. 

A Helium Escape Valve is fitted with the purpose of protecting the case from damage during deep sea diving.  

For the movement, Aerotec choose the venerable Miyota 9015. At just 3.90mm in height, the movement allowed for the relatively slim case profile and also provides reliable timekeeping. It offers both hacking and hand-winding and operates at 28,800 bph for a smooth, sweeping effect. One thing to note is that it also boasts a 42-hour power reserve and supports the discreet date function located at 6 o'clock on the Sea Hunt's dial.

  •  Case size: 40 mm  
  •  Case thickness: 14.1 mm excluding domed sapphire crystal 
  •  Lug width: 20 mm  
  •  Lug to lug: 48 mm  
  •   Weight: 98.9grams ( case ) 113.2 grams ( with leather strap )
  •  Caseback:  Unique caseback  
  •  Crown: Screwdown embossed A signed logo   
  •  Movement: JAPANESE MIYOTA 9015 Automatic  
  •  Dial :  Meteorite or brushed dial with applied 3D indexes filled with C3 Super-Luminova  
  •  Crystal: 3.3 mm Double domed sapphire crystal with anti reflective coating underneath    
  •  Water resistant: 50 ATM / 500M    
  •  Strap: Italian aged leather and stainless steel bracelet 
  •  Packaging: AEROTEC packaging box
  •  Warranty: 1 Year International  

Aero +1 : Meteorite Dial

Aero 2 : Burgundy brushed dial

Aero 3 : Blue brushed dial

The Sea Hunt comes with a Standard Italian aged leather strap.

These high-quality leather watch straps are crafted  from premium Calf leather. Sized at 20mm wide and 3.5mm thick, each strap  comes with extra padding, making it sturdy, yet soft with sweat resistant lining to feel smooth against your wrist. Straps are available in vintage brown leather with 2 two options color stitching : beige and dark brown.

Packaging plays an important role for us so that is why we have created a complete box for the Sea Hunt diver. 

At Aerotec, we believe wrist watches should be a premier wearable technology and we intend to be the company that leads the way. As our fourth major product launch, this new line of precision engineered timepieces represents a tremendous commitment to quality, materials and the smallest details, customer satisfaction and the advancement of durable design. We are setting a standard for others to match and as the leader in our field, we expect to remain at the cutting edge for years to come. We think this is the best way to serve our valuable customers and fans.  

Bracelet 

The Sea Hunt's fully brushed stainless steel bracelet comes with solid end link and double lock deployant clasp that prevents accidental opening. Next to being very secure, the bracelet is also comfortable to wear and gives the watch a solid look.  

If you're interested in purchasing an additional bracelet, please add AU$55 to your pledge for this add-on.

P.S Clasp will be upgraded to milled type. 

Improvement made for production.   

There will be a small improvements made from the bracelet clasp to the production pieces that you will received. production unit will comes with milled clasp instead of stamp clasp.    

Also the index's lume will be heavy up during production.

The Journey to Kickstarter!

 As Seen on : - 

We anticipate to begin delivering rewards on March/April. 2020. Quality assurance will take place in conjunction with delivery ensuring we ship perfect watches in a timely manner.   

You are responsible for any duties, fees and taxes that may apply in some countries.

Risks & Challenges

There are always challenges and unforeseen obstacles that arise when trying to bring a new product to life. However with this being our fourth product launch, we can confidently say that we are experienced in this process and have developed systems and processes to mitigate the risks and obstacles that will arise. We will work hard to ensure that we deliver what we promise and to go the extra mile whenever it is possible.
In the event of delays to milestones or reward deliveries please note they will be shared promptly and a revised schedule provided.
Our production samples are ready, tested and approved. Now, all we need to do is reach our goal and start production.
Thanks for believing in us!
Team Aerotec

story:
eSlim is an electric sonic toothbrush that has all the power and performance of your average electric toothbrush with the addition of an ultra-slim and portable design. Upgrade your dental routine with high-end DuPont bristles with the perfect level of comfort. You'll have that crystal clear smile in no time.

 

 

We approached the design process bias-free to create something that truly reflects what people want - a product that has yet to be discovered by the majority; unique but in-demand.

 

Dental care is an essential part of our daily routine that is often overlooked. We invest more than ever in other health gadgets but our teeth are often ignored, despite the fact that damage to teeth is irreversible. To solve this, all you need is a portable sonic toothbrush that you can take anywhere.

 

 

eSlim provides a premium brushing experience for all, allowing you to simply & easily adapt its portability, aesthetics, functionality & performance to match your needs.

 

Matching the look of the toothbrush to your modern lifestyle and elevating your brushing quality with DuPont brush filaments, three brushing modes, a convenient removable travel cap, and fine-crafted body tube —— all seamlessly into one instrument.

Our goal was simple - to design the world's best portable sonic toothbrush to make you feel confident using it in any situation and maintaining good oral hygiene.

 

 

 

We sought to create a certain aesthetic by combining simplicity, style, elegance, and glamour for the most exclusive product without sacrificing essential functionality. To achieve this high standard, three foundations were necessary.

 

(1) Premium Material — eSlim is all about uniqueness and comfort.  The body is made out of 304 food-grade stainless steel / 6063-grade aluminum alloy that is very durable, and scratch-resistant.

(2) Surface Treatment — eSlim impressed a valued client with its excellent finishing treatments, which includes vacuum ion sputtering (PVD), anodizing, andanti-fingerprint treatments.

 

(3)  High-Quality Brush Filaments — eSlim's high comfort level is guaranteed. Dentists advise using what feels comfortable and encourage you to brush regularly & correctly. We took that to heart by using DuPont® nylon, which issimply the best.

 

Attraction starts with the first impression

eSlim comes in vibrant colors with a rich satin finish. The brush fits into an elegant cap that encases the entire brush seamlessly for an even more streamlined look.

There are three cleaning modes available at the click of a button⎯ Cleaning, Massage, and Whitening

 

Smart Brushing

The timing function helps you cultivate healthy brushing habits. A vibrating reminder every 30 seconds indicates when you have finished cleaning one area of the mouth, prompting you to continue to another area for a more consistent and thorough cleaning experience.

 

Excellent Comfort

eSlim aims to provide the softest and most comfortable cleaning experience. DuPont® produces very high-quality brushes with a balance of consistent quality, wear performance and unmatched productivities in tufting and end-rounding by using DuPont filaments.

 

 

High Vibration, Deep Cleaning

With the highest vibration speed at up to 27,000 vibrations per minute, the newly designed high-speed sonic micro-motor is user-friendly comfortable and efficient.

Very Quiet

eSlim operates at just 60dB, which is considerably quieter compared to the high pitched buzzing of other sonic toothbrushes - allows you to brush with little disturbance to others.

IP X7 Waterproof

The waterproof performance of the product meets the IP X7 Waterproof standard. This standard ensures effective performance even if the USB port is exposed to the environment for a long period of time. Most importantly, the Micro USB Port itself (while unplugged) is IP X7 water-resistant as well, which means even if water enters the port, it will not damage the toothbrush.

Ventilated & Deodorizing

The easy-to-open design easily snaps into place and keeps bristles straight for effective cleaning. Ventilated toothbrush covers protect the brush head and keep it dry between uses. The antibacterial coating keeps the cover clean as well.

 

  • ANTIBACTERIAL PROTECTION

These toothbrush covers will protect any manual toothbrush & help keep the brush head hygienic. Compact and designed for portability and easy packing, they can be used at home or for work, school or travel.

 

  • EASY, PORTABLE STORAGE

The toothbrush cover easily snaps into place. It features an antibacterial coating to keep your brush cleaner between uses at home or on the go, and the cover is ventilated to allow the brush head to dry between uses.

Attraction starts with the first impression⎯⎯  eSlim comes in a gorgeous color selection, a rich satin finish, and the brush rests in an elegant cap that connects to the body tube seamlessly

Due to the premium quality of the Aluminium Alloy, the production costs are substantial. If you would like the red Aluminium Alloy toothbrush, please add an extra $10USD which is $78HKD onto your reward:-)

If you want to buy our perfectly designed accessory in the gift pack, you can select it as a perk, which will ensure a cheaper price and lower shipping costs

  •  +USD$3 for Brush Head * 1 (HKD$25)
  •  +USD$6 for Travel Bag * 1 (HKD$50)

（ex: add $3+$3+$6=$12 for 2 × Brush Head & 1 × Travel Bag）

 

The Oday Standard Christmas Gift Set Includes:

  •  eSlim Aluminum Sonic Toothbrush * 1
  •  Toothbrush Head * 3
  •  Micro USB Cable * 1
  •  Rubber Dust Cover * 1
     

When utility meets elegance, it means everything is elevated. Meet the brand new design of the revolutionary electric toothbrush by Odaycare - The most luxurious, high-performance toothbrush crafted with the finest materials and most innovative technology.

Over the years, we have been deeply involved in the field of oral care products, with deep industry chain resources, and commitment to creating a new generation of oral care products and services that consumers can trust. We have a first-class domestic design team, experienced in both industrial design and oral care product design. Our partners include Pedex, Dupont, Cashew, and more. Industry benchmark brand. We use our superior industrial resources to create a new generation of oral care products that are practical, efficient and stylish.
story_txt:
eSlim is an electric sonic toothbrush that has all the power and performance of your average electric toothbrush with the addition of an ultra-slim and portable design. Upgrade your dental routine with high-end DuPont bristles with the perfect level of comfort. You'll have that crystal clear smile in no time.
 

 
We approached the design process bias-free to create something that truly reflects what people want - a product that has yet to be discovered by the majority; unique but in-demand.

 
Dental care is an essential part of our daily routine that is often overlooked. We invest more than ever in other health gadgets but our teeth are often ignored, despite the fact that damage to teeth is irreversible. To solve this, all you need is a portable sonic toothbrush that you can take anywhere.
 

 
eSlim provides a premium brushing experience for all, allowing you to simply & easily adapt its portability, aesthetics, functionality & performance to match your needs.

 
Matching the look of the toothbrush to your modern lifestyle and elevating your brushing quality with DuPont brush filaments, three brushing modes, a convenient removable travel cap, and fine-crafted body tube —— all seamlessly into one instrument.

Our goal was simple - to design the world's best portable sonic toothbrush to make you feel confident using it in any situation and maintaining good oral hygiene.
 
 

 
We sought to create a certain aesthetic by combining simplicity, style, elegance, and glamour for the most exclusive product without sacrificing essential functionality. To achieve this high standard, three foundations were necessary.

 
(1) Premium Material — eSlim is all about uniqueness and comfort.  The body is made out of 304 food-grade stainless steel / 6063-grade aluminum alloy that is very durable, and scratch-resistant.

 
 
(2) Surface Treatment — eSlim impressed a valued client with its excellent finishing treatments, which includes vacuum ion sputtering (PVD), anodizing, andanti-fingerprint treatments.

 
(3)  High-Quality Brush Filaments — eSlim's high comfort level is guaranteed. Dentists advise using what feels comfortable and encourage you to brush regularly & correctly. We took that to heart by using DuPont® nylon, which issimply the best.

 
Attraction starts with the first impression
eSlim comes in vibrant colors with a rich satin finish. The brush fits into an elegant cap that encases the entire brush seamlessly for an even more streamlined look.


There are three cleaning modes available at the click of a button⎯ Cleaning, Massage, and Whitening

 
Smart Brushing
The timing function helps you cultivate healthy brushing habits. A vibrating reminder every 30 seconds indicates when you have finished cleaning one area of the mouth, prompting you to continue to another area for a more consistent and thorough cleaning experience.
 Excellent Comfort
eSlim aims to provide the softest and most comfortable cleaning experience. DuPont® produces very high-quality brushes with a balance of consistent quality, wear performance and unmatched productivities in tufting and end-rounding by using DuPont filaments.
  
High Vibration, Deep Cleaning
With the highest vibration speed at up to 27,000 vibrations per minute, the newly designed high-speed sonic micro-motor is user-friendly comfortable and efficient.

Very Quiet

story:
Every time I climb with women I'm reminded of how powerful those women are and of how life changing climbing can really be, how it can make you feel stronger, more powerful and in control of your life. This is what I want to bring to women, to as many women as I can, from all walks of life, through Womenclimb.

I want to tell you a story about Natasha.  Natasha is deaf and eighteen months ago she was nearly killed as a result of domestic violence.  In the aftermath of her terrifying experiences and through the resulting darkness she wanted to reconnect with activities she loved doing.  As a child she was so free-spirited, but now the prospect of stepping out of her comfort zone was a frightening thing to do.  Nevertheless she promised herself that this would be the year she would learn to climb and in June we climbed together.  At Womenclimb, each woman is treated as an individual, whatever their level of climbing.  Our ethos centres on encouragement, inclusiveness and building confidence.  This ethos and the support from our community on the website helped Natasha achieve something that she didn’t think she was capable of.  The feeling she got at the top of her first outdoor climb…that feeling is priceless. 

Natasha is just one of the many women that we have reached out to support.  This campaign is about you helping us to make our reach wider, broader and deeper.  It’s about reaching out to people who don’t always have opportunities and helping them to make the most of their amazing selves.  We’re reaching out to you to join us in making this happen today. 

Positive Action = Rewards

It’s always nice to be rewarded when you do something positive and this campaign is no exception.  We have lots of perks, from organic, ethically sourced limited edition T-shirts and really groovy greetings cards to climbing guidebooks, outdoor climbing days and opportunities to advertise on our website which gets over 20,000 visitors a year.  If you look at our gallery (tab on the right) you will see some pictures of the perks!

How your contribution will help:

We want to develop our amazing community of women, online and face to face, so that we can create amazing life-changing experiences that have positive and tangible effects on women’s lives and futures. Your contribution will help us create events, develop pilot projects working with disadvantaged women and improve everything about what we do.  We can’t do this without you.  Every single contribution is a lynchpin in this project. 

A bit about our history?

Womenclimb was started in 2013 by founder Emily Pitts who recognised that there was little or no information about climbing by and for women.  Since then the website has been built up on the work of Emily and a group of volunteers in their spare time.  They have run a series of successful events and meetups enabling women to learn to climb and progress their climbing. 

Women say that they want to meet other women to climb.  They say that climbing with other women has less testosterone and they feel safe to express themselves.  Men have been some of our strongest supporters and we thank them for being there and keeping us going when the going has been tough.  Whoever you are, if you’re reading this now, know that your contribution will make a difference.

If you’re completely confused and don’t understand why people love climbing then perhaps this is what you need: why IS climbing so great?

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute but are interested in helping, thank you! 

Share the campaign - Share the post at the top of our Facebook Page to help us get the word out.  You can also Tweet or share our pins on Pinterest. 

Donate your story to us – Tell us how climbing has changed your life and we will share this on our website.

We can't thank you enough for being a part of this powerful movement.

story:
Can be install the prescription lenses or prescription sunglasses lenses.

  About  Carbon fiber glasses are not novel in the world, but are hardly used in the legs of glasses. Exclusive carbon fiber glasses are hardly seen (at least I have not seen).When they first came into being, they were mainly made with bamboos covered by carbon fiber glasses, but it never went public. Bamboo is light and environmental friendly, while carbon fiber has the reputation as future materials and beautiful interwoven patterns, which can make up the disadvantages of bamboo being brittle, for carbon fiber is very tough. (Hint: Elasticity techniques can also be used in carbon fiber glasses to make the legs soft. At present, the trial is on half way.) Manually made bamboo& wooden glasses always have a touch of rusticity, but with carbon fiber blended, the work has completely been given a kind of technology and modern flavor, extending the range of users.

     It looks cold (but better than metal), so it needs a warm materials，bamboo is the best choice.In the future ,I will continue to develop carbon fiber with !bamboo furniture and household products ,it will be very interesting!In face,I have more crazy idea in material science,how knows?.....



who  need your helping ? 



Why need your helping？

      Thanks your time!I am Takemoto.

        I once wrote a long story about all of me,  spent a month to prepare plans, showed all of my best idea and works.but nobody wanted to see. Now I would just like to say: a very hard-working and real craftsmen and designers  needs your help to get rid of his predicament: very hard but very poor, labor gave to the payment of interest. I hand made the 1000 pair of glasses in 2014-2015, and now I'm going to sell them  to win a financial freedom in life,and  cheaper price.(about 20-30% 0FF）

      As a craftsman, I want to have a new larger studio.,away from the neighbor's ridicule and sarcasm (I used to be a successful business of glasses, but began to handmade glasses since 2009, has invested a lot of money in this business,I sold my house ,and two optical store, so become poor, and then laughed at and questions have been around me),As far as possible to reduce dust and noise.   
they are my old studio:
it's 3# studio.I build it alone, it at the top of the seventh floor.But it will be removed at any time, because it shouldn't exist there.


and,This is the 1 # and 2 #, they are bicycle garage, very small.color pictures looks too poor,so,let them being black....

If you want to know more story?visit my Facebook,see more pictures and works!
how to made them?



what wou get if you help?


MJX1055 C01 bright bamboo color $58

(including UPS shipping)

                           

    MJX1055 C04   brown bamboo color $58

(including UPS shipping)


   

 MJX1055 C0401 brown frame with bamboo color arms  $38

(including UPS shipping)



how to made them?really handmade?



              

                       







Before TAKEMOTO,there is no olive wood glasses in the world!


Custom any style OX horn glasses $185

       

                       **The most "adorable": MOON

    Designed in 2009.There is a great demand for reading glasses, and consequently there must be a huge market for them. I have always wanted this set of glasses to sell at a low price in supermarkets. A pair of this kind of glasses is like a half moon, but to put two of them together will form a full moon, and make them like a real pair of glasses. Thereby, they are designed for old couples.

                          

                       other works

story:
Featured in:


What is the DNAME® ?

• 100% UNIQUE : The DNAME bracelet is the only object customized on you forever. We analyze your DNA and we engrave your unique sequence on the bracelet. Unlikely other DNA-related product we use very sophisticated technologies to get the sequence of your DNA. The process is expensive, but at the same time is required to give you a unique product. The percentage that 2 unrelated people have the same sequence on the bracelet is about 1 on 575 trillion! There are currently no objects with such a high degree of unicity!

• 100% SECURE : The DNA is the most unique and secret part of ourself and that's why our priority is to guarantee the security and the privacy of our customers. For that reason, we will sign an agreement with an highly specialized laboratory with ISO 9001:2008 accreditation (WORLDWIDE QUALITY CONTROL) to ensure you the highest standard in terms of security and privacy. We will require your authorization to work with your DNA and we ensure that the genetic information will not be disclosed to third parties.

• 100% MADE IN ITALY : We believe our product is more than a simple bracelet and in order to ensure you the best quality all the steps (production, assembling and packaging) are designed and realized in Italy, where we live. So we can easily follow all the steps.

Specs


Example of DNAME® bracelet in brushed TITANIUM - BLUE. Additional images in GALLERY section.

Example of DNAME® bracelet in polished STEEL - VIOLET. Additional images in GALLERY section.

·Matherials: polished Stained STEEL or brushed TITANIUM laser-engraved;


·Lenght:  

size 1= 6.29 inches (160 mm) easily adjustable on wrists; 

size 2= 7.48 inches (190 mm) easily adjustable on wrists;

·Width: 0.59 inches (15 mm);

·Depth: 0.1 inches (2,5 mm);

·Weight: around 1.05 ounces (30 grams);


Colors


Rewards

• 100€  DNA ANALYSIS ONLY: You will receive a kit for the DNA analysis. Our laboratory will send you the results of the identity test and your unique DNA sequence for your personal use --

• 150€ SINGLE DNAME®: You will receive your DNAME bracelet customized with your unique DNA sequence in the color and size you prefer + CUSTOM engrave (ex. Name, Date of birth, other...) -- LIMITED TO 10 PIECES --

• 180€  SINGLE DNAME®: You will receive your DNAME bracelet customized with your unique DNA sequence in the color and size you prefer + CUSTOM engrave (ex. Name, Date of birth, other...)

• 290€  DOUBLE DNAME®: You will receive 2 DNAME bracelets customized with 2 unique DNA sequences in the color and size you prefer + CUSTOM engrave (ex. Name, Date of birth, other...) -- LIMITED TO 10 PIECES --


MORE DETAILS ABOUT THE DNA ANALYSIS


From Indiegogo to you:

The production of the DNAME® bracelets involve different steps.

1. You will receive the DNA kit with the cotton swab to collect your DNA.

2. You will send the kit back to our laboratories

3. We will decode your DNA and send you your unique DNA sequence

4. We will engrave your sequence on your selected bracelet. 

5. You will receive your DNAME® bracelet!

The whole process will take approximately 1 month. 


LASER ENGRAVING PROCESS:



The DNAME Team


Risks & Challenges

The DNAME project started over a year ago thanks to the help of a small bunch of great visionaries and amazing supporters. We already faced a lot of issues and problems finding the right suppliers for such a small and customized production, developing the molds, testing the product, engraving the metals and so on.... but in the end we succeed! Right now we have all the machinery ready and set-up to work! So no more delay, and no more problems. We just need your help to start a bigger production!! 

F.A.Q

DO YOU ENGRAVE ALL MY DNA SEQUENCE? No, we don't need it. The human DNA sequence it's about three billion letters and it is 99,9% common for all the human being. We will only look into specific repeated regions of "non-coding DNA" that will identify you and you only.

IS IT SAFE TO SEND YOU MY DNA? Yes, it is 100% safe. As stated before, we will only look into repeated sequences that are used to identify people! We know that the DNA is the most unique part of ourself and it's our priority to fully guarantee the privacy of our customers. For that reason, we will use an highly specialized laboratory with ISO 9001:2008 accreditation (WORLDWIDE QUALITY CONTROL) to ensure you the highest standard in terms of security and privacy. We will never disclose your data with anybody else and before we proceed you will have to authorize us to get access only to the information required for the production of the bracelet.

IS IT POSSIBLE TO ADD A CUSTOMIZED INSCRIPTION TO THE DNAME BRACELET?Yes it is and it's included at no additional cost. In addition, we strongly suggest you to further personalize your custom DNAME bracelet.

DOES ANYBODY CAN GET HIGHLY CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION IF I LOST MY DNAME BRACELET? No they can't. The sequence on your DNAME bracelet is not related to any disease and not even to your sex, hair color, height or body mass.

****************************************************************************

If you need more informations, you can visit our website www.thedname.com and ask us a question at thedname@gmail.com

THANKYOU

****************************************************************************

And Last But Not Least...

If you like our project and want to support our campaign you can also:

  • like our Facebook page DNAME
  • spread the voice about our product
  • tweet about it with the hastag #theDNAME or @theDNAME
  • share our Indiegogo campaign!

Rewards • 100€  DNA ANALYSIS ONLY: You will receive a kit for the DNA analysis. Our laboratory will send you the results of the identity test and your unique DNA sequence for your personal use --
• 150€ SINGLE DNAME®: You will receive your DNAME bracelet customized with your unique DNA sequence in the color and size you prefer + CUSTOM engrave (ex. Name, Date of birth, other...) -- LIMITED TO 10 PIECES --
• 180€  SINGLE DNAME®: You will receive your DNAME bracelet customized with your unique DNA sequence in the color and size you prefer + CUSTOM engrave (ex. Name, Date of birth, other...)
• 290€  DOUBLE DNAME®: You will receive 2 DNAME bracelets customized with 2 unique DNA sequences in the color and size you prefer + CUSTOM engrave (ex. Name, Date of birth, other...) -- LIMITED TO 10 PIECES --

 
  

MORE DETAILS ABOUT THE DNA ANALYSIS



From Indiegogo to you: The production of the DNAME® bracelets involve different steps.
1. You will receive the DNA kit with the cotton swab to collect your DNA.
2. You will send the kit back to our laboratories
3. We will decode your DNA and send you your unique DNA sequence
4. We will engrave your sequence on your selected bracelet. 
5. You will receive your DNAME® bracelet!
The whole process will take approximately 1 month. 

LASER ENGRAVING PROCESS:




The DNAME Team



Risks & Challenges
The DNAME project started over a
year ago thanks to the help of a small bunch of great visionaries and amazing
supporters. We already faced a lot of issues and problems finding the
right suppliers for such a small and customized production, developing the molds,
testing the product, engraving the metals and so on.... but in the end we
succeed! Right now we have all the machinery ready and set-up to work! So no
more delay, and no more problems. We just need your help to start a bigger
production!! 
F.A.Q

DO YOU ENGRAVE ALL MY DNA SEQUENCE? No, we don't need it. The
human DNA sequence it's about three billion letters and it is 99,9% common for
all the human being. We will only look into specific repeated regions of
"non-coding DNA" that will identify you and you only.
IS IT SAFE TO SEND YOU MY DNA? Yes, it is 100% safe. As
stated before, we will only look into repeated sequences that are used to
identify people! We know that the DNA is the most unique part of ourself and
it's our priority to fully guarantee the privacy of our customers. For that
reason, we will use an highly specialized laboratory with ISO 9001:2008
accreditation (WORLDWIDE QUALITY CONTROL) to ensure you the highest standard in
terms of security and privacy. We will never disclose your data with anybody
else and before we proceed you will have to authorize us to get access only to
the information required for the production of the bracelet.
IS IT POSSIBLE TO ADD A
CUSTOMIZED INSCRIPTION TO THE DNAME BRACELET?Yes it
is and it's included at no additional cost. In addition, we strongly suggest
you to further personalize your custom DNAME bracelet.
DOES ANYBODY CAN GET HIGHLY
CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION IF I LOST MY DNAME BRACELET? No they can't. The
sequence on your DNAME bracelet is not related to any disease and not even to
your sex, hair color, height or body mass.







****************************************************************************
If you need
more informations, you can visit our website www.thedname.com and
ask us a question at thedname@gmail.com
THANKYOU
****************************************************************************

And Last But Not Least...

If you like our project and want to
support our campaign you can also:

like our Facebook page DNAME

spread the voice about our product
tweet about it with the hastag #theDNAME or @theDNAME
share our Indiegogo campaign!

story:
Introducing Wesley Yu Design

Materials
We use the best of the best: 40 momme Lake Como Silk, silver-plated metal mesh from Versace’s Florentine manufacturer in Italy, and Superlampo zippers by Ditta Giovanni Lanfranchi. 

Craftsmanship
Our Italian atelier has manufactured clothing for Gucci and Prada and shares our passion for detail and quality.

Design

Our designs are inspired by high tech electronics and innovation.  We create fashion that is sleek, modern, and clean.  

Price

We work with the same suppliers and manufacturers as the top luxury Italian brands. However, by selling directly online to you, we reduce inefficient marketing spend, pricing our items 67% less expensive than that of luxury Italian brands.

Product Reviews

"I ordered a silk dress with a unique design from Wesley and was impressed. He is a talented individual and very passionate about his career. I look forward to seeing his new collections." - Joanne Yuen, client



Perks


Classic Silver Earring

$34

Add some shine to your outfit with this classic silver metal mesh earring. Drop measures 2 in.

Materials: Silver Plated Metal Mesh, Sterling Silver Hook



Silver Swarovski Drop Earring

$39


Materials: Silver Plated Metal Mesh, Sterling Silver Hook


Bedazzle the evening with this stunner! This 3 inch drop earring is made of silver metal mesh and embellished with a glistening Swarovski stone.



Silver Mesh Evening Bag

$349


Materials: Silver Plated Metal Mesh


This beauty glistens like liquid silver. It will complement your iWatch and other accessories.



Metal Scarf

Platinum - $139
Silver - $159


Materials: Silver Plated Metal Mesh (or Nickel Plated, in the case of Platinum Color), Sterling Silver Clasp


An elegant accessory that adds shine to your outfit.



Top: Platinum Scarf, Left: Silver Scarf




Mini Zipper Dress

$289


Available Sizes: 2,4,6,8,10. Please see FAQ about choosing size options.


Materials: Silk crepe de chine, silver plated metal mesh, Lanfranchi zippers, silk habotai for lining

With zip details and a contrasting silver mesh hem. Crafted with 40 momme silk crepe de chine in Italy.





Necklace Dress

$299


Available Sizes: 2,4,6,8,10. Please see FAQ about choosing size options.


Materials: Silk crepe de chine, silver plated metal mesh, silver plated chain, silver safety pins, invisible zipper, silk habotai for lining

A stunning silk crepe de chine dress that features a silver chain and metal mesh necklace held with two safety pins. Crafted in Italy, this cocktail dress has a generous flattering cut.





Futuristic A-line Dress

$249


Available Sizes: 2,4,6,8,10. Please see FAQ about choosing size options.


Materials: Silk crepe de chine, clear vinyl, silver plated metal mesh, Lanfranchi zipper, invisible zipper, silk habotai for lining

This gorgeous A-line dress is crafted with Italian silk and features a transparent vinyl neck. It is embellished with top stitching and silver zipper details



Earring Bundle

$59



Accessories Bundle

$239



A Little Lesson....

Our Silk:



Our silks are from Italian mills near Lake Como, where the best and softest silks in the world are manufactured. We use 40 momme silk crepe de, about double or triple the thickness and quality of industry standard silk, making ours uniquely sumptuous and soft. Our dresses are fully lined with silk habotai.

Our Metal Mesh


In 1982, Gianni Versace, together with a German craftsman, invented Oroton metal mesh, a textile that was like the armor of medieval warriors and yet could be draped as fluidly as the softest silk.  After 1982, Versace used metal mesh liberally in every one of his haute couture collections, mixing the material with the most luxurious silks, leathers and wools. Our metal mesh comes directly from Versace’s Florentine supplier and is made of brass and plated with silver (or nickel, in the case of the platinum colored necklace).

Our Zippers


Our zippers are Superlampo Colibris manufactured by Ditta Giovanni Lanfranchi. We custom designed every part of the zipper, from the metal plating to the design of the zipper pull. Superlampos are probably the highest quality zippers in the world and are the often used in luxury Prada handbags.


My Story

Hi! My name is Wesley Yu, and I’m a native of the San Francisco Bay Area, a mathematics alumnus of UC Berkeley, and a luxury Italian fashion enthusiast. I created Wesley Yu Design because of my struggles to find high quality Italian-made designer fashion that I could afford—the Italian fashions I liked were almost always priced over $1,000!
At some point, I discovered that luxury Italian fashions are often marked up 10 times the production price due to middlemen, expensive storefronts, and unnecessary ad campaigns.
I thought, why can’t I create my own Made-in-Italy brand and sell directly at affordable prices? That way, more people, including myself and my friends, could buy high-quality Italian-made designer fashion without breaking the bank.  
And that’s exactly what I did….


I’ve spent the last 2 years vetting suppliers, sourcing materials, meeting manufacturers, and designing our collections. Each Wesley Yu product is manufactured in Italy with the utmost level of quality and care. Thank you to everyone who helped get me to where I am today.

FAQ

Q. I just bought a dress. How do I choose the size I want?

A. We make 5 sizes: 2,4,6,8, and 10. After you checkout, we will send you an email confirmation of your order and there, you can reply with the size you choose.



Fulfillment Schedule

We try our best to get your items to you as soon as we can. That being said, there are obvious risks associated with our manufacturing and timing process, especially given that our manufacturers are based in Italy.
Our accessories manufacturer is just about done with our first production, and we will ship these out no later than July 20.
Our clothing (dresses) manufacturer will complete production in late October. The dresses will be shipped out around mid to late November.

Thank Yous

Video Production:  Matthew Verkler/ Cut-on-the-Action
Video Crew: Russell Hosking, Ethan Verkler, Markus Verkler, Austin Verkler
Photography: Herm Pugay
iWatch: Minda Agohub, CEO of Peakfoqus
Hair and Makeup: Jamie Huang
Model: Emily Meyzinger

story:
OUTSIDERZ CO. CEO

WHO AM I?-

I am Sagine, a 25 yr. old single mother who's spent majority of life in school and working to care for those in my life. Growing up in a creative family, I have always been encouraged to follow my dreams, regardless of financial instability. Outsiderz Co. was first launched in 2012, where it took off rapidly, & quickly gained a significant client base. However, after many offers where mass production was necessary, with no substantial backing, the line was unable to keep up with demand, resulting in a 2 year hiatus. Even through this "downtime," the ideas & work never stopped. In 2014, an exclusive extension of Outsiderz Co. was created, relatively named Carnival Diamondz Inc. Coming from the West Indies, many of our countries celebrate carnival with tons of music and thousands of masqueraders, hence the idea to design luxurious costumes dripped in stones & feathers, illustrating the many beauties of the islands, while simultaneously demolishing the many negative stereotypes associated with them. This is my opportunity to showcase my originality as well as a bring my culture to the runways of this prominent event.

THE EVENT-

I have recently been given the AMAZING opportunity to officially launch my brand as well as premier my first Resort '15/'16 & Carnival Collection on the big runway for LA Style Fashion Week in California. For those who aren't familiar with Fashion Week, it is a 5 day event taken place in different cities, where various fashion designers from up & comers to legends, grace the runway with their new collections to thousands of people. As an aspiring high fashion designer, this has been a huge dream for me and need some help getting there!

WHAT IS THE MONEY FOR?-

LASFW is from March 18-22, 2015. The fee to secure my slot for the show on March 21st is $1200 & also covers a 5 day display in an exhibition booth at the event's Trade show where many boutique owners, buyers, and traders will be in attendance searching for the next best trends to feature. I am setting my goal to $2000 as the remaining funds would assist in covering travel expenses as well as various marketing items that are necessary for my time there, such as business cards, promotional flyers, and printing of my logo sign for the runway.

Any kind of assistance will be overly appreciated from those who believe in my dream and desire to support. I have posted a few pictures about the event, as well as a few past designs to give a taste of my different styles.

story:
Strap on trendy knotted ties in 10 seconds or less. Be bold
be unique be YOU

Are you someone who values your time? 

Are you suffering with a disability and unable to tie a tie?

Are you looking for the perfect gift for the perfect man in your life?

Do you find it a struggle to tie a tie on a kid?

Are you too tall for some ties?

Are you getting married and want the men in the wedding to be first class?

Do you want to get noticed or stand out from the crowd?

We feel your pain. This is some of the reasons Knot Brothers came about.

If you spend just 20 minutes a day 5 days a week tieing one of the fun ties you see out there, that is wasting over 40 hours a year!

Women and men are wanting to know where to find the perfect gift for the perfect man.

Ones with disabilities who prevent them from tieing are able to now strap on a tie.

Men who are 6 feet 11 inches are loving the fact they now can strap on a tie and go, one that is the perfect length!

Parents are ecstatic having a tie ready to go for their kids.

Groomsmen now have the right tie to represent the perfect day.

Men and women who are out networking will be noticed asap and create conversations.


After your support, you will be sent an email asking you which color, tie and length you desire. 
Super easy to be on your way with your 10 second strap on pre-knotted tie!


                    


www.knotbrothers.com

Why Indiegogo This:

People often ask us “What is your Why?” That's a great question! And we are eager to share with the world our purpose, cause, and belief that inspires us to do what we do.

Being a tie lover myself, I found myself wearing a tie for work, meetings, gatherings, worship, weddings, funerals, etc.,It was a time sucker and no fun to put a tie on. The typical knot was boring. Then I fell in love with fun knots such as the Tulip, Elderedge, Artichoke, Viper, Double Windsor and many more. I wanted something bold that would stand out, grab peoples attention, and make a statement but also portray professionalism. When they first came out I tried to find a place to buy one. Nobody had them. It took 30 minutes for me to tie one! Who has that kind of time? I had better things to do! I ended up being late to appointments.

My wife wanted me to add – She, like many other women find it daunting to shop for men. What can I get my guy? I have no idea what he needs? How can I impress the man in my life? Its True gifting for Husbands, Fathers, Sons, Grandfathers, Boyfriends, or the Prince Charming in your life is a painful task most times.

Here are some of my other frustrations attempting to tie fancy knots. Can you relate?

  • I was late due to fighting with my tie trying to get the perfect length and knot. Sweating with frustration already having put on my suit, after I finally was done tying my tie (the 10th time) I basically needed another shower.
  • Some of these knots I enjoy were leaving an annoying tail that had to be tucked or hidden under the collar which became very uncomfortable, irritating and wouldn't stay out of view.
  • Many times I ruined my nice ties. Handling it so much the wear and tear became to much for the fabric that it would fall apart in my hands if not snag, rip, or tear, not to mention the oily finger prints left behind.
  • The time I was spending on tying my ties became so unpopular with the fast pace world I live in. It was no convenience for me at all. My time is valuable to me and I felt like I was wasting my life away.

I wanted to make the pain go away and do the same for others. There were to many reasons in my mind “Why” this needed to be done.

Knot Brothers Ties are uniquely creative and revolutionary. Here are some of the rewards and benefits that our ties will bring to our customers. As a matter of fact, you can check out our ties at www.knotbrothers.com

  1. Enjoy the perfect knot every time 

  2. Customizable options: Size, Color, Knot

  3. Its a time Saver, No Redo, 0 Frustration 

  4. Makes the perfect gift for all Men

  5. Adjustable Strap for a comfortable fit 

  6. High quality craftsmanship hand tailored knots

  7. Attract others 

  8. No more precious time wasted fighting your tie

  9. Long life span. Less Wear and Tear on Tie 

  10. No need to tuck or wrap the uncomfortable tail

  11. Stand Out 

  12. Easy to put on and take off

  13. Caters to the fast pace world we live in 

  14. Fun to wear

  15. Portrays Professionalism 

  16. It Promotes tie wearing

  17. Variety of knots and styles offered 

  18. Women shopping for men is now a no brainer

  19. Strap the tie on little ones. Fathers and Mothers dream

Check out our first testimonial from a raving fan! 
*****After you select one of our tie perks, an email will go out to you asking your height or the length you request. This is perfect for any height, 3 foot to 8 foot tall. 
Our goal of $7,500 will assist in expanding our business with more supplies and production. We have in place solid relationships and good communication with overseas suppliers to provide us with bulk material in a timely fashion. Our goal is to hire more people in the USA and support our economy. We have already received inquiries of ordering 10,000 or more!

Let's celebrate! We believe in giving back. When we hit our goal with Indiegogo, we want to donate ties and $500 to www.swsorganization.org, a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization dedicated to improving the quality of life and access of resources for families and youth.
Are you ready to be a part of the Knot Brothers Brotherhood? Check out our selection of ties at www.knotbrothers.com 

Once you select the perfect knot package for you, we will email you asking which tie(s) and color(s) you desire.

Thank you for all your support!

Evan Peterson
