of creating a unique set of watches for the modern age. I wanted these 
watches to spark curiosity, be comfortable and still maintain that air 
of style that I love about Italian timepieces.Our on-the-go 
lifestyle means most watches are ignored today, but SLIM-42 will get you
 noticed and may spark a conversation. I hope you like what I've created
 as much as I've enjoyed making them, and I hope together we can make 
SLIM-42 come to life.Hope to see you join our project! 
The SLIM42 CLASSICI had a lot of fun with this one. Don't 
want a watch that conforms to social norms? Want something that's 
completely different and can't help but pop out at you. Say hello to the
 SLIM42 classic. Shirt / Jeans / Suit, you make the rules.The 
SLIM42 classics is also made of very high quality Polycarbonate (the same
 used in the iPhone, HTC and Sony Smartphones). It's just as thin as the
 SLIM42 Steel but this one also incredibly light.SLIM42 CLASSIC IS SUPER SOFTThe SLIM42-BANDOkay
 I couldn't help myself, I had to add in a little more style. So with 
the SLIM42 Band, I took the same designs of the SLIM42 Classic but added
 in a customizable chain link band. 
enjoy here our 3d watch interactive just move your mouse in :) MANUFACTURINGThe super serious stuff ... this is where the SLIM42 will come to life and this is why we need your help. assembly screws on case backOur Assembly Room FloorOur CNC LineWe have a policy of testing our products meticulously and our prototype came back perfect The Waterproof Testing Area every watch will test one by one in order to give to our Backers top quality.REWARDSPlease select a reward for any watches for the collection.You'll receive a survey to specify the model later Thanks.Rewards For who like get 2 watch. We offer 2 watch for 
just €55  available for 50 set only ,and can choose any combination of 
colors.So why are we here?Okay so me and my team have done the
 hard work of designing the SLIM42 and building prototypes. But now we 
need your help to get to our manufacturers minimum order size so we can 
get SLIM42 out into the world and you can enjoy your own SLIM42.We hope you'll join us on our journey and get your own SLIM42 at an incredible price ... just for you, our lovely backers.
Help us by sharing the SLIM42 with your friends please! and get one gift from us , fill the form here www.ideacreationgroup.com/gift  and you will get with your order this additional adjustable soft bracelet for free THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT.                                                                     Gift BaraceletKnow someone who would be just excited by the SLIM42? Reach them with our campaign via the "Share this project"




SLIM42 FEATURES and SPECIFICATIONSOur 2 Years warranty covers 
your watch breaking for any reason! In addition to covering 
manufacturer's defects, it also covers , water damage, or a broken band.
 All you have to do is ship the broken watch back to us and we'll send 
you a replacement right away! The warranty does not cover wear & 
tear on a working watch or a dead battery.SLIM42 Classic Specifications SLIM42-BAND Polycarbonate SpecificationsPACKAGINGSINGLE PACKAGING If You choose 1 - 3 - or 5 pieces pledge, your watches will each in this single packageCRATE PACKAGING If you choose 10 pieces you will receive this crate with your ten watches of the styles and colors you choose  About The Designer • First of all I want to say thank you so much for reading my 
campaign page here on Kickstarter. I'd like to give you a bit more of my
 history so you can better understand where SLIM42 came from.• My
 name is Ippazio Andrea Palama and I’m an Italian Watch Designer since 
1991. I was born in 1963 in Italy and spent most of my youth in Rome 
where I developed my love of style and watches, and I where I later went
 on to studied the art of design at the Academy.• After working 
as an assistant in numerous design studios. I started my own career as a
 freelance designer in 1991 and it was in this year that I came up with 
my first passionate creation for the watchmaking sector. After spending 
more than a year designing and producing this model, I decided to set up
 my own distribution company and working very hard I established myself 
in the market.• In 1996 I was awarded the Best Award Design at the Gallery of Design and Innovation in New York.•
 In 1997 my work with computerized graphics led to an international 
prize, the Best Combination Site, an award given by Media Magazine and 
Apple Inc. for the creation of an original website• In 2000 I 
decided to design a collection with very original shapes and, this time,
 in an explosion of colors and new materials. My new collections met 
with great success at international trade fairs and gave me the 
opportunity to design watches for various leading brands. HERE if You like You can see some of my design creations.•
 2003 with the creation of a second brand, COOL, I began a unique 
application of color and plastic materials to the design of watches and 
small jewelry. I partnered with Champion in 2005, one of the leaders in 
the Brazilian Market and our watch is still strong in the Market•
 2010 I finally created my brand ANDREA PALAMA & PALAMASIX3 and 
develop the brand for 5 years. SLIM42 is my latest creation.  Our TimelineFor design, manufacturing, prototyping, campaigning, production and fulfillment of the collection.OUR KICKSTARTER HISTORY 
The project was fully funded within the first 10 DAY with 136 BACKERSI would like to extend my sincere thanks for your interest in SLIM42 which has been 5 years in the making.My very best wish and a big hugAndrea PalamaIn
 order to realize this Campaign i want to say Thank you to everyone who 
is working hard with me to make this dream a realty! Thanks Guys!!Francesco Cardullo – cofounder, dreamer, making things happen  Jerry Wu – Prototype developerWalter Haas – ConsultantSpecial Thanks For the video  Lucas, Leo, Diana, Milica, Danka, Valentina, Rich, DJ Jack.Our manufacturers stand ready to activate production as soon as we meet our Indiegogo funding goal.We will always keep you informed if (in the rare chance) things take longer than planned.Risks and challenges:
The main risks are our reliance on outside sources within the supply 
chain. The contractor for the manufacturing of the flex circuit has to 
order components from other vendors. If one of these vendors slips in a 
commitment, the timing of the production process is at risk, but we're 
confident that with our long experience, local relations and attention 
to quality assurance, we'll meet or beat our projected delivery dates.

story:
Are you tired of wet umbrellas that you don't know what to do with, which end up being left in a shop doorway? Are you tired your umbrella breaking in a small gust of wind? We are! That’s why we had to think of a solution, and we found it: Beau Nuage!

Beau Nuage is a revolutionary solution which will make your life easier when the weather is rainy! 

We have developed a high quality, folding umbrella and its self-drying cover. No more inconvenience when the weather is wet: you can store your umbrella directly inside its cover to dry and put it straight into your bag! 

 

Beau Nuage is not a simple umbrella, this is a revolutionary project, bringing several innovations together to make your life easier. Rainy days will become happy days! 

 

Beau Nuage is a high quality umbrella you can slip in a revolutionary zipped cover. Thanks to a three-layer technology, our cover absorbs the raindrops and keeps your umbrella always dry.

  1. The inner "absorption" layer is made of a special, microfiber fabric which retains water and will absorb the raindrops from your umbrella.
  2. The second intermediate "repulsive" layer made from water-repellent material keeps the outer layer dry by preventing raindrops to go through, but it also constantly pulls raindrops towards the microfiber to ventilate it and dry it efficiently.
  3. An outer layer made of polyester which was specially altered to be both rigid, soft and of course hydrophobic so that no raindrop can penetrate the cover from the outside.


 

Foldable umbrellas are often badly designed, made from cheap materials and are not able to withstand varying weather conditions. In order to avoid these problems the materials we have used have been chosen meticulously, ensuring each umbrella is robust and made to a high quality. 

The umbrella itself is made using strong and innovative materials, including aluminium and steel shafts as well as aluminium reinforced fiberglass ribs. These materials are durable, strong and light-weight. This optimizes the resistance to strong winds and helps to prevent the umbrella from turning inside out. The canopy material is thicker than the standard umbrella and its TEFLON coating repels water more effectively. 

Moreover, the Beau Nuage team pays special attention to the quality control of our products with every single umbrella being checked at each stage of the production. Our priority is your satisfaction. 

 

 

 

We are excited to introduce a new collection which includes four new colours which have featured on the catwalks for Spring/Summer 2017. Not only have we enhanced our design we have also improved the materials used and the mechanism of the umbrella. It is with the help of our faithful community and customers that we have been able to improve our concept and ultimately create a better product. Meet it right now! 

 

 

 

 

 

We now need you to help us to pursue our dream. Your contributions will help to cover the R&D research costs and to pay the deposit to launch the production ensuring we meet the minimum order quantities for the first production batch.

 

Beau Nuage was created by two young entrepreneurs, who one rainy evening in London decided to reinvent the concept of the modern umbrella. Now, Beau Nuage is a dynamic team of 4 and we have help from our friends all over the world! 

Aurélien and Antoine make up an incredible pair! Energetic, enthusiastic and passionate about entrepreneurship, they decided to create their own business. Thanks to an innovative idea and complementary skills, they took up the challenge and managed to face every step. Antoine has significant experience with suppliers, which enables him to deal with production issues. His logical mind and capacity to understand the concerns and the priorities are major qualities for the firm. Aurelien studied finance and developed strong qualities necessary to run a viable business. His rigor and abity to move fast made it possible to find durable solutions and to develop a thriving business. Moreover, his contagious enthusiasm is key to convince distributors and investors! 

To support the founders, two amazing people work on the Beau Nuage project. Anas is our art director. His technical capacities as long as his artistic flair make it possible to create the Beau Nuage universe. Pauline focuses on marketing and commercial concerns. Organized and creative, she develops the business with the founders and brings development ideas. 

We owe our success to a lot of people; our friends, families and acquaintances, who have helped us throughout the whole creation process and beyond. We especially think about Caroline, Marine, Bella, Véronique, Jonas and Meggy. Thanks a lot, this project is live thanks to you! 

 

Not only is Beau Nuage a solid team, each of us are skilled and have knowledge in specific fields which make it possible for us to build our project. Since we founded the start-up two years ago we have had invaluable experiences: developing prototypes, entering into partnerships with manufacturers, fulfilling orders and managing after sales services. We wholeheartedly believe in our project and now we want to fulfill your expectations.

 

The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we will be able to make the product! Do not hesitate to share our project with your friends and to talk about us, your help is the best way for us to grow.

 

 

Thank you for your interest and, hopefully, support.

story:
My name is Gabriel Diamant. I'm a licensed investment consultant with over 10 years of experience in finance. I was also a military captain in a previous life, and have worked in real estate, investments, precious metals, and, for a little while, even ran a large truck company.

My story with Carats & More began when I went to buy my girlfriend a wedding ring 8 years ago (she said “Yes”, by the way!). At the time, I thought I got a pretty decent deal when I made the purchase. However, when Or, my first daughter, was born, I decided to buy my wife a diamond pendant and bracelet. By this point I had established myself firmly in the jewelry industry, and was shocked to discover how, just by knowing the right people, I was now able to lower the price by 45%. Immediately I felt that there was something very wrong with how diamonds are sold – most people are simply priced out of the market, but, evidently, they don’t need to be.

At that moment I decided that luxury jewelry – especially pieces that are meant to express one's love – shouldn't be for the richest only. And so I set out on a mission to find a way to drive consumer prices down and make diamonds accessible to a wider market.

I went and knocked on as many doors as I could, as hard as I could, trying to find the best materials to manufacture and distribute high-quality jewelry at affordable prices.

And so Carats & More was built – and I’m proud to say that we are now an established, global boutique jeweler.

Over the past 6 months, we have been working tirelessly to develop an exquisite catalog of some of the finest diamonds available online. The best part is that we have been able to keep consumer prices low – but, we want to do more to reduce these prices even further. Indeed, my number one aim in life is to continue to spread the romance of boutique jewelry to even vaster swathes of the global population. 

At Carats & More, our processes are highly distinct. We have developed a business model that utilizes modern technology to create a convenient and customer-centered online shopping experience through which our elegant and luxurious items are sold. Custom-made engagement rings, diamond pendants and diamond earrings are all crafted using highly-refined manufacturing methods, bringing a new breed of jewelry to customers in a better and more affordable way.

All diamonds are conflict-free and hand-selected by experts at Carats & More. We have dozens of custom styles, offer money-back guarantees, operate with complete transparency, and have a 24/7 customer service operation in deployment. At Carats & More, it’s our top priority to keep clients happy every step of the way.

___________________________________________________________________________

I have turned to Indiegogo in order to help raise the funds needed so that we can continue to drive consumer prices down – we want you to be able to buy diamonds at prices you never thought were possible!

And so we approach you with the opportunity to be a part of what we are trying to achieve. If we can raise $122,000, we will be able to place a number of mass diamond orders from our key suppliers, and slash consumer prices by a further 15%. Put simply, this will mean that Carats & More customers will be able to buy the most special and precious gifts for themselves and their loved ones at prices that have never been seen in the market before.

But we need your help. Please, take a look at some of the high-value perks we are offering those that pledge to make the Carats & More dream become a reality. 

Perks: $10 ~ $500

Perks: $1,000 ~ $3,000

  Perks: $7,999 ~ $9,999

$20,000 Perk:

World’s First Diamond Trading Platform
In addition, this March, Carats & More will be launching the world’s first retail diamond trading platform. The trade site will feature an opportunity for people to trade and invest in single high-value diamonds, diamond parcels (essentially “diamond funds”), diamond trade options, and many more exciting and innovative functions. Hope to catch you there!

Thank you all for supporting Carats & More in our mission to make luxury diamonds accessible for more people around the globe!

story:
The Mythical Collection

The Mythical Collection is a series of precious jewelries with story behind every design. Inspired by the beauty of ancient coinage, this collection is exclusively handcrafted by Greek artist who’s also a great admirer of Ancient Greek art & history. His unique creations carry the myth and belief of the ancient world who are still in existence and related to our daily life. 

The complete collection which will be launched in phases consists of cufflinks, necklaces, rings earrings and other wearable ornaments featuring mythological figures or legendary objects which are highly sought after by collectors worldwide.

 

 

Valuable Gifts for a Lifetime

Some gifts are very precious, just like antiques, they are very rare and could be expensive! The one we create for you, could be one of them, but inexpensive. 

What we have Created

From ancient art to modern wearable ornaments, these objects are valuable to own for its incredible historical background, and exceptional to wear as your modern fashion piece. Our Artist has completed the prototype of many designs and we are now making this Collection known to everyone so that as you are able to custom made them into your personalized jewelry.

 

Your Timeless Gifts, Created Just for You

A gift becomes more precious when it contains your personal touch. Hence, we are making it possible yet affordable to engrave your name or a special date to remember. A gift to your parents, spouse, friends on their wedding, anniversary, birthdays or any occasions, we will make this the most unique gift ever for you!

 

Your Support Means A Lot to Us

This campaign is to gain exposure on the beauty of these objects under this Collection. We aim to make these timeless objects accessible to everyone around the globe, giving you an opportunity to own a customize and valuable jewelry at an affordable price.

Your funds will go to the production tooling necessary to create the products previously handled manually, this will help to increase productivity and lower the cost of production. We pledge to expand and create more valuable objects inspired from ancient art and collectibles and make them available to everyone.

 

The Rewards

 

Certificate of Authenticity

All products are made with genuine materials/parts and handcrafted by our artist. Each reward comes with a Certificate of Authenticity from the artist.

 

 

 

FAQ

Q: How can I customize my cufflinks/necklace?
A: After backing, we will send you an discount code upon the end of each campaign. You need to submit the name/initials/date (maximum 6 characters) at www.KairosAgora.com within five (5) working days. The standard font we use is CASTELLAR, if you prefer an alternative, let us know and we’ll do our best! After you receive the discount code, logon to www.KairosAgora.com, go to “Indiegogo Campaign" or "Shop” page   - -> Select the Product you back on Indiegogo - -> Enter Your Initial - -> Click “Cart” - -> Enter the given “Discount Code” in coupon box - -> Proceed with your delivery information --> Click "Check Out" --> "Offline Payment"

Q: When will I receive the Reward?
A: Early Bird Backers will get your reward before Mother’s Day (14th May 2017).
     Indiegogo Special Backers will get your reward before Father’s Day (18th June 2017).

Q: Do I need to pay any tax?
A: Cross-border deliveries are subject to possible inspection by the relevant custom authorities. Any charges, if applicable, are determined and charged by the Customs office of the destination country. For further details of charges, please contact your local Customs office.

Q: Are the reward returnable?

A: Each of the cufflinks or necklace are made to order and produced just for you. Therefore we will not be able to accept returns unless there is any defects on the object and we will gladly make a replacement for you.

Q. How do I maintain the product?
A: The products are made of sterling silver 925. Silver is a precious metal known for its shiny and distinct look, jewels made by this should be used with gentle and care. Oxidation is considered as normal wear & tear, the tarnish can be removed by using metal cleaning agents and rub with soft cloth. Otherwise, pour a small amount of mild soap into lukewarm water and wipe with soft cloth. We are happy to offer free cleaning service at your own delivery cost.

Q: Do you ship to US/Asia?
A: Yes, we ship internationally.

Q: Can I change/customize the perks into other accessories such as ring or earrings?
A: Yes, you may send your request to us at info@kairosagora.com and we shall provide you a quotation for consideration before proceed.

Q: What is the warranty period?
A: Pendant or button - 5 years, Cufflinks mechanism - 1 year, Chain/Clasp - 3 months.
General wear & tear, tarnished are not covered under warranty.


If you have any suggestions, questions or comments, we would love to hear from you! Email us at info@KairosAgora.com

Visit our online shop at https://www.kairosagora.com/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/KairosAgora/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kairosagora/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/kairos_agora

Silver is a precious metal known for its shiny and distinct look, jewels made by this should be used with gentle and care. Oxidation is considered as normal wear & tear, the tarnish can be removed by using metal cleaning agents and rub with soft cloth. Otherwise, pour a small amount of mild soap into lukewarm water and wipe with soft cloth. We are happy to offer free cleaning service at your own delivery cost.
Q: Do you ship to US/Asia?A: Yes, we ship internationally.
Q: Can I change/customize the perks into other accessories such as ring or earrings?A: Yes, you may send your request to us at info@kairosagora.com and we shall provide you a quotation for consideration before proceed.
Q: What is the warranty period?A: Pendant or button - 5 years, Cufflinks mechanism - 1 year, Chain/Clasp - 3 months.General wear & tear, tarnished are not covered under warranty.
If you have any suggestions, questions or comments, we would love to hear from you! Email us at info@KairosAgora.com
Visit our online shop at https://www.kairosagora.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/KairosAgora/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kairosagora/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/kairos_agora

story:
My hobbies have always been in the arts.

This has been my favorite.  My daughter wanted to buy a pendant for her mom and decided on a silouette of a young girl.  The silver pendant she found at a local jewelry store was pretty but looked nothing like my daughter.  I asked her to wait and so began my training in being a silversmith.  In my quest to make the process simpler and to produce a quality piece I have found that it takes time, money and some friends tools.  In the end, I am happy with the results and I am sure you will be too.

This is Eleanor's cheesy ready to be cast.




Here are my two dogs Lego and Mo.  

Average size of each pendant is  5/8" X 5/8".


Pendants can be square, round, or just the silouette, the choice is yours.  Average size is 5/8" X 5/8".
What makes a good profile?
  • a person looking directly to the side
  • a favorite flower with distinct petals
  • birth certificate footprints
  • if it looks good as a shadow it will look good as a pendant
I have the necessary tools and access to casting equipment, but it sure would be nice to do it all out of my own shop.  The funding here will pay for better tools  and my own casting equipment.

story:
Take A Look Inside The Trial FOX Boxes.


My Plan For This Campaign.

My name is Ron and i run the FOX WORKSHOP, I am 35 and live in Edinburgh with my growing family and i have a keen eye for great outdoor gear. Being a prepper for most of life i tend to see what gear is necessary and what can mean the difference between life and death in given situations.

I am proud to be launching the FOX BOX after the successful trial period that really blow my expectations out the water with the public response. 

I am Launching the UK's biggest and best monthly subscription box for Bushcrafters, Preppers and Survivalists packed each month with great new gear for a super low price. For your money each month you will get between £55-£60+ worth of new gear from your FOX BOX, Nice. 

The best part is the box is a mystery every month all you know is that it is full of great new QUALITY gear including hand crafted items made by myself and other expert Artisans.

  • By contributing to this campaign you with help me take the FOX BOX to the next stage and take this business forward. you will be helping set up:
  • New Website with new features for FOX BOX subscribers so you can manage your subscription much easier and with more options.
  • Create great new inserts in full colour each month (100% recycled paper).
  • Set up a Reseller section for users to promote the FOX BOX and get rewarded for it.
  • Increase the subscriber count that will allow more buying each month for ever better content and more value handed over to you.
  • Upgrade camera equipment for demo videos on box contents and how to use the gear all filmed outside.

What You Will Get Out Of It.

If you choose to support me on this campaign you will be offered great savings and also great hand crafted Artisan leather work created by Myself within the FOX Workshop.

The Next FOX BOX will arrive in the first week in MARCH 2016, this is to allow me time to promote the Indiegogo campaign and also set up a new time line for ordering and sending the boxes out at the start of the month rather than the end.

A Mystery box of survival greatness every month - Kinda like a mini christmas.


Handmade Reward Tiers....And, Well Stickers

  • Super Awesome stickers slap your FOX heads on your gear and show off to your mates just how much cooler than them you are!
  • After the feedback form the second trial box that included a hand made belt pouch i have added this to a reward tie also. The hunter series EDC belt pouch usually costs £30 and is made from 3.5mm veg tan and is hand dyed and cut and punch as always. It is stitched by hand with artificial sinew. It includes a tin also your with the next FOR BOX for £50. Limited amount.
  • Exclusive double pin brass buckled bushcraft belt hand cut punched and dyed to a antique finish. Made by the FOX WORKSHOP in Scotland. Usual Belt Price £55, Available with the next FOX BOX included for £70.
  • FOX Workshop messenger bag reward limited to 5. This is a hand made 14x10x4 3.5mm veg tan and north american deer hide satchel. It has a woven adjustable strap and also closes with a AlpineAustin cobra buckle. It also has a hand laced front flap and is fitted with hand cast brass d'rings on the rear for the strap. Usual messenger bag price £250 - Yours with the next FOX BOX Included for £230.

Risks & Challenges

The risks and challenges i think i have worked out during the 3 month trial changes and lesson learned are listed below. 
  • The risks i have already run into are mainly with ensure imported items are giving more time to clear customs and to expect to pick them up with duties to pay.
  • Gather more info like wasit size, t shirt size and what hand you use for writing etc to get items in the boxes that will fit and offer more gear options for customers.
  • Do not use a set date for delivery as often last minute changes are made to increase the box value that may add on a few days and i would rather not make people uneasy if the set day is missed by a few days. Rather i will send the boxes out within a set 2 week window at the start of each month.
  • Use cut off times for the "NEXT" box so i have time to get the best items ready for posting.
  • Maintaining quality hand crafted items and expanding outside of the FOX Workshop to other artisans worldwide.
  • Maintain a method of forward planning for the boxes ensuring i stay ahead each month allowing more time for researching new items released each month.

Brands & Stores Already Featured In The Fox Box.

 

  


Staying Green:

The FOX Box & The FOX Workshop use 100% recycled and natural packaging. Inside each box you will find packaging called WOOD WOOL made from pine remnants. Use this great tinder to ignite you packaging and save it from landfills. (Please do this outside!)

Supporting Local Community Projects:

In 2016 the FOX BOX will be starting to donate arts and crafts bundles and summer gardening seed packs to community run events for young children and toddlers. More on this to come in the year and you will be able to put your local community service forward for a possible donation.


Perk Text Error: I never realised till after i launched but the top perk says free shipping but still charges you for shipping and i can't change it now....BUT it was being changed to include postage as i dropped the price from £35 for the indiegogo to £30 - sorry though as bit misleading.

story:
You can order your pair of MOONSHADES in 4 different shapes. Each is designed with different face forms in mind - meet Atlas, Kasper, Cassini and Moro! Pick out your favorite, but to make sure you get the best fitting one, check out our try-on concept art mirror.

 

 

Each lens option is polarized and equipped with 100% UV protection.

With Early Bird perks lenses available in Sienna Brown and Forest Gray colors. Once you purchase an Early Bird perk, we will contact you so that you can choose the color of your lenses! 

 

 

What makes a good frame? This was the question on our minds when we first started working on our design. Our research yielded the following answers: the most important qualities of a good frame are comfort, aesthetically pleasing characteristics, sturdiness, and eco-friendliness. These were the attributes we were keeping in mind as we began to look for the perfect material.

That’s when we arrived at cork, which seemed to be just the solution. It easily met three of the aforementioned criteria. By its nature cork is soft to the touch, it’s special texture gives it a unique look, and last but not least, it’s renewable.

We managed to find a combination of materials that simultaneously helped compensate for the low tensile strength of natural cork and also to maintain its original flexibility. With that challenge behind us, we could focus on ergonomics and the shape of the frames themselves. The final product is a sunglass that is so comfortable, you hardly notice that you are wearing it. All the while, the frames are so unique and fashionable, others can hardly ignore that you are wearing them!

 

First, we design the frame using specialty software. Then, we print the digital model of the mold using a 3D printer. These prints are made with the SLA system printer to create thermoproof tools.

The frames are made via thermal press, consistent with the principle of operation of injection molding. The agglomerated cork mixed with our granule binds under relatively low heat but high pressure.

After pressure forming, the next step is the finish and assembly phase. Thanks to the flexibility of the frames, the lenses are inserted in a unique way, similar to pulling in the inner tube of bicycle tires. During production of the limited edition sunglasses, both reworking and assembly are done by hand. As a result, every single pair receives considerable amount of individual attention.

 

 

With the purchase of every perk that includes sunglasses, you receive:

The frame and tint of your choice,

a wipe cloth, 

a soft case, 

and a hard case to protect your MOONSHADES during shipment.

Early Bird perks contain the same elements. Please keep in mind that two lens colors are available with the Early Bird perks.  

 

If you purchase this perk, send us a selfie with an everyday object for scale and we'll hand-fit your chosen frame to your face! This way you'll know how you'll look with MOONSHADES on, so you can find the best fitting model. Don't forget to include the name of the frame you would like to try on! Send your selfies to info@moonshades.com and you'll receive the digital illustration shortly.

 

Gabor Megyery, Founder & Chief Designer

Throughout my design studies, I had the opportunity to gain experience with various techniques and to work with a range of materials that serve a large variety of functions. Perhaps more importantly, I had the opportunity to experiment freely.

Over time I realized that discovery is what truly motivates me; to solve problems by manipulating alternative methods or to discover a relevant area of use for an innovative technology.

Given the clarity of the goal, entrepreneurship appeared to be the solution. Now with 5 of us on my team, our aim is not only to create an – ideally – successful product, but also a sunglass brand; an eye-wear laboratory that, in close collaboration with the brand’s consumers, seeks to find innovative and unconventional solutions to real problems.

Join our dream and let’s explore our vision together!

 

How can I make changes to my order? 

Simply contact us at info@moonshades.com. We will do anything we can to address the changes you requested. 

 

When will I receive my MOONSHADES? 

The sunglasses ship in August of 2016. 

 

Do you have any special offers? 

Yes, we have an early bird perk of which 40 are available. It’s a limited time offer, don’t miss your chance!

 

How can I choose the lens color for my Early Bird perks? 

If you purchase an Early Bird perk, you can choose from two lens colors: Sienna Brown and Forest Gray. Mirror lenses not available in the Early Bird perks. Once you purchase an Early Bird perk, we will contact you via email so that you can choose from the two available lens colors. 

 

Do you ship internationally? 

We ship to the USA, Canada, and to the following European countries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland and the United Kingdom. 

If you are from any other country of the world, send us an e-mail and we will figure something out so that you are not left without your MOONSHADES! 

 

Do all frames float on water? 

Yes, all of our frames float on water. You can choose Atlas, Cassini, Kasper or Moro – none of them will sink.

 

What’s included in the perks?

They include the frame and lens of your choice, a case and a wipe. The concept art mirror perk doesn’t include the previously mentioned items. 

 

Are prescription lenses available?

Not at the moment, but once our webshop goes live you can order your MOONSHADES with prescription lenses.

 

Will my eyes be safe when I wear MOONSHADES? 

Yes, most definitely! All of our lenses are high-quality polarized lenses with UV-400 protection. 

 

What lens tints can I choose from?

We offer lenses in four colors: sienna-brown, forest-gray, blue mirror and silver mirror. 

 

What exactly does the lifetime warranty mean? 

We offer lifetime warranty on our frames. Although every sunglass is made by hand and thus receives special attention, mistakes can happen. Our lifetime warranty includes coverage for any problems that may occur during the manufacturing process (e.g., deterioration of the frame), but does not cover the lenses or intentional damage to the frame (e.g., cutting the frame in half, dipping it in acid). 

 

Should you have any additional questions, please do not hesitate to contact us at: 

General: info@moonshades.com 

Press and Business: gabor@moonshades.com

story: Featured in:
story_txt: Featured in:

story:
Short Summary

We are Istoría, a clothing line influenced moments in history or interesting places around the world. 

Our founders, Rachael and Will Forster, both come from a fashion background but from very different parts. Racheal is the daughter of a retired designer and a seamstress, and started her work in styling, blogging, and sewing early on in life. Will stumbled into fashion through digital marketing and branding. He runs his own consulting group working with mostly fashion companies where he interacts with CEOs, ad agencies, and fashion influencers. Ultimately, it was his desire for creative expression that began his journey to begin Istoría.

From the Founders

For a long time, we lusted after high quality, expensive pieces that were far beyond the amount of money we could spend. We started thinking about it, and before long, Rachael discovered that she could make them herself. 

That's where the idea for Istoría was born. Ready to wear, at an affordable price point, with couture influences. We are both inspired by our travels and history, so the line has taken on influences from history. While the inspiration for each collection will change, one thing that will not: the quality. 

The cuts and silhouettes are classic and flatter essentially all body types. The fabrics are high-quality and chosen for comfortable. The pieces in the collection are designed for elegance, fine detail and beauty. We aim to provide a top-notch customer experience, and will donate 10% of our profit from each collection to charity.

All of this, however, comes with a cost. 

What We Need & What You Get

We need about $10,000 dollars to make this dream come true. This will provide seed money to fund our initial production run, build inventory, and set the brand up for long-term growth.

We're offering a range of perks from pieces in the collection, framed versions of our lookbook images, a coffee table book of photography from our trip to Scotland, and even the chance to accompany us on our next lookbook shoot.

If we don't reach our entire goal, the funds will still be used to get Istoría up and running.

The Impact

We could never invest our time and energy into something we didn't love or feel would contribute to the world.  

Working on the retail and styling end, we both have seen the difference fashion can make in people's lives. We love that a woman can put on a jacket and feel prepared to take on the board room, slip on a dress with a swipe of lipstick and feel sexy for her date, or put on a regal jumpsuit and feel like a queen. We are offering high quality, unique pieces that help women achieve that confidence for a price point not much higher than a lot of fast fashion stores.

Our Fall '16 collection is inspired by Scotland and Mary Queen of Scots. Both are very representative of beauty, mystique, tenacity, and strength that we believe live inside every woman. 

Giving back is a core value of Istoría, which is why 10% of profit of each collection will be donated to a non-profit organization that will change each season. As we grow as a company, we hope to find new ways to help the world. It takes many hands to run a successful business, and we see each pair as have the potential to give back to the world. 

Risks & Challenges

There are some risks in starting a clothing line. We worry that people won't care about yet another clothing brand, or that they will disregard a new brand in a saturated market. Garments get made incorrectly, deliveries get delayed. A million things can go wrong in the apparel business, and we recognize these challenges in starting our dream company. 

We have the experience to make sure that the funds we raise will be used wisely, and we will deliver quality and value to our backers. Furthermore, we will continue to create content that we hope inspires people. 

It is definitely scary to begin this entrepreneurial venture, as there are dozens of important decisions to make each day, and dozens of ways things can go wrong. Nevertheless, it's hugely rewarding, as we are building what we believe can be an iconic brand.

Other Ways You Can Help

So...you don't have two pennies to rub together. That's okay. We still appreciate the love and there are other ways to show it to us.

Share this on your social pages. Let's get a buzz going. Let's get people excited about a new movement in fashion designed to cater to every woman. Just hit one of the share buttons on the page. 

Email us with creative ideas! We're open to new ways that we can show our clothing or have our company interact with different communities. 

Are you a blogger or a street style influencer?

Big or small... want to try on the pieces? Want to shoot with our company for your blog?  Send an email to shopistoria@gmail.com!

For a long time, we lusted after high quality, expensive pieces that were far beyond the amount of money we could spend. We started thinking about it, and before long, Rachael discovered that she could make them herself. 
That's where the idea for Istoría was born. Ready to wear, at an affordable price point, with couture influences. We are both inspired by our travels and history, so the line has taken on influences from history. While the inspiration for each collection will change, one thing that will not: the quality. 
The cuts and silhouettes are classic and flatter essentially all body types. The fabrics are high-quality and chosen for comfortable. The pieces in the collection are designed for elegance, fine detail and beauty. We aim to provide a top-notch customer experience, and will donate 10% of our profit from each collection to charity.
All of this, however, comes with a cost.    What We Need & What You Get
We need about $10,000 dollars to make this dream come true. This will provide seed money to fund our initial production run, build inventory, and set the brand up for long-term growth.
We're offering a range of perks from pieces in the collection, framed versions of our lookbook images, a coffee table book of photography from our trip to Scotland, and even the chance to accompany us on our next lookbook shoot.
If we don't reach our entire goal, the funds will still be used to get Istoría up and running.   The Impact
We could never invest our time and energy into something we didn't love or feel would contribute to the world.  
Working on the retail and styling end, we both have seen the difference fashion can make in people's lives. We love that a woman can put on a jacket and feel prepared to take on the board room, slip on a dress with a swipe of lipstick and feel sexy for her date, or put on a regal jumpsuit and feel like a queen. We are offering high quality, unique pieces that help women achieve that confidence for a price point not much higher than a lot of fast fashion stores.
Our Fall '16 collection is inspired by Scotland and Mary Queen of Scots. Both are very representative of beauty, mystique, tenacity, and strength that we believe live inside every woman. 
Giving back is a core value of Istoría, which is why 10% of profit of each collection will be donated to a non-profit organization that will change each season. As we grow as a company, we hope to find new ways to help the world. It takes many hands to run a successful business, and we see each pair as have the potential to give back to the world.    Risks & Challenges

There are some risks in starting a clothing line. We worry that people won't care about yet another clothing brand, or that they will disregard a new brand in a saturated market. Garments get made incorrectly, deliveries get delayed. A million things can go wrong in the apparel business, and we recognize these challenges in starting our dream company. 
We have the experience to make sure that the funds we raise will be used wisely, and we will deliver quality and value to our backers. Furthermore, we will continue to create content that we hope inspires people. 

It is definitely scary to begin this entrepreneurial venture, as there are dozens of important decisions to make each day, and dozens of ways things can go wrong. Nevertheless, it's hugely rewarding, as we are building what we believe can be an iconic brand.

    Other Ways You Can Help
So...you don't have two pennies to rub together. That's okay. We still appreciate the love and there are other ways to show it to us.
Share this on your social pages. Let's get a buzz going. Let's get people excited about a new movement in fashion designed to cater to every woman. Just hit one of the share buttons on the page. 
Email us with creative ideas! We're open to new ways that we can show our clothing or have our company interact with different communities. 
Are you a blogger or a street style influencer?
Big or small... want to try on the pieces? Want to shoot with our company for your blog?  Send an email to shopistoria@gmail.com!

story:
The Palette by Salt New York

Customizable

Makeup Not Included

  • Depot the makeup that you own.
  • Purchase pan-only makeup from one of the many brands that offer it including but not limited to: Mac, Makeup Geek, Bobbi Brown, Makeup Forever, Face Atelier, Stila, Laura Mercier, and in the near future: Salt New York—stay tuned.
  • Holds brushes, liners, pencils, domed powders, and other makeup products and tools*

*Must have a depth of .4"or less.

Makeup Not Included

Travel Friendly

Makeup Not Included

  • You know when you put makeup in a bag and it clangs together and breaks and coats literally every millimeter of every object in your bag in infuriatingly-difficult-to-remove dusty garbage particles? Yeah, let's not do that anymore. The Palette keeps everything secure and sidesteps the entire makeup bumper car situation. Yay for not opening your bag and saying, "ughhhhh whhyyEEEEE????" 
  • Wouldn't it be nice to only have to open up one compact when you are applying your makeup and not have to juggle between blush compacts, bronzer compacts, and 2 different eyeshadow palettes? And also have that compact include a mirror that's big enough to view more than half of one eyebrow at once? Yes. Yes it would be nice. Back us on kickstarter and it can be reality instead of just a hypothetical magic land of organized makeup and convenience.

Environmentally Conscious 

  • We would like to extend the sincerest middle finger to the concept of planned obsolescence. Using the highest quality, eco-friendly, post-consumer recycled materials and vegan leather, we built The Palette to last. 
  • In the US, cosmetics packaging accounts for upwards of 25 million tons of waste annually. Buying makeup in the pan addresses this issue head on—it's the thing purchasing equivalent of saying to Mama Nature, "I gotchu."

What is Depotting?

Depotting is the process of removing the metal pans from your makeup compacts and palettes. Here's a tutorial showing Kiki's preferred method. 

 

Dimensions

Exterior: 8"x5"x1"

Interior of magnetic base: 6.25"x3.8"x.4"

Risks and challenges

This project has been in the works for six years because our CEO is an Olympic gold medalist in perfectionism. We feel extremely confident that this project will go smoothly and we will be able to deliver a gorgeous, functional, and high-quality palette to our backers in a reasonable time frame. We are also realistic humans that have lived lives and understand that sometimes stuff happens. Aside from Acts of God/The Universe, potential risks and challenges include ensuring that the quality of the actual production run matches that of the impeccable quality seen in the samples made so far and our incredibly high standards, and that our timeline isn't affected by needing to address hiccups in shipping or logistics. What we can say for sure, is that if unexpected events occur, we will handle them with transparency, integrity, and open communication with our main peeps—our backers.

story:
One app to access all fashion media! 

Never a full bag ever again, with This Is Fashion you subscribe to all fashion media in one go! Our platform that delivers you all fashion magazines, catwalks, films, series, books, and lookbooks in one simple to use application. Access all fashion inspiration in a paper-free manner, contributing to a greener world, whenever and wherever you desire.

OUR MISSION: “Digitize and deliver all fashion media to all fashion lovers, whenever and wherever they desire.”

Did you know that by supporting This Is Fashion you are also supporting the #SavingFashion initiative to help institutions to digitize all of their heritage and add it to the This Is fashion library?

 

Pre-campaign and Goal

Even though the primary target for this campaign are fashion institutes everyone is more than welcome to back us. This initial campaign is to raise the funds for a global marketing campaign directed to all fashion lovers and consumers alike. The next round of this campaign is fully aimed at fashion loving consumers, the prices will be raised. Buy now for extra discounts. 

 

This Is Fashion – Netflix for fashion

Imagine a platform that lets you enjoy any fashion related publication or video, vintage, and the latest trends. This Is Fashion is that platform. We give access to all fashion media, Video or Print, in any language on any device! But we are not just building the largest fashion library in the world.

To make sure we got it right we started interviewing fashion students, professionals and lovers. We wanted to feel their pain, and design a platform that would solve the issues they encountered. With that in mind, we designed one simple app that lets you access all fashion inspiration. Complimented by a search engine to find the inspiration you are looking for. We knew what we needed to know, we knew how to make it fit in your already overloaded Birkin bag.

 

#SavingFashion

This Is fashion is more than just an application, it is our attempt to digitize and preserve the fashion heritage. To accomplish this mission we started the #SavingFashion initiative. Without proper preservation iconic designs, issues, and film will decade, and eventually fade away from history. SavingFashion helps institutes like Marie Claire, Grazia, Les Arts Décoratifs and , any others to digitize and protect their heritage, keeping it available for generations to come.

Education partners

Content Partners

This is fashion is working hard to secure deals with larger publishers. Together with our advisor Chris Llewelyn (the former CEO for FIPP - the international media network) deals with Grazia, Elle, Marie Claire, and others are currently being negotiated. 

BRANDS

This Is Fashion Features content from countless brands, Watch the newest defile's and short films. Enjoy lookbooks and all other inspiration the brands have to offer. There are special packages available for brands and institutes during the crowdfund, contact us for details.  on info@thisisfashion.tv

 

Future Proof

The This Is Fashion app will continually be improved upon, with our monthly release cycle new features will be made available. Features to make the life of a fashionista a little bit easier every new release.

 

 

Our #FashionHeroes

 

The Stretch!

As you can imagine we started a daunting task. But if it was easy it would not be this much fun. We need your help to launch our grande marketing campaign, minimal viable product and digitize the first archive. The first 75.000 -150.000 euro helps us doing just so, but with more funds, we can do so much more. 

 

More than funds, Share #SavingFashion

Even more than the funds we need your support, Follow us on social media, join our cause, Share this campaign with your friends and encourage your favorite blogger to cover our mission! The more fashion lovers talk about this, the more we can do. This mission is a team effort and we want you to be one of our #FashionHeroes! Make sure your voice is heard. 

 

Missed goals

This Is Fashion is an initiative that has been in development for over 2 years by our founder Sander Kooger. We know he is a very persistent individual. He personally invested everything in this project and as far as we can see he will always keep on going strong. We anticipated that it will take multiple funding rounds to launch and accelerate and grow ThisIsFashion. We know we have the resourcefulness and stamina necessary to complete this mission. 

 

Risks & Challenges

Filling up our library:

Although the vintage content is easy to obtain, premium content can prove challenging. This challenge is tackled if we have a large enough group of backers to make us interesting for the major film studios and publishers. And have working relationships with Marie Claire Elle and Grazia. 

Legal Liability:

The magazines are issued under contract and rights of the publishers. The majority of the scanned heritage content will not be protected by copyright anymore but with the old material, it is hard to be sure.  Our lawyers make sure everything is done according to the law and that the IP is correctly established and honored. 

Damage to content:

Working with antiques is delicate work. Experts with specialized equipment and procedures will scan the original material without damaging them or to a minimum. The equipment and procedures are the same as used by musea and libraries and comply with the highest standards.   

 

No possibility to back? you can still help

Some people just can't contribute, but are willing to help in other ways and join the cause:

  • TIP YOUR FAVORITE BLOGGER ABOUt US ON INSTAGRAM (@thisisfashiontv)
  • Get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • Share this initiative to everyone whom may it concern,
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Upload instagram stories linking to our campaign.

story:
ISSUE
Textile waste is an issue.  On average, 10.46 million tons are sent to the landfills every year in the U.S alone.  Brands toss unsold merchandise straight into landfills because it is cheaper & faster than donating.  (Most brands donations would be too large for most thrift stores to even accept!) And guess what – unsold items that do get donated to second-hand stores also get thrown into landfills if they are not sold quickly due to high volumes of donations.

Brands even set fire to unsold merchandise to “preserve its reputation of exclusivity”.  There has been reports of one very well-known brand, burning $36.8 million worth in a year of their own inventory to keep their luxury brand out of the hands of non-luxury people.  (I can’t make this up, google it!)

OUR SOLUTION
Our garments and accessories do not exist yet.  Right now, that angel shirt sitting in your virtual shopping cart is still one big piece of fabric, still on a cardboard roll.  We do not manufacture your item till we find a home for it to claim. As a retailer and design team, we pride ourselves in limited production.

We also love second hand!  All of our 1of1 pieces including our embroidered items and revamped vintage bags are created from items that were once loved before from a previous owner.  We rescue these pups from ending up in landfills, give them a good bath, a makeover good enough for a movie montage and finally find them a new home.


 

ISSUE
Chicago creatives stating there is no work in Chicago.  They feel in order to be successful in their field, they need to move to a larger market.  Therefore, a loss of creatives in the city.

OUR SOLUTION
We are striving to create a Chicago based business that other creatives will look towards for a source of income.  Photographers, stylists, makeup artists, models, graphic designers, fashion designers, creative marketing, writers, content creators – successful business have an endless need for artists.

We want to contract artist we believe in.  We want to host internships with multiple opportunities for students and young creatives.  We want to have ongoing collaborations with artists, so their craft and talent can become their 9 to 5.  We want to make a difference in our creative community.

ISSUE
Manufactures ship items to company warehouses in non branded plastic and boxes.  The retailer then discards that plastic and cardboard, and place the item in new branded plastic packaging and then ships your item to you in a new branded box. Why?  To better brand their company; aka create more waste.

OUR SOLUTION
Once you make a purchase via Cloina Store, your item is then manufactured, packed up & mailed directly to you from the garment manufacturers.  This eliminates extra fuel and packaging waste.

We are saving one cardboard box, one branded plastic bag & the fuel pollution from our headquarters in Chicago to you on every single made to order purchase!  This equates to a smaller profit for us, but also a smaller footprint on the earth from our company. (Which we are 100% cool with!)

WE NEED YOU 

We are seeking support to officially launch and have tangible results for our efforts in the issues listed above.  Cloina & Co has been completely self-funded. The cost of business, production and creation is extensive and almost never ending.  We are asking for donations of any amount to have the ability to follow through with our business endeavor and goal to financially support other artists.

EXPENSES TO COVER 
Articles of Incorporation ($180 – fee from the government to operate a business and apply for a tax number), website domain, monthly site hosting fee, social media ads, Gmail business suite, Embroidery design software ($900), Embroidery machine ($2000), ongoing embroidery supplies, compensating artists for their time, samples and shipping for every made to order piece during the design stage ($1750), supplies for 1of1 revamped vintage bags (industrial chains, vintage bags, etc.), food & uber rides for those who have worked on photo production projects, graphic design artist, set gear (photography backdrop. etc.), accountant, taxes, launch event, working with influencers as a marketing strategy, product that has been gifted to those who have volunteered their time for photoshoot projects, Microsoft Office subscription, PayPal fees, shipping supplies.

FROM US

We want to say thank you to anyone who has placed a preorder with us, volunteered their time to us, followed us on social media, shared our Instagram with others, and have overall been supportive vocally or virtually.  The amount of positive feedback we have received thus far has been overwhelming. We appreciate you and you are the driving force moving us forward. Thank you, thank you!

Follow our venture, get involved, get inspired - www.instagram.com/cloina.store

story:
Mission

Think of the utmost technological product. What do you picture? We fathom a car. Thousands of parts, perfectly engineered to fit together. There's no room for any miscalculation whatsoever. Everything assembled under an exquisite body in order to deliver an unequivocal performance. This is exactly what inspired us to design the Armand Rolin Watch. Hundreds of parts, all working in unison, to create an impeccable watch. And since each individual is unique, each moment is unique, we decided made two. Feeling classy? Just grab the Armand Rolin Classic. Or go all In with the Armand Rolin Skeleton. You can’t go wrong with either one. Both models are made of high grade 316 L stainless steel, with a Titan case and bracelet limited edition, also available for few distinct types. That's for the outside. But in each and every model we find beating a Japanese automatic movement inside. And we didn’t stop there. There are 15 bracelets for every Armand Rolin watch. Choose a steel or leather one for a classic approach. Or go with a silicone bracelet if you’re going for a casual look. They're all designed to fit perfectly with each style. So help us make this happen. We now have four prototypes. We believe in this project, and we want to make it happen together with you. Help us make this concept come to life!

 

 

 

Who we are

Hi there backer! We are Marian and Roland. Father and son. We are passionate about everything we do and we simply love watches.  Who does not dream to have his own designed watch? We sure do. And we tried to take a different approach in designing the ARMAND ROLIN watch. Our idea was to make a gentleman's watch, with all the details and quality as any luxury brand watch, but, with a price tag for everyone.

What we did.

We started this endeavour almost two years ago. We've been through a lot with this project, from design to testing, but now, we have 4 working prototypes. 

 

 

While we were designing the watches we thought: "What if we also made some elegant bracelets that can be worn as an accessory to the watch? So we've made 3 prototypes here too.

All bracelets are made from TITANIUM with three types of PVD coating: Gold, White Gold and Rose Gold.

All bracelets are available for purchase in combination for any of the watches. They are designed to have the same pyramid pattern and edges as seen in the Watches metal bands.

 

 

 

The watches are made from 316L Stainless Steel which, at this point it's a standard for high end luxury watches. The glass is Sapphire scratch resistant glass, also found mostly on high end watches. Both models come in three colours: Brushed Steel, Gold and Titanium Black. All are available wit 316L Steel bands, Genuine Leather or Silicone bands in a variety of colours also.

That's not all, for the more pretentious ones, we have a Limited Edition, in 3 models with TITANIUM case. Available for the Skeleton models, with TITANIUM bands.

And the most important part, the mechanism. It's a NH35, for the Classic model and NH70 for the Skeleton model, Japanese Automatic movement. It's the heart of any ARMAND ROLINwatch and beats at 21,600 vibrations per hour. 24 jewels are present in each movement.

 

What can YOU do

Now we're at the point when we need your help. We want our dream to come true. We think that the most difficult part is passed. We've been through designing, testing and prototyping. We now have the final product. And it's beautiful. I know it's our baby project, but we really think it's awesome. Just look at those angles, the see through back, the small details. We're in love with it.

Now, to you. Yes, you! If you're still reading, I think you believe in us. We just need to back us up! There's no hurdles ahead, no issues. You just get this amazing watch! Every one will be delivered in a wooden luxury box with leather inside. Because every detail is important for us.
story_txt: MissionThink of the utmost technological product. What do you picture? We fathom a car. Thousands of parts, perfectly engineered to fit together. There's no room for any miscalculation whatsoever. Everything assembled under an exquisite body in order to deliver an unequivocal performance. This is exactly what inspired us to design the Armand Rolin Watch. Hundreds of parts, all working in unison, to create an impeccable watch. And since each individual is unique, each moment is unique, we decided made two. Feeling classy? Just grab the Armand Rolin Classic. Or go all In with the Armand Rolin Skeleton. You can’t go wrong with either one. Both models are made of high grade 316 L stainless steel, with a Titan case and bracelet limited edition, also available for few distinct types. That's for the outside. But in each and every model we find beating a Japanese automatic movement inside. And we didn’t stop there. There are 15 bracelets for every Armand Rolin watch. Choose a steel or leather one for a classic approach. Or go with a silicone bracelet if you’re going for a casual look. They're all designed to fit perfectly with each style. So help us make this happen. We now have four prototypes. We believe in this project, and we want to make it happen together with you. Help us make this concept come to life!   Who we areHi there backer! We are Marian and Roland. Father and son. We are passionate about everything we do and we simply love watches.  Who does not dream to have his own designed watch? We sure do. And we tried to take a different approach in designing the ARMAND ROLIN watch. Our idea was to make a gentleman's watch, with all the details and quality as any luxury brand watch, but, with a price tag for everyone.What we did.We started this endeavour almost two years ago. We've been through a lot with this project, from design to testing, but now, we have 4 working prototypes.   While we were designing the watches we thought: "What if we also made some elegant bracelets that can be worn as an accessory to the watch? So we've made 3 prototypes here too.All bracelets are made from TITANIUM with three types of PVD coating: Gold, White Gold and Rose Gold.All bracelets are available for purchase in combination for any of the watches. They are designed to have the same pyramid pattern and edges as seen in the Watches metal bands.   The watches are made from 316L Stainless Steel which, at this point it's a standard for high end luxury watches. The glass is Sapphire scratch resistant glass, also found mostly on high end watches. Both models come in three colours: Brushed Steel, Gold and Titanium Black. All are available wit 316L Steel bands, Genuine Leather or Silicone bands in a variety of colours also.That's not all, for the more pretentious ones, we have a Limited Edition, in 3 models with TITANIUM case. Available for the Skeleton models, with TITANIUM bands.And the most important part, the mechanism. It's a NH35, for the Classic model and NH70 for the Skeleton model, Japanese Automatic movement. It's the heart of any ARMAND ROLINwatch and beats at 21,600 vibrations per hour. 24 jewels are present in each movement. What can YOU doNow we're at the point when we need your help. We want our dream to come true. We think that the most difficult part is passed. We've been through designing, testing and prototyping. We now have the final product. And it's beautiful. I know it's our baby project, but we really think it's awesome. Just look at those angles, the see through back, the small details. We're in love with it.Now, to you. Yes, you! If you're still reading, I think you believe in us. We just need to back us up! There's no hurdles ahead, no issues. You just get this amazing watch! Every one will be delivered in a wooden luxury box with leather inside. Because every detail is important for us.

story:
Our mission

ESTER is a Swedish independent watchmaker. Composed of small collective of passionate watch enthusiasts, only manufacturing mechanical watches. For us it is important to be able to offer a great affordable mechanical watch. It has never been about prestige or status it has only been about the craftsmanship and the passion. Our mission is to manufacture a mechanical wristwatch that all people want to wear including watch enthusiasts,  a watch that feels special from the first time you hold it. The Ester Perpetual Aston is a great watch, heavy, masculine and classic. We strive to have a minimalistic classic design that focus as much effort on what to put in as to what components to leave out. 

 

 

 

The watch

The heavy weight of the ESTER watch is one of the first experience you will have with your watch. It is a rather special feeling holding a really well-made watch in your hands.  The watch weighs in at over 80 grams and feels great on your wrist. It is not only the weight of the case and the movement but soon you realize it is something else. Somehow you can feel the craftsmanship behind the watch.

  • Case Diameter: 42 mm 
  • Case Thickness: 14mm 
  • Total Weight: 81g 
  • Case Material: Stainless Steel
  • Movement: Automatic Calibre 540709 or Swiss made Sellita 250
  • Bracelet: Columbus black leather
  • Water Resistant: 3 ATM
  • Warranty: Worldwide limited 5 years warranty
  • Versions: Silver, Rose gold, Yellow gold

 

The pure lines of the high grade stainless steel case complement the rest of the watch and protects the movement. The watch with its classic masculine design is 42mm in diameter and the heavy stainless steel case making the watch weigh in at over 80 grams. All versions comes with a mirror finished silver caseback that follows our uncluttered design language.

 

 

 A dial should be uncluttered and pure. We must have a pure aesthetics, but at the same time this is one of the components where we put the most energy in perfecting. The corgi white dial is enbedded with thousands of small silver crystals barely visible to the naked eye. The method of printmaking used is mainly by hand. The dial and the indicators are based on a complete metal foundation and manufactured by a separate specialist company.

 

We offer the Perpetual Aston with either a Swiss made Sellita movement or our most popular choice the Calibre 54.  The automatic mechanical Calibre 540709 movement has a sturdy mainplate foundation holding all parts of the movement. Created to be easily maintained to a reasonable price point and from a service standpoint, it´s a great design. The movement itself is very straightforwardly constructed. Solidly built and easy to work with. The jeweled movement uses synthetic rubies to reduce friction. One of the main reasons for us to use this specific movement is because of its sound. The balance wheel together with the hairspring creates a harmonic oscillating movement when the balance wheel receives impulses from the escape wheel. Its characteristic mechanical ticking sound created by the movement is surrounded by a small echo from sound waves bouncing of the steel bezel wall.

 

 

For the Perpetual Aston we have chosen a classic columbus black strap. Cut out of soft leather that over time gets a beautiful patina. The monochrome stitching along the edge is matched by the stitching and the embossed branding at the back of the strap. 

The idea of the columbus black comes from our leather specialist. An older Italian rather charming gentleman who worked in his family’s leather manufacturing business his whole life. He has a strong opinion on how a leather strap should be and, to him, even the simplest leather strap has a whole science behind it. He once said: ”A leather strap must be soft like a girls kiss the first day, loving as her feelings on the third and black as her mothers curse when she finds out.” Therefore all watches we produce comes with a columbus black leather strap

 

 

 

 

Our values

We like to say that passion in a company comes in 360degrees. We are passionate about making a great watch. To do so we must also be passionate in sourcing some great component producers. We care about who we work with and how they in turn treat their employees. In some cases, we work with small local producers. They may not be the fastest producers, they may not be the least expensive producers. But they all have one thing in common. They are passionate about the things they produce, in what they do. The small leather producer that helps us to make, what we think is, the best leather strap, or our specialist metal producer that helps us making a particularly high grade of steel case. 

 

 

Have a question? 
Send us an email at dist@esterwatches.com and we'll be in touch as soon as possible.

5 years warranty
We believe in sustainability and quality. We are proud to offer a 5 years worldwide limited warranty. Every Ester watch is guaranteed for a period of 5 years under the terms and conditions of our warranty. We're able to offer this guarantee because of our rigorous testing that ensures that every timepiece shipped from us has a five star marking in our testing procedure.

story:
Introduction

We are a young team from Canada that has a huge passion towards timepieces. Our goal is to break through the inflation that brands with big names have created. For the past year we have been working hand in hand with manufacturers all over the world, until we have finally crafted the most elegant timepieces that we are sure, you will love.

When creating our watches, we made sure they met these four criteria:

  • Highest quality materials.
  • A minimalistic look yet so elegant, they can be worn with the everyday outfit to those dressy occasions.
  • Affordable prices for the public, offering them for a fraction of the price of what our competitors sell them for.
  • 2-year warranty.

 

The collection!

 

Highlights

  • GENUINE LEATHER OR STAINLESS STEEL STRAP: Each watch features a high quality, genuine leather or stainless steel band.
  • STYLISH yet UNIQUE: Our watches were designed to fit right in with the latest fashion trends and styles, while at the same time, stand out from all the other watches out there.
  • DURABLE: Our watches are made with the highest quality materials, they are made to last.
  • ON TIME: With the help of an experienced watchmaker, we selected a high quality and accurate Quartz movement to ensure that you and your watch are always on time with style. 

 

All Ledesma Timepieces come with a Warranty!

All of our watches are made up with the highest quality materials. We are so confident on the quality of our timepieces that if anything were to happen to them within the first 2 years, we hope you would send it back to us and you will receive back a brand new timepieces as a reimbursement for your troubles. The warranty includes internal parts.

 

Vision of Ledesma Timepieces

Our vision for Ledesma timepieces is to have a full-line of timepieces for both the modern men and women, which will stay at an affordable price without having to sacrifice the quality, or beauty of the timepiece. We want to break through the inflation that brands with big names have created with our innovation.

 

How did Ledesma Timepieces start?

Our founder Victor Ledesma is a watch enthusiast since his grandfather introduced him to timepieces. He believes that a watch is the only accessory that a man can truly wear everyday; a watch is a man’s signature piece, something that people identify you with. In the last couple of years a lamentable shift has happened, watches have disappeared from the men’s wrist being replaced with smartphones all due to the high prices that name brands have created. Ledesma Timepieces has the mission to break through the inflation and bring watches to the modern mans wrist. A watch is much more than telling time, it symbolizes much more than a smartphone ever will. A watch reminds you that time is constantly slipping away so you better get living!

 

Watch specifications:

  • Case Material: 316L Stainless steel
  • Case Diameter: 40mm
  • Band Options: 316L Carbon Stainless Steel or Genuine Leather
  • Band Length: 24mm
  • Movement: Quartz Japanese Montoya
  • Date function: Yes
  • Waterproof:  5 ATM

 

Help Us Bring This Project To Life!

Ledesma Timepieces is just a dream without your support; we need your help in order to bring this project to life.  Not only does this mean by pleading one of our amazing timepieces, but by sharing the story with a friend, family member, neighbors, everyone!  

We are going to do everything we can in order to bring this project to life; we will spread the word in a variety of ways. We hope that social media and blogs will bring enough attention to our page and that it will help our product grow. You could help us by tweeting, liking our Facebook page or following us on Instagram. We need your support! Simply click on the Facebook, Twitter or Instagram icon at the top!

story:
Lanuvelvag non vuole solo essere una nuova linea di abbigliamento, ma un progetto pensato e sviluppato per combattere la discriminazione femminile. Parte dei proventi raccolti durante questa campagna di crowdfunding verrà, infatti, devoluta a DoppiaDifesa Onlus, in favore delle sue attività a sostegno delle vittime di violenza.

Quanti tabù, luoghi comuni e cliché vengono ancora oggi associati alla vagina? Lanuvelvag si propone di rispondere alla paura con il colore: per questo il simbolo di tutta la linea sarà un tratto grafico iconico e minimale che ricorda l’apparato genitale femminile, in modo semplice e mai volgare, estremamente pop. Crediamo che la migliore arma contro l’ignoranza non sia un’arma, ma l’ironia.

Se è vero che la vagina è la cosa più naturale del mondo, perché non indossarla?

Caratteristiche differenziali del prodotto saranno l’attenzione per la qualità - le nostre t-shirt sono tutte Made in Italy in cotone biologico 100% - e l’altissimo livello di personalizzazione: non c’è vag che sia uguale a un’altra, proprio come le persone. Sì, rispettiamo le diversità!

Avremo, quindi, vag monocromatiche, ma anche grafiche, disegnate, illustrate. Lanuvelvag è favorevole alla “fantasia libera” e per questo aprirà collaborazioni sia con artisti affermati che con giovani emergenti, con l’obiettivo di inserire sempre nuove vag nelle sue collezioni.








































Essendo anche un brand democratico per sua natura e digital oriented,  Lanuvelvag lancerà contest stagionali aperti a tutti, attraverso cui gli utenti potranno proporre le loro opere (di disegno, pittura, illustrazione, fotografia…) alla community del sito così che le più votate entreranno in produzione.

Abbiamo grandi progetti per il futuro, ma andremo per step, condividendo ogni passo con voi.



Con questa raccolta fondi Lanuvelvag potrà diventare una Srl e iniziare la produzione della sua prima linea di abbigliamento, che verrà distribuita tramite un sito di e-commerce, un’applicazione per smartphone e tablet, un temporary store e una rete capillare di negozi per la rivendita sul territorio. Con questa raccolta fondi Lanuvelvag potrà, anche, fare del bene: oltre a donare il 15% del budget a DoppiaDifesa Onlus, proseguiremo la nostra finalità charity individuando diverse associazioni a cui donare in maniera continuativa parte dei proventi derivanti dalla futura attività commerciale.

Lanuvelvag è un progetto nato ad aprile di quest’anno dalle menti di sei creativi provenienti da diversi mondi - la grafica, la scrittura, la moda, l’editoria - ma tutti digital oriented e uniti da forti idee comuni.




Vogliamo ringraziare tutti gli influencer che ci stanno aiutando a diffondere il progetto e contribuire così al lancio del brand e al supporto di DoppiaDifesa Onlus.
 Andrea Sartori - Videomaker
 Elenonora Sabet - Ph
 Daiana Lou - Music
 Clizia Incorvaia - Model
 Elena Bonamico - Model
 Michela Bertuletti - Model
 Filippo Tabbi - Model
 Lorenzo Carone
 Marco Avvisati - Model
 Le Donatella - Influencer
 Nina Palmieri - Influencer 
 Arisa - Influencer
 Ilaria Rastrelli - Influencer
 Giulia Luzi - Influencer
 Sara Puccinelli - Influencer
 Juri Bavaresco - Influencer
 Nico Morani - Influencer
 Sem&Stènn - Influencer
 Marco Specchia - Influncer 
 Roberta Riccio - Influencer
 Denise D'Angelilli - Influencer
 Luana Abroad - Blogger
 Alessandro Malossi - Designer
 Mattia Distaso - Illustrator
 Serena Gianoli - Illustrator
 Danipas - Illustrator
 Alessandro Razzini - Illustrator
 Francesco Caporale - Illustrator
 Marco Del Santo - Composer
 Pick Up The Vinyl - Radio
 Nuova Elgo - Official supplier
 LAeX - Event Planner
 Arvi's - Hairstylist
 Feodora Make-Up Artist

Lanuvelvag non poteva che essere super-iper-extra-social! Vi aspettiamo sui nostri profili per scambiare idee e opinioni!
www.lanuvelvag.it 
  



Per aiutarvi nella scelta delle taglie, vi riportiamo di seguito le schede con le misure di tutti i prodotti disponibili come perks. Se avete ulteriori dubbi o domande mandateci una mail a hello@lanuvelvag.it e vi risponderemo il prima possibile.
