Se avete ulteriori dubbi o domande mandateci una mail a hello@lanuvelvag.it e vi risponderemo il prima possibile.

story:
Our concept for Deadly Kittens was simple:  Create a quality pair of sunglasses that are sleek & stylish, yet very durable, but without the outrageously high price tag.  To accomplish this we reinforced everything we could by using hinges with more barrels, a thicker acetate frame, and glass polarized lenses.  The design we created is our take on the classic sexy cat eye style and the results turned out to be deadly...(cute).

From when you first pick up your pair of Deadly Kittens sunglasses, you'll immediately notice how solid they look & feel.  Along with how much lighter they are than expected, and surprised with how well they fit when you put them on.  All of this before you even start enjoying the view they provide.

Estimated time frame for shipping rewards to our backers of Deadly Kittens is May. This includes changes that may be made to the prototypes. We are in close contact with our manufacturers that have years of experience. They will provide photos and updates on the production and it's status. We will in turn provide these to our backers.

Thank you for looking at our crowdfunder! If you like us we would be very grateful if you'd spread the word. We are a group comprised of friends & family with a passion for creativity & design. We hope to establish ourselves with this first endeavor, and look forward to pursuing other projects in the future.

story:
Introducing TRELAWEAR

 

The first fashionable PERS accessory.

TRELAWEAR is the first attractive personal emergency response system (PERS) accessory. With the push of a button, you’ll have access to help if you need it. Our goal is for women to maintain an independent lifestyle with safety and style.

 

Utilizing the latest technologies in mobile device and jewelry design, TRELAWEAR is beautiful, fashion jewelry, not just a PERS device. Women no longer have to choose between safety and style. 

 

On trend fashion

TRELAWEAR pendants feature hand-cut faceted resin stones available in five different colors and two of the most popular pendant shapes: cushion or round. The pendant case and necklace chain are offered in silver colored or yellow gold finishes.

Designed and crafted by fashion experts

TRELAWEAR was founded and designed by executives from the jewelry, watch and fashion industries. The jewelry is crafted by renowned jewelry manufacturers who produce collections for some of the biggest brands in the world, including Coach and Kate Spade.

 

Partnered with the best

For the initial launch of TRELAWEAR, we have partnered with MobileHelp, one of America’s leading provider of emergency response technology. Each TRELAWEAR necklace pairs with a MobileHelp DUO or Classic monitoring system to provide 24/7/365 emergency help through a home and/or mobile base station with accompanying monitoring service. 

Your TRELAWEAR purchase comes with the equivalent of two (2) free months of monitoring service, which can be applied to the subscription plan that’s right for you. TRELAWEAR utilizes FCC-certified RFID technology designed by leading engineers within the PERS industry.

 

Quality that lasts

TRELAWEAR comes with a limited one-year warranty on all manufacturing defects. TRELAWEAR batteries come with our limited three-year warranty. When needed, the battery can be replaced. No need for charging! You will be alerted by MobileHelp when the battery is running low.

 

How it Works

Using TRELAWEAR is simple! At a time of emergency, simply push the button located on the back of the TRELAWEAR pendant. This button is paired with the MobileHelp base station (Classic subscriptions) or base station and mobile device (DUO subscriptions), which will send an emergency notification to the  24/7/365 U.S.-based emergency response center. A trained emergency operator will contact you through the base station or mobile device to determine how best to help you. If required, emergency personnel will be dispatched to the location based on GPS technology and family members will be notified.

The TRELAWEAR pendant pairs wirelessly with the MobileHelp equipment. In order for the pendant to work out of your home, the mobile device (part of the DUO subscription plan) is required.

TRELAWEAR pendants come with care card and instructions to assist you in the set-up process. Calling the number on the card will connect you with MobileHelp operators, who will guide you through the simple process of pairing TRELAWEAR pendant. A representative based in the United States will ensure your device is successfully working.

While wearing your pendant, if you happen to accidentally push the button and initiate an emergency call, no need to panic. The operator that answers will assess the situation. If there is no emergency, the operator will not send an emergency response to your location.

When you purchase a TRELAWEAR pendant, you will receive the following:

  • 1 TRELAWEAR necklace, packaged in a beautiful box
  • Care card and instructions for pairing your pendant
  • 1 qty Home Base Station (Classic or DUO subscription plan)
  • 1 qty Mobile Station/Device (DUO subscription plan)

To ensure your TRELAWEAR can access emergency help, you will also need to contact MobileHelp at 800-805-5349 and place an order for a Classic monitoring plan (with a Home Base Station only) or the DUO monitoring plan (with Home Base and Mobile Device). After you receive your equipment from MobileHelp, you will be able to pair the TRELAWEAR pendant so that it works with MobileHelp devices.


Specifications

Sally Pendant (Square) 

Chain length: 30-inches, with a 2-inch extender 
Case dimensions: (LxWxD)  34.5mm x 34.5 x 15mm or 1.3 inches x 1.3 inches x .6 inches
Weight: 62 grams / 2.2 ounce
Battery life: 3 years 

Lilly Pendant (Round) 

Chain length: 30-inches, with a 2-inch extender 
Case dimensions: (LxWxD)  33.5mm x 33.55 x 15mm or 1.3 inches x 1.3 inches x .6 inches
Weight: 53 grams / 1.8 ounce 
Battery life: 3 years 

 

Our Story

TRELAWEAR began as a passion project aimed at solving an issue that hit close to home. Mara Perlmutter, Co-Founder of TRELAWEAR, set out to address her mom's question when she refused to wear a generic PERS device, "Mara you have been in the jewelry business over 25 years, can't you make me one that is beautiful to wear?"  As a seasoned fashion and jewelry executive, Mara knew she had the expertise to make this happen. 

Mara partnered with long-time colleague Anthony Pucci, an executive from the watch and jewelry industry. With Anthony’s past experiences in smartwatches and wearable devices, along with family concerns of his own grandmother, the two founded TRELAWEAR. They have spent the past two years crafting a product they would be proud to share with their family and friends.  To honor their family members that inspired TRELAWEAR, the cushion-shaped pendant was named Sally, after Mara’s mother; and the round-shaped pendant named Lilly, after Anthony’s grandmother. 

 

The Team

Mara Perlmutter: With 30+ years experience, beginning as a buyer for Saks Fifth Avenue to Group President at Jones Jewelry Group, Mara is a leader and expert in the design, development, and retail of luxury and contemporary fashion jewelry accessories. She has led merchandising and design for global brands including Givenchy, Anne Klein, French Connection, Laundry by Shelli Segal, Judith Jack, 9West, Isaac Mizrahi and Christian Siriano. Based upon her vast experience Mara inspired the designs and development of the TRELAWEAR collection. 

Anthony Pucci:  With 15+ years experience, Anthony has specialized in launching new brands and product lines within the jewelry and watch industry. From developing marketing plans and creative, to retail and wholesale rollouts, his experience has helped create the internal and external execution of TRELAWEAR. His most notable launches of watches include MOMO Design, Officina Del Tempo, Tommy Hilfiger, Juicy Couture, and jewelry: Rebecca, Roasto, Calgaro, and Oscar de la Renta. 

 

Why We’re Here...

We’ve spent the last two years designing, prototyping, and testing TRELAWEAR pendants to the point where we are confident in gifting them to the women we love. We’re FCC certified and have partnered with the best in the business. 

Now we’re ready for production. To appeal to a wide audience, our goal is to offer our collections at accessible price points. To accomplish this we must purchase materials in bulk and manufacture in quantity. With your help, we can deliver our beautiful pendants at compelling prices so women everywhere can wear our unique PERS accessory. 

We appreciate your support.  Please share this campaign with your family and friends, offering the perfect gift of safety with style.

Share on:

Facebook | LinkedIn | Twitter | Google Plus

story:
Rediscover Your Freedom

Spending an evening on the town, riding your bike, or conducting a meeting in the office, you want to know that you can be yourself. You want people to perceive you a certain way, and to accomplish that, you need to put some thought and energy into your overall look, paying attention to all the minor details. You want to be able to wear something that expresses your personality completely, and you want to be able to move about freely, never worrying about anything embarrassing – anything like, say, a stray tampon string. The last thing that you need is to realize hours later that you have presented an image of yourself that is not in line with your image of yourself.

 

 

Introducing: Hidden Note Strips

Until now, it has been nearly impossible to guarantee that you could hide away your tampon string effectively throughout the entire day. The best that you could do is hope that it would not come loose or flap around. We, however, did not think that was enough. We demanded something more – reliability unlike any you have ever seen before.

 

Toward that end, we have created Hidden Note Strips. These are waterproof adhesive strips that measure approximately an inch in length and that keep your tampon string in place, making stray tampon strings a thing of the past.

 

       

How They Work

Hidden Note Strips are easy to use. To get started, you simply press your tampon string against the adhesive side of the Hidden Note Strip, folding along the perforations to hold the string in place. You then stick the Hidden Note Strip and the string to your skin, where our medical-grade adhesive keeps everything together safely and consistently. This ensures that there will be no blush-worthy slip-ups, also optimizing your hygiene by stabilizing your tampon string for you.

 

 

Words of Encouragement

On the non-adhesive side of every Hidden Note Strip, there is an inspiring or motivational message, including words like "love," "hope," and "life." This way, you get a boost of encouragement any time you apply a new Hidden Note Strip, folding the adhesive over the strip and then reading the message while you are putting it on. In this way, Hidden Note Strips are there to support you in more ways than one – both practically and emotionally. As you hit the middle of the work day or find yourself preparing for a tense meeting, the message you read on your Hidden Note Strip may just be exactly what you need to see.

 

 

Work to Date

Hidden Note Strips are the first products of their kind to hit the market. This is something that women have needed, and yet by and large, it is something that has remained wholly unavailable. Fostering confidence, comfort, and innovation, we are proud to bring this empowering female hygiene product to store shelves both in-person and online, and we are even running our own e-commerce website – FtheString.com. Developing and testing Hidden Note Strips extensively, we are ready to move forward as soon as we hit our funding goal.

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

This is where you come into the picture. Our goal through this campaign is to raise $ 14,477.00, which will cover the costs of manufacturing, marketing, and distributing the initial run of Hidden Note Strips. Because this is such a groundbreaking product, we know that it may take some time for women to understand its value. To solve that, we will invest as much of our capital as possible into a promotional campaign.

 

To say thanks to everyone who makes a contribution to this campaign, we are offering both discounts on Hidden Note Strips and sassy F the String-branded merchandise.

Make your contribution and help us launch Hidden Note Strips now!

 

 

Our Plans for the Future

The way that we see it, Hidden Note Strips are the firsts in a long line of female hygiene products that we are going to develop and sell. We have seen multiple areas where women's needs have gone unmet, the technology of female hygiene products lagging sadly behind its true potential. While we are focusing on Hidden Note Strips exclusively for now, we are going to expand our product line as soon as we have hit our first sales goals.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

The most daunting challenge that we face as we launch Hidden Note Strips is outreach. Women are used to doing things a certain way, and even though Hidden Note Strips solve problems that all women face, it may take them some time to see the value of what we are offering. We are confident that we can communicate this value as long as we work at it, though.

 

If we encounter any other logistical issues, we will figure out a way forward, providing our contributors with regular updates on our progress.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

In addition to making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for Hidden Note Strips by sharing a link to this campaign on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people are aware of what we are doing, the smoother this product launch will go. Make sure that you tell all the women in your life what we have created. They will thank you later!

 

We appreciate all your support, both monetary and otherwise.

Live your life on your own terms from here on out – your Hidden Note Strips always in your pocket!

story:
Tired of removing your pets tracker to charge it every other day?

We were too, so we developed a modern solution.

 The Scout4

 

- S4P device attached to the S4P collar -

 

The Leash Charges It!

The Sun and Light Charge It!

24/7 Health monitoring and Location!

No need to take it off to charge constantly!

Easily clips to your existing collar, harness, or vest!

Easy to use App!

 Peace of Mind!

 

- S4P Device attached to the quick locking clip for versatile placement -

Our story -

The Scout 4 has been a passion of ours for many years. 

S4P was born after I lost Ty (my min-pin) to a car accident after he made his way out the front door one warm summer day. His tracking device was spotty regarding his exact location and the battery ended up dying before we could locate him. A few days later we found him on the side of the road near our home (I truly believe to this day he was making his way back to us). Sadly, he had passed away. Heartbroken and upset I swore to never lose another fluffy best friend. If I only had a location device that the battery lasted the few days while he was lost I could have found him, I could have saved him.

After educating myself on all available pet trackers I quickly realized that battery life was a huge issue. That the industry as a whole has had no-real innovation in the last twenty years. It has remained stagnant with no change in concepts and designs.

 

Why?

 

  1. Why are these devices still so big?
  2. Why can't we place current device's where we want to place them on our family fluffs?
  3. Why do the batteries not last more than a few days?  
  4. Why is it so hard to place on and take off for charging? Why are we charging so often?
  5. Why do they not have any type of LED light source for night location?
  6. Why do the available devices not charge themselves if our fluff gets loose for more than 48 hours (2 days)?
  7. Why does the number of pets going lost or missing continue to rise given the increase in the number of pet tracker's available on the market?

The answers were quite simple - 

With current market saturation no-one has taken the time to improve existing devices or implement change. Here at Scout4 we did just that. We have developed the most modern, innovative, and versatile pet location and health monitoring device available.

 

- Initial concept sketches -

 

The Scout4 offers many unique properties in our favor - 

  1. It never needs removed for charging when the complete S4P kit is purchased.
  2. The proprietary leash charges the device as you walk your pet.
  3. The device's home dock communicates with your S4P device and S4P smart phone app.
  4. The device can be placed on a collar, harness, or other pet wearables of the pet parent's choosing via the quick clip.
  5. The S4P is small in size, big on power, and available in multiple colors.
  6. The solar panel trickle charges the device 24/7 (great for fluffs who are lost for long periods).
  7. The S4P device has a built-in Strobe light which you can activate via the app. Making it perfect for finding your fluff in the dark.​
  8. Your S4P device can easily slide in and lock to the harness, collar or quick clip in seconds. 
  9. Unmatched Versatility - Clip your Scout4 anywhere -  The S4P comes with a locking quick clip - Clip it to your existing collar, vest, or harness, Yes anywhere you want it. Can be used to locate and monitor all pet types.
 

 

DEVICE DIMENSIONS -

Size:  1.5" x 1.3/4" x 5/8"  very small

Weight:  0.75 oz / 22 grams

Shockproof:  Tougher than a otter-box

Waterproof:  Up to 2 m (6 feet) immersion depth

Rechargeable LiPo battery:  Up to four months (Depending on light source and leash use)

Communication range:  Up to 10 miles or closest cell tower range

LED's:  LED battery read out w/function indicator. Strobe activation for night location via app

High precision GPS/Cellular:  Average error 1.5 - 4 meters

 

- S4P CAD Internal view -

 

SMARTPHONE APP -

iPhone 5+

iOS 9+

Android 5.0+

- S4P mobile app -

 

 - Mom with Daisy girl displaying the S4P device, harness, and charging leash -

 

About the founder -

Tom is a veteran, designer, and builder. He is one of the most passionate people when it comes to helping others and our loving family pets. He is insanely driven to obtain his goals. He has spent the last few years educating himself in all things hardware while designing and building this amazing yet simple pet device. Tom is also the poppa to four loving fluffs. Daisy, Napoleon, Andy, and Sandy. They are our world and best friends. They are also the models for the Scout4 Device lineup. Tom has devoted the last few years to his passion. With your help it will become a reality.

He also looks forward to growing the Scout4 team over the next year.

We as a team are excited about the opportunity to become the most innovative group of designers, builders, and marketers the pet market has ever seen.

Please join us as we revolutionize an entire industry.

 

 

Where you can help -

We have bootstrapped the entire Scout4 startup. This is our first campaign. We have no large corporate partners, VC's, or equity partners. Every penny we have invested in the design and development of the Scout4 is from our savings. Our goal is to make sure we decrease the number of pets lost or reported missing each year (80+M/yr or 24K/day US alone) which sadly keeps rising. To us it's worth every second we get closer to providing a modern, user-friendly, affordable, health and location device.

A device that provides pet families peace of mind. 

Your backing and contributions will allow us to continue to build an amazing company aimed at helping loving family pets.

 

- S4P Leash and Wall Mount Home Dock -

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

At Scout we are asking for the following:

  • We have set a goal of $10,000.00 for our first crowdfunding venture. This amount will allow us to continue building working prototypes, test them, and market them for our second crowdfunding round. Funds raised over $10,000.00 will be used for the buildout of our devices (tooling, manufacturing, inventory, shipping etc.) and our late 2020 company launch.
  • As a backer and supporter you will not only get the perk you chose, but you will become a part of the S4P family. Your name will forever be a part of our startup story and placed in our future headquarters on our "those who built us wall".
  • If our goal is not reached then all funds received will be used to fulfill the requested perks along with continued product development.

 

- Ty dabbing in doggy heaven -

 

The Impact

 

Your contributions and purchases will make a difference for millions of pets and pet owners worldwide.

  • Whether your a pet family or just want to support our cause you will have the satisfaction of knowing you helped build an amazing company whose sole purpose is to keep our family fluffs healthy, and from being lost forever.
  • Together we can decrease the 80+ million pets that are reported lost or missing each year in the US alone. That's roughly 24 thousand reports a day (globally the number is in the billions). We will also cut down on crowded animal shelters and pet euthanasia.
  • Let's do this together, We need your help and greatly appreciate the support. Any amount contributed gets us closer to our goal of saving lost fluffs worldwide. 

 

 

- With pet ownership on the rise it's easy to see why MODERN devices are needed to decrease the number of lost and missing pets in the US -

 

- Our Timeline -

 

February, 2020 Crowdfunding Start ~ April 1st, 2020 Crowdfunding Ends

May, 2020 Final Version Ready ~ Tooling Kick-Off

July, 2020 Sample Run ~ August - Certification

September, 2020 Start Mass Production ~ November - Shipping

December/January, 2021 Crowdfunding Phase 2 Company Launch

 

- 1st Prototype build out -

 

Risks & Challenges

 

Of course a new bootstrapped hardware wearable is not developed over night. We have dedicated the last two years to Scouts design buildout before introducing it to you.

The Proof of Concept (POC), Design for Manufacture (DFM), Cost of Goods Sold (COG's), Bill of Material (BOM), Schematic layouts for the PCB boards design, Minimum Viable Product (MVP) buildout, Total addressable Market (TAM's) analysis, software, and app have all been calculated  tested and built. 

Here at S4P we pride ourselves on transparency. You will receive monthly updates on where your S4P device is in the process. We aim to get them to your door before Christmas.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

I know some of you can't contribute monetarily, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  •  We would be grateful if you could spread the word and make some noise about Scout4 Pets. As mentioned above I am bootstrapping with no corporate backing, equity investors, VC's, or co-founders, so the more visibility we get the better off we will be with achieving our goal.
  • Please let your friends and family know about us and don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word as well.

 

- Sandy and Andy with S4P prototypes -

 

 

From the S4P family to yours,

We humbly thank you.
story_txt:
Tired of removing your pets tracker to charge it every other day? 
We were too, so we developed a modern solution.
 The Scout4
 

- S4P device attached to the S4P collar -
 
The Leash Charges It!
The Sun and Light Charge It!
24/7 Health monitoring and Location!
No need to take it off to charge constantly!
Easily clips to your existing collar, harness, or vest!
Easy to use App!
 Peace of Mind!
 

- S4P Device attached to the quick locking clip for versatile placement -
Our story -
The Scout 4 has been a passion of ours for many years. 
S4P was born after I lost Ty (my min-pin) to a car accident after he made his way out the front door one warm summer day. His tracking device was spotty regarding his exact location and the battery ended up dying before we could locate him. A few days later we found him on the side of the road near our home (I truly believe to this day he was making his way back to us). Sadly, he had passed away. Heartbroken and upset I swore to never lose another fluffy best friend. If I only had a location device that the battery lasted the few days while he was lost I could have found him, I could have saved him.
After educating myself on all available pet trackers I quickly realized that battery life was a huge issue. That the industry as a whole has had no-real innovation in the last twenty years. It has remained stagnant with no change in concepts and designs.
 
Why?
 

Why are these devices still so big? 
Why can't we place current device's where we want to place them on our family fluffs? 
Why do the batteries not last more than a few days?  
Why is it so hard to place on and take off for charging? Why are we charging so often?
Why do they not have any type of LED light source for night location?
Why do the available devices not charge themselves if our fluff gets loose for more than 48 hours (2 days)?
Why does the number of pets going lost or missing continue to rise given the increase in the number of pet tracker's available on the market?

The answers were quite simple - 
With current market saturation no-one has taken the time to improve existing devices or implement change. Here at Scout4 we did just that. We have developed the most modern, innovative, and versatile pet location and health monitoring device available.
 

- Initial concept sketches -
 
The Scout4 offers many unique properties in our favor - 

It never needs removed for charging when the complete S4P kit is purchased.
The proprietary leash charges the device as you walk your pet.
The device's home dock communicates with your S4P device and S4P smart phone app.
The device can be placed on a collar, harness, or other pet wearables of the pet parent's choosing via the quick clip.
The S4P is small in size, big on power, and available in multiple colors.
The solar panel trickle charges the device 24/7 (great for fluffs who are lost for long periods).
The S4P device has a built-in Strobe light which you can activate via the app. Making it perfect for finding your fluff in the dark.​
Your S4P device can easily slide in and lock to the harness, collar or quick clip in seconds. 
Unmatched Versatility - Clip your Scout4 anywhere -  The S4P comes with a locking quick clip - Clip it to your existing collar, vest, or harness, Yes anywhere you want it. Can be used to locate and monitor all pet types.

 


 

DEVICE DIMENSIONS -
Size:  1.5" x 1.3/4" x 5/8"  very small
Weight:  0.75 oz / 22 grams
Shockproof:  Tougher than a otter-box
Waterproof:  Up to 2 m (6 feet) immersion depth
Rechargeable LiPo battery:  Up to four months (Depending on light source and leash use)
Communication range:  Up to 10 miles or closest cell tower range
LED's:  LED battery read out w/function indicator. Strobe activation for night location via app
High precision GPS/Cellular:  Average error 1.5 - 4 meters
 

- S4P CAD Internal view -
 
SMARTPHONE APP -
iPhone 5+
iOS 9+
Android 5.0+

- S4P mobile app -
 

 - Mom with Daisy girl displaying the S4P device, harness, and charging leash -

story:
1.  Introducing the new Carbon Fiber Chicago Combs!

Earlier this decade, Chicago Comb revolutionized the comb market by introducing the first modern metal hair combs.  Now we've developed the first professional grade Carbon Fiber combs made in America -- ultra high-quality combs designed for everyone to use.

The new Model 1 Carbon Fiber is based on the patented design of our acclaimed original Model 1 comb.  This revolutionary design has a loop at the end to hold the comb while combing the hair, or to hang up the comb after use.  At 5.5 inches (14 cm) long with medium-fine teeth, it's the perfect comb for everyday use and easily fits in your pocket or travel bag.

The new Model 6 Carbon Fiber is an all-new design with an elegantly curved shape and both fine and wide teeth.  At 7 inches (17.8 cm) long, it's the perfect comb for your everyday styling.  And it's even versatile enough to be used by professional barbers, such as Bobby Price, the renowned Chicago barber featured in our video.

2.  These are the best combs you've ever used

There are a lot of problems with traditional plastic hair combs.  One concern is that many of them are made of cheap plastic which uses sketchy chemicals such as formaldehyde as a main component.  Customers often aren't even aware of this until they develop a skin allergy or other problem.

Our new combs are made of an ultra high quality carbon fiber composite manufactured to the highest standards of quality and safety.  An added benefit is that carbon fiber is also naturally anti-static, unlike traditional plastic combs which can give you unpleasant "static shock."  These new combs are also heat- and chemical-resistant, unlike regular combs, and are far more durable. 

Because carbon fiber has such amazing qualities, it is also used in professional grade applications from luxury cars to high-end sporting equipment and aerospace.

Another problem with traditional plastic combs is poor design and manufacturing practices which results in a cheap product that can damage your hair.  Our new combs are designed with more gently rounded tips and surfaces, so the comb won't scratch your head or pull on your hair like cheap combs do.  We've also spent extensive time perfecting the manufacturing processes to ensure the combs have amazing finish quality.

Like all our products, these new combs are 100% made in USA.

3.  What we're using the funds for

Your pledge to the Indiegogo campaign will help fund the cost of manufacturing and marketing these cutting edge Carbon Fiber combs.  All of the combs are in stock and being shipped now!

4.  You can support this campaign with confidence, as we've been making the world's finest combs combs since 2011

Chicago Combs are sold in dozens of countries worldwide and have been featured GQ, Men's Journal, Allure, ABC News, CBS News, Art of Manliness, Monocle, the Chicago Sun-Times, and many other publications.  Chicago Comb has also been a two-time finalist for the Martha Stewart American Made award, and in 2018 was the only company to receive the New Exporter Award from the Governor of Illinois!

story:
Shoe shopping is supposed to be a fun activity for women to do together, however some women who experience edema as a symptom of other conditions (such as diabetes, arthritis, treatment of cancer or circulatory and vascular conditions) can find it to be a discouraging and strenuous journey.

Everyone deserves to have shoes that fit, and Pandere™ makes sure that every woman feels confident and comfortable in their shoes. Pandere™ shoes encompass comfort, style, and expandability all in a pair of shoes that fit to YOU!

Typical expandable footwear allows for wiggle room in only one to two areas of the shoe, whereas Pandere's patented shoes offer expandability in three areas of the shoe. Customize your shoes in the toebox, midfoot, and even the ankle and heel to reach ultimate levels of comfort. These shoes expand up to 1.5 shoe sizes in width and volume!

Some days our feet just aren’t the same size, and now you have the ability to expand each shoe to fit each unique foot.

Most expandable and comfortable shoes are unattractive and resemble something that we might find in our grandma’s closet. Pandere shoes come in a variety of colors and designs to fit different styles, personalities and occasions.

Pandere's patented shoes are made with incredibly supportive and comfortable neoprene--it’s even strategically located in all the right places to accommodate feet of all shapes and sizes. They adjust to your feet instead of your feet adjusting to them. Our insoles are even constructed with orthotic support.

Found your perfect “sole-mates” already? Pandere’s footwear allows you to remove and replace the soles with your own customized orthotics to give you the maximum comfort possible. Pandere footwear doesn’t constrict your feet or your individual style.

We’ve worked tirelessly and endlessly to bring the most stylish, yet comfortable shoes to women to help you get back not only your confidence and style, but also your life!

Pandere's patented shoes are designed to expand in key places where traditional shoe shapes and sizes tend to disappoint. One of the trickiest parts of designing an expandable shoe is retaining support and structure. Expansion and support are often in conflict with each other. Pandere has developed a shoe that both expands and supports.

We decided to choose Portugal as our place to start manufacturing because the country has a rich and wonderful history of making beautiful and high-quality hand crafted shoes. So we thought, “Where else but here?”

Our shoes are manufactured at a facility that makes diabetic and comfort shoes. Our outsoles are made of a lightweight flexible performance rubber compound with a traction grip bottom and anti-skid properties. They offer the comfort and flexibility that women all around the world have been craving from a supportive pair of shoes.

Finding shoes has been a lifelong struggle for founder Laura Oden. She has had lymphedema for almost 40 years. Edema, diabetes, pregnancy, arthritis and a host of other conditions can cause one or both feet to swell. Turns out millions of women experience this struggle daily, and it’s time to do something about it.

We turned to Kickstarter and Indiegogo because we saw ourselves on the leading edge of something that could impact millions of lives all over the world. We believe Pandere shoes will restore dignity, comfort and mobility to people with hard-to-fit feet. We’ve heard the stories and silent struggles of women all around the world with this problem. We decided it was time to give them a voice, and let them be heard.

 

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make Pandere a reality.

We know that not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase a pair of Pandere shoes, if you’re a supporter of Pandere, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

story:
What is MAGMUS?

MAGMUS is Portable Magnetic Key Ring Holder, made from the stongest rare earth magnet, that you can take with you anywhere you go 



Magmus is one of my personal projects that I recorded in my book of Ideas. If you often get frustrated with taking your car keys in and out from the pocket of your jeans like me, then I think Magmus is the solution for you.


How to use it?
Using Magmus is SO easy, slide the base setter of the Magmus in the pocket of your jeans and attach the Alpha piece on the outside of your jeans. The magnetic force will secure your key rings and more.

PERKS for Indiegogo Contributors


Why MAGMUS?
- MAGMUS is small, super light and super strong! 
- MAGMUS is made from the strongest rare earth magnet so we guarantee that your keys will not fall unless you pull it away 
- MAGMUS Setter is specially designed to support the impact of its magnetic force. 
- MAGMUS thickness is just 3 mm, you won't even feel it it was there when you put it inside your pocket
- MAGMUS can be worn as a fashion statement while being super functional! 
- Neodymium magnet in MAGMUS is considered to be the strongest & most permanent magnet known to man and not something you use just once, it will be with you the rest of your life :) 
- MAGMUS looks cool on you!


Magmus is made from the strongest rare earth magnet and we added a triple coating to make it even more durable and strong, I designed Magmus to have a simple look, but really pushed on the quality & functionality aspect.


Some people might ask why not just buy 2 magnets to put in your jeans.... Sure you can do that, but you won't be able to find just any magnet that will ensure a superior grip like Magmus.


The more people know about MAGMUS, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we'll be able to make MAGMUS! We can't do this without you!

Click Here ==> Share on Facebook <== Click Here

Click Here ==> Share on Twitter <== Click Here



International Backers 
This project isn't just for backers in the United States. We'll be shipping MAGMUS worldwide!

Final thoughts from creator
"Let us start 2017 with changing the way we carry our keys, say bye-bye to the tight jeans pocket and say hello to MAGMUS! As much I'd love for everyone to try Magmus please always be careful when handling super strong magnets and read the following warnings before you back this project" - Jhon M

1. Neodymium Magnet has a super strong pull force, please use caution and common sense when using Magmus
2. Individuals with health issues which require that they wear electronics of any sort like pacemakers, defibrillators or other internal and external medical devices should never use Magmus
3. Magmus is not a toy! KEEP AWAY from children
4. These magnets are powerful and can accelerate at high speeds toward each other. Fingers and other body parts can get severely pinched between two attracting Magmus magnets, please use it with caution!

We cannot do this without your help, please help us share THANK YOU!
story_txt: What is MAGMUS?MAGMUS is Portable Magnetic Key Ring Holder, made from the stongest rare earth magnet, that you can take with you anywhere you go Magmus is one of my personal projects that I recorded in my book of Ideas. If you often get frustrated with taking your car keys in and out from the pocket of your jeans like me, then I think Magmus is the solution for you.How to use it?Using Magmus is SO easy, slide the base setter of the Magmus in the pocket of your jeans and attach the Alpha piece on the outside of your jeans. The magnetic force will secure your key rings and more.PERKS for Indiegogo Contributors Why MAGMUS?- MAGMUS is small, super light and super strong! - MAGMUS is made from the strongest rare earth magnet so we guarantee that your keys will not fall unless you pull it away - MAGMUS Setter is specially designed to support the impact of its magnetic force. - MAGMUS thickness is just 3 mm, you won't even feel it it was there when you put it inside your pocket- MAGMUS can be worn as a fashion statement while being super functional! - Neodymium magnet in MAGMUS is considered to be the strongest & most permanent magnet known to man and not something you use just once, it will be with you the rest of your life :) - MAGMUS looks cool on you!Magmus is made from the strongest rare earth magnet and we added a triple coating to make it even more durable and strong, I designed Magmus to have a simple look, but really pushed on the quality & functionality aspect.Some people might ask why not just buy 2 magnets to put in your jeans.... Sure you can do that, but you won't be able to find just any magnet that will ensure a superior grip like Magmus.The more people know about MAGMUS, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we'll be able to make MAGMUS! We can't do this without you!Click Here ==> Share on Facebook <== Click HereClick Here ==> Share on Twitter <== Click HereInternational Backers This project isn't just for backers in the United States. We'll be shipping MAGMUS worldwide!Final thoughts from creator"Let us start 2017 with changing the way we carry our keys, say bye-bye to the tight jeans pocket and say hello to MAGMUS! As much I'd love for everyone to try Magmus please always be careful when handling super strong magnets and read the following warnings before you back this project" - Jhon M1. Neodymium Magnet has a super strong pull force, please use caution and common sense when using Magmus2. Individuals with health issues which require that they wear electronics of any sort like pacemakers, defibrillators or other internal and external medical devices should never use Magmus3. Magmus is not a toy! KEEP AWAY from children4. These magnets are powerful and can accelerate at high speeds toward each other. Fingers and other body parts can get severely pinched between two attracting Magmus magnets, please use it with caution!We cannot do this without your help, please help us share THANK YOU!

story:
When you purchase an O2 Nano Mask, you can breathe easier knowing you are safer to go out, while protecting the environment and uplifting somebody in need.

As a locally-based materials science engineering and sustainable manufacturing brand, we want to mobilize our full manufacturing capacity and deliver to our community meaningful value.

To do so, we have created a product we love, simultaneous giving back to our community.

The O2 Nano Mask is designed with the environment and reusability in mind. Our mask is machine washable and tumble dry safe. It’s intricately constructed to be worn time and time again.

Both the PET and the innermost layer of the filter are recyclable. When it’s time to change out the filter, simply recycle as directed in your community's local recycling ♻️ guidelines.

The O2 Nano Mask filtration system features a two-layer mask skin and a unique three-layer nanofiltration membrane:

Our model is simple: for every mask purchased, one is donated to a local essential service worker in need.

We developed the Good Mask Philosophy to play our part in supporting our community.

We are committed to donating a mask for each one purchased. D.A.D nonprofit events have created a relationship with San Francisco's community.

Our goal is to donate 40,000 masks in the next two months. We will prioritize our donations to first responders, grocery store clerks, delivery couriers, fire & police departments, and generally focusing on people who are putting their lives at risk daily to help our community.

With your support, an essential service worker will receive an O2 Nano Mask.

The benefits of wearing a mask are abundant, but many masks on the market have one major downside: they restrict your breathing.

With our intricate design and detailed mesh cut out, breathability was one of our primary features that influenced the design. We’re proud to present you with a mask that gives you the freedom to breathe.

Breathing is normally a passive exercise, with your lungs expanding naturally as you breathe in. Where there is something restricting on our breathing, it creates additional pressure, like blowing into a balloon.

We performed the below simulation on our pressure drop to help people visualize the added difficulties of breathing in different circumstances.

The enhanced breathability allows O2 Nano Mask users to use the mask during sports and other day-to-day activities.

Our filter has achieved 99% particle removal efficiency, based on EN143 European certification standards and third-party testing.

The O2 Nano Mask filtration system features a two-layer mask skin and a unique three-layer nanofiltration membrane:


The O2 Nano Mask features both an adjustable earloop and a flexible nose wire to personalize comfort and keeps the mask in place.

 

O2 Nano Mask, powered by Viaex Technologies, envisaged in an American laboratory and manufactured and designed locally in San Francisco, CA.

The proprietary O2 Nano Mask Filter material has been tested by third-party laboratories. Results show that the O2 Nano Mask Filter blocks 99% of PM2.5 particles with its five-layer protection and hypoallergenic hydrophobic Nanofilter.

Our ultimate stretch goal is to double our Good Mask model of donating an additional 40,000 masks in two months. Ultimately, we’re looking to maximize our capacity to donate 100,000+ masks this year. If we exceed our funding goal, we will commit to sending more masks to more essential workers to help with the ever-growing demand and shortage.

Furthermore, your support will help us continue to make further modifications and improvements to make this product better as well as help our team provide ongoing support to our customers.

Our team is highly tied to the local community in the San Francisco Bay Area. Both co-founders are members of the non-profit SFMade, an institution that supports the local manufacturing community with members who are leaders in the sustainability movement in San Francisco’s design industries. Rebecca is the founder of a non-profit and recipient of a proclamation honoring her work with the homeless community and youth over the last seven years in San Francisco through her non-profit www.DesigningADifference.org

Our team was brought together through the current pandemic and the need to support the shortage of masks. With D.A.D’s ability to manufacture and Viaex’s background in nanomaterials, both teams had been individually approached to create PPE and masks in particular.

By combining their teams’ technologists and academic scientists, expertise in textile product design, and philanthropy, they want to go beyond research and manufacturing to create materials and products that impact our everyday lives and environment.

The moment we met we realized our goals and intentions were strongly aligned and in order to make a real impact on our community, we had to come together. We immediately responded to the call and co-founded O2 Brands Inc.

Bringing together our very different expertise, teams, and backgrounds to the project with nothing but belief and hope for the mission and each other.

Starting from material selection to manufacturing, we control the entire product design and production process, ensuring that we can continuously deliver products we believe in.

We’ve come to the Indiegogo community to fulfill our mission of donating 40,000 masks to local essential workers. At this crucial time, we’ve discovered that both consumers and essential service workers are in need.

Together, we’re committing to fulfilling our goal and we would like your support to make it happen.

Thank you for supporting and learning about O2 Nano Mask.

- Rebecca Cahua, Vivian Qu, and O2 Nano Mask Team

Note:

We have strived to create the best mask on the market and are committed to being transparent. No mask is 100% effective at curing or preventing a disease or illness. We created O2 Nano Mask, not as a medical product, but an everyday mask to filter out as many harmful particles as we could whilst being breathable and comfortable enough that it is happily worn for as long as desired.

story:
Short Summary

Sexiness and comfort are very important for the modern woman. The Rack Shack understands that cosmopolitan ladies have busy lives where they need to walk miles, work multiple jobs and still look and feel presentable at all times. The perfect pair of sneakers and the right-fitting lingerie can make the most basic outfit look funky, sexy and even chic. These essentials can give any woman a great sense of comfort and support enhancing their inherent confidence.

The Rack Shack is a startup  boutique that specializes in lingerie and sneakers with a signature Rack Shack style, curated out of different brands. The boutique is scheduled to open its doors in December 2015. The Rack Shack will be a brick-and-mortar shop and will be located in Bushwick, Brooklyn.

During the last 10 years in the U.S., the average bra size has grown from a C cup to a DD, yet the perfect-fitting bra is still very difficult to find. Nowadays there is actually a great selection of beautiful, high quality brands for size AA-L Cup in different styles, but while a wealth of these can be found online, they are hard to find in stores and it is very important to touch, feel and try on lingerie to get the right fit. Every collection, brand and model looks different on every woman, so The Rack Shack wants to carry the broadest range of sizes possible.

The Rack Shack will be unique because our diverse selection of gorgeous lingerie, the varying sizes and fits that will be offered, and the extremely friendly, knowledgeable and helpful staff. Not to mention, due to the nature of our shop, several brands and styles we carry will not have been sold yet anywhere else in New York City.

We just signed the lease on a beautiful storefront, are in touch with some amazing brands and are brainstorming on how to get the word out in the world.
For our startup costs and the ability to stock the extra special brands that will make the store unforgettable, The Rack Shack needs your help. Join this campaign and you will get an amazing introduction of what The Rack Shack is all about.

What We Need & What You Get

The Rack Shack needs $10,000 to stock the extra sexy brands and make sure the costumer-serves is what it is supposed to be. 

We have some great perks lined up that give away a preview of what the store will be selling and how our knowledge and serves will be prosecuted. 

Other Ways You Can Help

It would be amazing if you can share this video with your friends, family and the world around you. Just click the indiegogo share tool and spread it around.

That's all there is to it.  Thank you!

story:
Looking to give you something new to style around in. Familiar trend styles and setting new trends, globally. J.WEARz and DiGi FASHION. Since just a child, I have managed to wow everyone in just about everything that I did. With my creativity in design. I 've been working long on bringing new fashion innovations to market. I have always had an insight into what people have wanted and what I felt would be excellent, high quality consumer products -from touchscreen phones and tablets (before they were actually created) to flat screen televisions (before they were actually created) to quite a number of other product, entertainment and service ideas. As kids, my brother and I, imagined a world very different than the one that we lived in. The awesome thing is, we actually imagined it just the way that it is -with all of it's cool designs and technologies. My brother and I, are still amazed that it turned out the way that we'd imagined it. The reason why I have not brought any of these products to market... I was just a boy. I am no longer a boy and the man in me is ready to bring even more innovative products to market. These products will be brought to market. I am speaking of, the launch to market, of the many ideas in fashion that I have also envisioned as a child. The only question is, who will be a part of the journey. Will it be you? -then, I thank you now! This will be a journey that you will neither forget nor regret.

Fashion is a very diverse and enormously huge industry. New fashion has been born and reborn throughout fashion's magnificent history. So what makes my fashion different? Me! While I design much of my fashion based on popular styles and popular trends, My designs are very fashion forward and as such -also brings with it, fresh and innovative styles, features and even concepts in new functionality.

When you support our brands, you will be a part of the history and legacy of world changing companies that I am developing, you will be participating in the launch of a number of companies that will help to reshape the world in many ways, as I plan to launch innovative products, services and more in a host of markets, including -fashion, electronics, computers, mobile phones, tablets, wireless communications services, accessories, apps, games, furniture, appliances, toys -including new learning systems, food and beverage -including restaurant, entertainment and a number of other categorically diverse markets. A uniquely designed line of t-shirts will also be a part of the J.WEARz brand and will feature a line with unique, cool and catchy phrases printed on.

So, what will your support be used for? Your financial support will allow you to help establish the innovative apparel lines that will be launched, by going towards manufacturing and some advertising expenses. Some of the finances will also go towards some brand packaging.

J. WEARz lines and DiGi FASHION lines will introduce cleverly innovative high quality fashion wear, which includes -tops, bottoms, socks, scarves (both head and neck) and other fashion accessories, fashion eyewear, jewelry -available for men, women and children. The lines will even include lines of innovatively designed backpacks, totes and other bags. The product lines will offer a full fashion selection. The J. WEARz and DiGi FASHION fashion labels are poised to become a global contender in the fashion industry. With your generous support, you will watch a mega company form that you've supported. These fashion labels will function under the corporate name, J.W. CONCEPTS that was launched with an online presence, selling name brand consumer products -and shut down one year after launch to pursue launching my dream of launching my own products.

Manufacturers and sales channels are set up. The challenge was to launch a fashion company without the support of the people that it was developed to bring new fashion apparel innovations to market for. It was decided that a company that was developed for the people should be launched in part by the financial support of the people. With these new companies, support will be made possible to a large number of charities, including, the funding of cures for AIDS, cancer, Parkinson's disease, education and many other good causes. The launching of these companies will help create jobs and help to stabilize and stimulate our economy and the global economy. Yes, what we are doing is that huge! We would truly be a group of companies built -for the people, by the people and of the people!

In the coming months, we will be posting on our website, which is currently being developed, a list of charities that you've helped to support. You will help better our world in more ways than you know!

Thank you!

- Joel Woodlyn

Brand owner, Innovative talent




------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


All donations to be made for “DOMINO EFFECT” contributions, will be made by us, through the JustGive organization.

The JustGive organization has been in the nonprofit, giving sector for over 10 years! The JustGive organization allows contributions to be made to a host of organizations. Organizations that offer services that addresses AIDS, cancer, Parkinson's disease, education and a number of other causes. The JustGive organization's vast reach is why we will be making all donations through this organization. For a list of organizations and types of causes that the JustGive organization's reach spans, please visit, www.justgive.org.

We thank you for your contributions!

story:
About us

We are friends from Ukraine!!! We have been working to design our own brand of clothing "SOHO Chic" for the past 2 years. We have our own cozy boutique that we have operated very successfully in Ukraine for 2 years. We also have clients in places such as London, Dubai and Istanbul.

What we do

Our idea is to create beautiful clothes for perfect moments. We design dresses that make you feel amazing. We want you to feel very special even in everyday life. For our collections, we choose only high-quality and exclusive fabrics and we pay a lot of attention to every detail.

Now we get hundreds of requests  from all over the world to buy our products  through social networks. We have been able to fill many of these orders so far. However, as demand for our products increases, we feel we need to expand  and improve our ability to create, advertise, and sell our clothing in order to ensure customer satisfaction all over the world!

What you give us and what you get

PERKS

Timeless T-shirts, $25

Take your pick and show your support for SOHO Chic. Choose one of the four stylish T-Shirts:

  no makeup #selfie          Tiffany Blue                   #instagirl                    500K followers

Chiffon blouse, $35

Lovely soft chiffon blouse in  black night / ivory / sweet pineapple colors

Available in XS, S, M, L, XL sizes.

Silk chiffon is a very delicate, light fabric. It never goes out of fashion. You can wear it on any occasion. It is one of the most comfortable options for a hot summer.

High-Low skirt $75

                 Lollipop pink                        Sweet pineapple                          Neon citrus   

          

                Tiffany blue                        Vanilla cappuccino                       Black night


Our most popular skirt; comes in exclusive colours

Available in XS, S, M, L, XL sizes 

Fabrics: Gabardine, organza

story_txt:
About us
We are friends from Ukraine!!! We have been working to design our own brand of clothing "SOHO Chic" for the past 2 years. We have our own cozy boutique that we have operated very successfully in Ukraine for 2 years. We also have clients in places such as London, Dubai and Istanbul.
What we do
Our idea is to create beautiful clothes for perfect moments. We design dresses that make you feel amazing. We want you to feel very special even in everyday life. For our collections, we choose only high-quality and exclusive fabrics and we pay a lot of attention to every detail.
Now we get hundreds of requests  from all over the world to buy our products  through social networks. We have been able to fill many of these orders so far. However, as demand for our products increases, we feel we need to expand  and improve our ability to create, advertise, and sell our clothing in order to ensure customer satisfaction all over the world!
What you give us and what you get

story:
> VER EN ESPAÑOL <


Have you watched the video above? On it we describe the essence of our goals.

--------------------------


We reinvent the way in which jewels and luxury goods are created and distributed, in order to guarantee that the impact is positive on the whole value chain, from obtaining the Raw Materials to the Master Artisans and the Final Customer.

We want to make known the origin of the raw materials to contribute to a sustainable development that respects the environment and the people.

We redefine the value chain of the luxury sector  to narrow the gap between professionals and clients in order to identify new ways of doing things, more sustainable and generating relationships which are fairer and profitable to everyone.

In order to achieve a Transparent Luxury is necessary to create an online collaborative platform for Authors, Professionals and Enterprises, a Global Commercial Network and a Community which is excited about changing things and who love the design and what is artisan and original.  



We are already a community of thousands of professionals united in Facebook and excited to participate on an alternative luxury which is fairer and more Humane. - We believe THE UNION MAKES BIG THOSE WHO ARE SMALL.


FACEBOOK
- FROM HERE YOU CAN SAY HELLO TO US -





----------------------



And how this will work? aa


Once the piece is finished, its History will be completed. It will become a Certificate of Transparent Luxury, with a unique ID number registered on CJoRe with public or private access (the customer decides):





You can help us by acquiring the reward "Perk 1" for just $ 3 and spreading the message of the new #TransparentLuxury. If you are a professional we have other better proposals for you.



If we obtain the necessary funding, we are confident that the first Transparent Jewels will be created from April/2016.


Please help us to return the luxury to its real protagonists in order to get back the values of what is unique, authentic and handmade.


--------------------------





THE PROBLEM

Traditional jewelry stores and other luxury retailers remain anchored in an industrial business model that belongs to the past, which forces them to pile stock and invest in costly items that nobody has requested.




THE NECESSITY

It is necessary to redefine the luxury industry and establish a new logical order shortening the distances between authors, professionals and customers in order to be able to offer consumers a sustainable Alternative Luxury and professionals a future full of new opportunities.



THE SOLUTION

With the technology and infrastructure that we have designed, we are going to be able to solve this with a short direct commercialization channel (Global Retail Network), without intermediaries, without obstacles, without barriers or complicated processes. This channel will allow each Professional in the world to be able to sell his materials, pieces and services globally. And he will be free to set the price he considers fairer for his talent and get a 100% of the set price for the sales of his work. This channel will also benefit retailers and customers with better prices and a greater variety of unique pieces.



Authors and Professionals will have a Virtual Storefront (an open window) at each jewelry store, specialized gallery or premium boutique in the world. They will be able to display their creativity, their talent and their work directly and in real time. They will always be backed by a Global Retail Network of Story Partners (community retailers), expert skilled professionals who will help them, give advice and be responsible for promoting and selling their pieces, designs and services, because the Story Partners will also benefit economically from each sale they perform.



With this distributed structure we will achieve an agile global organization able to adapt to change much faster and better.


CROWDSOURCING APPLIED TO LUXURY

Crowdsourcing and co-creation are a reality that is revolutionizing the world. Thanks to the collective intelligence of the communities, entire industries are being reinvented and the rules of the current market are changing completely.

Thanks to the Distributed Global Network of Story Partners and the co-creation platform we are going to be able to bring the benefits of the crowdsourcing to the luxury. This is going to allow the CJoRe community to provide personalized Luxury a la carte transparently and under demand.


Crowdsourcing offers a factor of differentiation and competitive advantage to all the Professionals of the CJoRe community, adding the benefits associated to the just-in-time Method(JIT); and on the other hand, it brings a new shopping experience and a customer support process which is collective, innovative, accessible, open and transparent.


--------------------------






_______________________


If you are a jewelry retailer, owner of a premium boutique or a gallery specialized in Author's luxury items, then this is for YOU. - Become the first Story Partner in your city.





As a Story Partner, you will have access in the cloud to everything you need to take total control of your business from an online dashboard: Accounting, Finance, Sales, HR, Purchasing, Project Managment, Stock, Warehouse, CRM, Campaigns, Logistics, Events, Organizing teams of Authors to create jewelry pieces with History and other Luxury Items a la carte personalized and under demand for each customer without requiring a minimal stock and much more...



QUESTIONS?

If you have questions about anything, please feel free to contact us on:  cjore.help@gmail.com



Together we can give a new meaning to the luxury and then contribute to improve the lives of millions of people and make our planet a better place to live.

If you wish to know more about me, in this original note posted on Facebook on March 15th 2011 I explain better who I am and how it all began.



_______________________



español
____________________ :: ____________________ 

CJoRe

El Lujo más Transparente del Mundo

Revolucionamos la manera en que se crean y se venden los artículos de lujo.


Si no ve los subtítulos en español clicke "Subtítulos" ↑


Usted ha visto el vídeo de arriba? En él le describimos la esencia de nuestras metas. 

--------------------------


Reinventamos la manera en la que las joyas y artículos de lujo son creados y distribuidos, con el objetivo de que el impacto sea positivo en toda la cadena de valor, desde la obtención de las Materias Primas, pasando por los Maestros Artesanos, hasta el Cliente Final.

Queremos dar a conocer el origen de los materiales para contribuir a un desarrollo sostenible, respetuoso con el medio ambiente y las personas.

Redefinimos la cadena de valor del lujo para acortar las distancias entre profesionales y clientes para identificar nuevas formas de hacer las cosas, más sostenibles y generar relaciones más justas y provechosas para todos.

Para lograr un Lujo Transparente es necesario crear una plataforma de colaboración online para los Autores, Profesionales y Empresas, una Red Comercial Global y una Comunidad  ilusionada por cambiar las cosas, amantes del diseño, lo artesano y lo original.



Ya somos una comunidad con miles de profesionales reunidos en Facebook ilusionados por participar en crear piezas únicas y un lujo alternativo más justo y humano. - Creemos que LA UNIÓN HACE GRANDES A LOS PEQUEÑOS.


FACEBOOK

- AQUÍ PUEDE SALUDARNOS - 


Autores y Profesionales de todo el mundo van a disponer de un punto de encuentro online con todo lo necesario para desarrollar sus negocios de forma sostenible, colaborar, organizarse, mostrar sus mejores talentos y ofrecer sus obras que podrán ser compradas, comentadas, puntuadas y recomendadas por sus propios compañeros y clientes.






----------------------


Y ¿cómo va a funcionar?




Con la pieza terminada se dará por finalizada la Historia. Ésta pasará a ser un Certificado de Lujo Transparente, con un numero ID único registrado en CJoRe con acceso público o privado (el cliente lo decide). 

Será posible conocer la Historia online completa de cada pieza, incluso hablar con las personas que la crearon, desde los proveedores de materias primas, pasando por el Diseñador que la imaginó hasta los Maestros Artesanos que la realizaron.

Este innovador sistema convierte cada pieza en única dando lugar a obras exclusivas de las que sólo habrá una en el mundo. 


Un vídeo realizado de forma colaborativa mostrará todos los procesos que hayan sido necesarios para la creación de una pieza y a todas las personas que hayan participado en su realización.



Este sistema va a permitir que los Diseñadores y Artesanos obtengan el reconocimiento que merecen por su trabajo y que el cliente ponga cara y nombre a todas las personas que han participado en todo el proceso de creación.

Humanizando la joyería y el lujo lograremos una experiencia de compra inolvidable y una transparencia absoluta de cada etapa del proceso. Además, el cliente podrá finalizar la historia haciéndose una foto o vídeo con su pieza y publicarla en su correspondiente Historia. De esta forma, los profesionales también tendrán la satisfacción de ver quién disfruta de su obra. 



El cliente ahora también podrá votar y valorar el trabajo realizado por cada uno de los profesionales, comentar y compartir con sus amigos en las redes sociales la experiencia vivida y opinar sobre los servicios y el trato recibido.


Puede ayudarnos adquiriendo la recompensa "Perk 1" por tan sólo $3 y difundiendo el mensaje del nuevo #LujoTransparente. Si es profesional tenemos otras propuestas mejores para usted.



Si logramos la financiación necesaria, confiamos que las primeras Joyas Transparentes podrán ser creadas a partir de abril/2016.  

Ayúdenos a devolver el lujo a sus auténticos protagonistas para recuperar los valores de lo único, lo auténtico y lo hecho a mano.


----------------------


POR QUÉ ESTA INICIATIVA                                                

En estas últimas décadas las grandes multinacionales han industrializado el lujo, transformando el arte genuino de los Autores en una mera mercancía con la que saturar el mercado con productos estandarizados.

Los Autores han sido escondidos a la sombra de las compañías, su creatividad se ha visto limitada y su talento se ha atribuido a logos de grandes marcas corporativas quitándoles el reconocimiento por su trabajo para ser componentes anónimos de una línea de producción sin fin.



Uno de los grandes daños de la producción masiva de artículos de lujo ha sido la pérdida de valores humanos por la falta de contacto entre los Autores y consumidores. En el lujo industrial los productos se fabrican de forma estandarizada en la cadena de producción, después pasan a la cadena de distribución y al final al punto de venta minorista donde al cliente lo atiende una persona que no tiene nada de conexión con los Autores ni afinidad por lo que vende.


LA OPORTUNIDAD

La trazabilidad es una GRAN OPORTUNIDAD para que las pequeñas empresas y profesionales independientes puedan ofrecer una propuesta de valor diferente y ventajosa frente a la oferta de las grandes multinacionales. Competir con ellas siempre ha sido un sueño imposible pero gracias a la transparencia esto ahora puede cambiar. 

Es el momento de devolver el protagonismo a las personas que hacen las cosas y mostrar la Historia de su trabajo diario.

 



EL PROBLEMA

Los comercios tradicionales de joyería y artículos de lujo siguen anclados en un modelo de negocio industrial que pertenece al pasado, les obliga a amontonar stock e invertir en costoso género que nadie ha solicitado.




Los comercios tradicionales son una gran barrera para que los jóvenes diseñadores y  Autores emergentes tengan la oportunidad de ofrecer y vender sus piezas y nuevos diseños. La mayoría de minoristas no están dispuestos a asumir el riesgo que supone invertir en piezas de jóvenes Autores que no tienen reputación demostrada en el mercado. Los materiales innovadores y diseños extravagantes a menudo son automáticamente descartados. 

Los Autores independientes aunque tienen un gran potencial comercial por lo original, lo exclusivo y la calidad artesanal de sus piezas son muy débiles frente a las grandes firmas, porque no tienen  la infraestructura y el capital necesario que les permita comercializar directamente sus piezas, posicionar su marca y hacer avanzar su negocio.




LA NECESIDAD

Es necesario redefinir la industria del lujo y establecer un nuevo orden lógico acortando las distancias entre autores, profesionales y clientes para ofrecer a los consumidores un Lujo Alternativo sostenible y a los profesionales un futuro lleno de nuevas oportunidades.



LA SOLUCIÓN

Con la tecnología e infraestructura que hemos diseñado lograremos solucionar esto con un canal corto de comercialización directa (Red Comercial Global), sin intermediarios, sin obstáculos, sin barreras ni procesos complicados. Este canal va a permitir que cada profesional pueda comerciar sus materiales, piezas y servicios de forma global y sea libre de poner el precio que considere más justo por su talento y cobre el 100% de las ventas de su trabajo. Este canal también beneficiará a los detallistas y a los clientes con mejores precios y mayor oferta de piezas únicas.



Autores y Profesionales van a disponer de un Escaparate Virtual (una ventana abierta), en cada joyería, galería especializada o boutique premium del mundo. Van a poder mostrar su creatividad, su talento y sus obras de forma directa y en tiempo real. Siempre respaldados por una Red Comercial Global de Story Partners (detallistas de la comunidad), expertos profesionales cualificados que les ayudarán, aconsejarán y se encargarán de promocionar y vender sus piezas, diseños y servicios, porque ellos también se beneficiarán económicamente de cada venta que realicen.



Las grandes multinacionales del lujo industrial invirtieron miles de millones y tardaron décadas para lograr llevar y ofrecer sus productos de lujo estandarizados a clientes de todo el mundo. Ahora los Autores y Profesionales de la comunidad CJoRe van a lograr lo mismo de una forma rápida, sencilla y muy económica, conectándose unos con otros.

Vamos a disponer de una Red Global Distribuida donde los profesionales se van a poder conectar entre sí sin que tengan que pasar necesariamente por ningún intermediario central.



Con esta estructura distribuida lograremos una organización global ágil que se adaptará al cambio mucho más rápido y mejor. 


CROWDSOURCING APLICADO AL LUJO 

El Crowdsourcing y la Co-creación, son una realidad que está revolucionando el mundo, gracias a la inteligencia colectiva de las comunidades se están reinventando industrias enteras y cambiando por completo las reglas de juego del mercado actual. 

Gracias a la Red Global Distribuida de Story Partners y a la plataforma de co-creación vamos a poder llevar los beneficios del crowdsourcing al lujo. Esto va a permitir que la comunidad CJoRe pueda ofrecer Lujo a la Carta personalizado bajo demanda de forma transparente. 



Beneficios del Crowdsourcing:

Todos ganan... Gracias al crowdsourcing el cliente recibirá mejores precios y un trato cercano personalizado con una experiencia de compra única, mientras que los detallistas no necesitarán amontonar stock en sus establecimientos, aumentarán su oferta y margen de beneficio, no correrán ningún riesgo y, los Autores obtendrán reconocimiento y mayor beneficio económico por su trabajo.

El crowdsourcing, ofrece un factor de diferenciación y ventaja competitiva a todos los profesionales de la comunidad CJoRe, sumando los beneficios relacionados con el método just in time; y por otro lado, una nueva experiencia de compra y un proceso de atención al cliente colectivo, innovador, cercano, abierto y transparente.


--------------------------

¿Por qué unirse a CJoRe?

Somos la primera y única empresa del mundo que ofrece a todos los profesionales y empresas del lujo independiente una estrategia de colaboración global y soluciones tecnológicas colectivas que les van a permitir sumar esfuerzos para adaptarse  mejor al cambio y avanzar juntos.


¿Qué va a encontrar en CJoRe?

En CJoRe dispondrá de herramientas y espacios de colaboración online (red social), con su propio perfil profesional, website, portafolio, blog, tienda online, herramientas de e-learning, un portal B2B para compra/venta de materias primas y herramientas... Todo lo necesario para colaborar y llevar su negocio a Interne de forma profesional.


¿Qué va a conseguir en CJoRe?

Alcanzar sus objetivos profesionales con menor esfuerzo.



La membresía para pertenecer a CJoRe para Autores y Profesionales será de $15 mensual o $180 anual, pero ahora en IndieGoGo usted puede beneficiarse de una membresía de un año por tan sólo $40 o de dos años por tan solo $80. Haciendo la reserva ahora va a estar entre los primeros profesionales de la comunidad y participará en la creación de la plataforma. 

Se le dará acceso en el periodo Beta de desarrollo tres meses antes del lanzamiento público, de esta forma va a participar y podrá ayudar a crear una herramienta que se adapte a sus deseos y necesidades. Durante este periodo inicial crearemos un foro de debate para discutir lo que le gusta y lo que no le gusta.



La membresía para PYMES e Instituciones será de $25 mensual o $300 anual, pero ahora en IndieGoGo pueden beneficiarse de una membresía de un año por tan sólo $80 o de dos años por tan solo $160. Haciendo la reserva ahora tambien va a participar en la creación de la plataforma. 


_______________________


Si es detallista de una joyería, propietario de una boutique premium o de una galería especializada en obras de Autor esto es para UD. - Sea el primer Story Partner de su ciudad.


La membresía como Story Partner será de $35 mensual o $420 anual, pero ahora en IndieGoGo usted puede beneficiarse de una membresía de un año por tan sólo $150 o de dos años por tan solo $300. 

Tendrá acceso a todos los servicios de la plataforma CJoRe en la nube durante todo ese tiempo y acceso privilegiado a la descarga GRATUITA del sistema operativo que hemos diseñado con software libre para que pueda instalar en su establecimiento tantos terminales y Escaparates Virtuales como desee (sin pagar ningun tipo de licencia adicional).




Como Story Partner va a disponer en la nube de todo lo necesario para llevar desde un cuadro de Mando online el control total de su negocio: Contabilidad y Finanzas, Ventas, RRHH, Compras, Proyectos, Stock, Almacenes, CRM, Campañas, Logística, Eventos, organizar equipos de Autores para crear joyas con Historia y otros Artículos de Lujo a la Carta personalizados bajo demanda para cada cliente sin necesidad de tener que disponer de apenas stock y mucho más...

Hemos diseñado un completo sistema operativo basado en tecnología libre LINUX, va a poder descargarlo de forma completamente GRATUITA.

Con este sistema operativo gratuito va a poder instalar en su establecimiento, sin dificultad y sin pagar ningún tipo de licencia adicional tantos terminales y Escaparates Virtuales como desee, de forma fácil y muy económica. Nosotros le ofreceremos todo el soporte técnico que necesite. 

El sistema operativo funciona con hardware convencional que podrá adquirir en su proveedor de confianza, nosotros le indicaremos el hardware más adecuado y le facilitaremos la información y el soporte para una correcta configuración.

Con este innovador sistema va a formar parte de nuestra Red Profesional Global Distribuida conectada a la comunidad CJoRe y va a poder ofrecer a sus clientes de forma segura obras de Autor únicas, nuevas Experiencias de compra y Lujo a la Carta Personalizado bajo demanda.


El 60% de la tecnología ya está desarrollada, pero todavía nos queda trabajo por hacer y necesitamos recursos económicos para poder continuar, por eso hemos lanzado la campaña de crowdfunding. Contamos con su apoyo!


PREGUNTAS?

Si usted tiene preguntas sobre cualquier cosa no dude en contactar con nosotros en:   cjore.help@gmail.com



Juntos podemos dar un nuevo significado al lujo para contribuir a mejorar la vida de millones de personas y hacer de nuestro planeta un lugar mejor para vivir.

Si desea saber más sobre mí, en esta nota original que publiqué en Facebook el 15 de marzo de 2011 le explico mejor quién soy y cómo empezó todo.


_______________________
