Authors and Professionals will have a Virtual Storefront (an open window) at each jewelry store, specialized gallery or premium boutique in the world. They will be able to display their creativity, their talent and their work directly and in real time. They will always be backed by a Global Retail Network of Story Partners (community retailers), expert skilled professionals who will help them, give advice and be responsible for promoting and selling their pieces, designs and services, because the Story Partners will also benefit economically from each sale they perform.
















With this distributed structure we will achieve an agile global organization able to adapt to change much faster and better.





CROWDSOURCING APPLIED TO LUXURY
Crowdsourcing and co-creation are a reality that is revolutionizing the world. Thanks to the collective intelligence of the communities, entire industries are being reinvented and the rules of the current market are changing completely.
Thanks to the Distributed Global Network of Story Partners and the co-creation platform we are going to be able to bring the benefits of the crowdsourcing to the luxury. This is going to allow the CJoRe community to provide personalized Luxury a la carte transparently and under demand.

Crowdsourcing offers a factor of differentiation and competitive advantage to all the Professionals of the CJoRe community, adding the benefits associated to the just-in-time Method(JIT); and on the other hand, it brings a new shopping experience and a customer support process which is collective, innovative, accessible, open and transparent.

--------------------------




















_______________________






If you are a jewelry retailer, owner of a premium boutique or a gallery specialized in Author's luxury items, then this is for YOU. - Become the first Story Partner in your city.













As a Story Partner, you will have access in the cloud to everything you need to take total control of your business from an online dashboard: Accounting, Finance, Sales, HR, Purchasing, Project Managment, Stock, Warehouse, CRM, Campaigns, Logistics, Events, Organizing teams of Authors to create jewelry pieces with History and other Luxury Items a la carte personalized and under demand for each customer without requiring a minimal stock and much more...











QUESTIONS?
If you have questions about anything, please feel free to contact us on:  cjore.help@gmail.com





Together we can give a new meaning to the luxury and then contribute to improve the lives of millions of people and make our planet a better place to live.
If you wish to know more about me, in this original note posted on Facebook on March 15th 2011 I explain better who I am and how it all began.




_______________________






español____________________  ::  ____________________ 

CJoRe
El Lujo más Transparente del Mundo
Revolucionamos la manera en que se crean y se venden los artículos de lujo.


Si no ve los subtítulos en español clicke "Subtítulos" ↑



Usted ha visto el vídeo de arriba? En él le describimos la esencia de nuestras metas. 

--------------------------





Reinventamos la manera en la que las joyas y artículos de lujo son creados y distribuidos, con el objetivo de que el impacto sea positivo en toda la cadena de valor, desde la obtención de las Materias Primas, pasando por los Maestros Artesanos, hasta el Cliente Final.


Queremos dar a conocer el origen de los materiales para contribuir a un desarrollo sostenible, respetuoso con el medio ambiente y las personas.
Redefinimos la cadena de valor del lujo para acortar las distancias entre profesionales y clientes para identificar nuevas formas de hacer las cosas, más sostenibles y generar relaciones más justas y provechosas para todos.
Para lograr un Lujo Transparente es necesario crear una plataforma de colaboración online para los Autores, Profesionales y Empresas, una Red Comercial Global y una Comunidad  ilusionada por cambiar las cosas, amantes del diseño, lo artesano y lo original.




Ya somos una comunidad con miles de profesionales reunidos en Facebook ilusionados por participar en crear piezas únicas y un lujo alternativo más justo y humano. - Creemos que LA UNIÓN HACE GRANDES A LOS PEQUEÑOS.

FACEBOOK
- AQUÍ PUEDE SALUDARNOS - 









Autores y Profesionales de todo el mundo van a disponer de un punto de encuentro online con todo lo necesario para desarrollar sus negocios de forma sostenible, colaborar, organizarse, mostrar sus mejores talentos y ofrecer sus obras que podrán ser compradas, comentadas, puntuadas y recomendadas por sus propios compañeros y clientes.





















----------------------






Y ¿cómo va a funcionar?


Con la pieza terminada se dará por finalizada la Historia. Ésta pasará a ser un Certificado de Lujo Transparente, con un numero ID único registrado en CJoRe con acceso público o privado (el cliente lo decide). 
Será posible conocer la Historia online completa de cada pieza, incluso hablar con las personas que la crearon, desde los proveedores de materias primas, pasando por el Diseñador que la imaginó hasta los Maestros Artesanos que la realizaron.
Este innovador sistema convierte cada pieza en única dando lugar a obras exclusivas de las que sólo habrá una en el mundo. 


Un vídeo realizado de forma colaborativa mostrará todos los procesos que hayan sido necesarios para la creación de una pieza y a todas las personas que hayan participado en su realización.






Este sistema va a permitir que los Diseñadores y Artesanos obtengan el reconocimiento que merecen por su trabajo y que el cliente ponga cara y nombre a todas las personas que han participado en todo el proceso de creación.
Humanizando la joyería y el lujo lograremos una experiencia de compra inolvidable y una transparencia absoluta de cada etapa del proceso. Además, el cliente podrá finalizar la historia haciéndose una foto o vídeo con su pieza y publicarla en su correspondiente Historia. De esta forma, los profesionales también tendrán la satisfacción de ver quién disfruta de su obra. 



El cliente ahora también podrá votar y valorar el trabajo realizado por cada uno de los profesionales, comentar y compartir con sus amigos en las redes sociales la experiencia vivida y opinar sobre los servicios y el trato recibido.




Puede ayudarnos adquiriendo la recompensa "Perk 1" por tan sólo $3 y difundiendo el mensaje del nuevo #LujoTransparente. Si es profesional tenemos otras propuestas mejores para usted.






Si logramos la financiación necesaria, confiamos que las primeras Joyas Transparentes podrán ser creadas a partir de abril/2016.  
Ayúdenos a devolver el lujo a sus auténticos protagonistas para recuperar los valores de lo único, lo auténtico y lo hecho a mano.



----------------------

POR QUÉ ESTA INICIATIVA                                                
En estas últimas décadas las grandes multinacionales han industrializado el lujo, transformando el arte genuino de los Autores en una mera mercancía con la que saturar el mercado con productos estandarizados.
Los Autores han sido escondidos a la sombra de las compañías, su creatividad se ha visto limitada y su talento se ha atribuido a logos de grandes marcas corporativas quitándoles el reconocimiento por su trabajo para ser componentes anónimos de una línea de producción sin fin.






Uno de los grandes daños de la producción masiva de artículos de lujo ha sido la pérdida de valores humanos por la falta de contacto entre los Autores y consumidores. En el lujo industrial los productos se fabrican de forma estandarizada en la cadena de producción, después pasan a la cadena de distribución y al final al punto de venta minorista donde al cliente lo atiende una persona que no tiene nada de conexión con los Autores ni afinidad por lo que vende.







LA OPORTUNIDAD
La trazabilidad es una GRAN OPORTUNIDAD para que las pequeñas empresas y profesionales independientes puedan ofrecer una propuesta de valor diferente y ventajosa frente a la oferta de las grandes multinacionales. Competir con ellas siempre ha sido un sueño imposible pero gracias a la transparencia esto ahora puede cambiar. 
Es el momento de devolver el protagonismo a las personas que hacen las cosas y mostrar la Historia de su trabajo diario.
 





EL PROBLEMA
Los comercios tradicionales de joyería y artículos de lujo siguen anclados en un modelo de negocio industrial que pertenece al pasado, les obliga a amontonar stock e invertir en costoso género que nadie ha solicitado.






Los comercios tradicionales son una gran barrera para que los jóvenes diseñadores y  Autores emergentes tengan la oportunidad de ofrecer y vender sus piezas y nuevos diseños. La mayoría de minoristas no están dispuestos a asumir el riesgo que supone invertir en piezas de jóvenes Autores que no tienen reputación demostrada en el mercado. Los materiales innovadores y diseños extravagantes a menudo son automáticamente descartados. 
Los Autores independientes aunque tienen un gran potencial comercial por lo original, lo exclusivo y la calidad artesanal de sus piezas son muy débiles frente a las grandes firmas, porque no tienen  la infraestructura y el capital necesario que les permita comercializar directamente sus piezas, posicionar su marca y hacer avanzar su negocio.










LA NECESIDAD
Es necesario redefinir la industria del lujo y establecer un nuevo orden lógico acortando las distancias entre autores, profesionales y clientes para ofrecer a los consumidores un Lujo Alternativo sostenible y a los profesionales un futuro lleno de nuevas oportunidades.




LA SOLUCIÓN
Con la tecnología e infraestructura que hemos diseñado lograremos solucionar esto con un canal corto de comercialización directa (Red Comercial Global), sin intermediarios, sin obstáculos, sin barreras ni procesos complicados. Este canal va a permitir que cada profesional pueda comerciar sus materiales, piezas y servicios de forma global y sea libre de poner el precio que considere más justo por su talento y cobre el 100% de las ventas de su trabajo. Este canal también beneficiará a los detallistas y a los clientes con mejores precios y mayor oferta de piezas únicas.



Autores y Profesionales van a disponer de un Escaparate Virtual (una ventana abierta), en cada joyería, galería especializada o boutique premium del mundo. Van a poder mostrar su creatividad, su talento y sus obras de forma directa y en tiempo real. Siempre respaldados por una Red Comercial Global de Story Partners (detallistas de la comunidad), expertos profesionales cualificados que les ayudarán, aconsejarán y se encargarán de promocionar y vender sus piezas, diseños y servicios, porque ellos también se beneficiarán económicamente de cada venta que realicen.











Las grandes multinacionales del lujo industrial invirtieron miles de millones y tardaron décadas para lograr llevar y ofrecer sus productos de lujo estandarizados a clientes de todo el mundo. Ahora los Autores y Profesionales de la comunidad CJoRe van a lograr lo mismo de una forma rápida, sencilla y muy económica, conectándose unos con otros.
Vamos a disponer de una Red Global Distribuida donde los profesionales se van a poder conectar entre sí sin que tengan que pasar necesariamente por ningún intermediario central.




Con esta estructura distribuida lograremos una organización global ágil que se adaptará al cambio mucho más rápido y mejor. 




CROWDSOURCING APLICADO AL LUJO 
El Crowdsourcing y la Co-creación, son una realidad que está revolucionando el mundo, gracias a la inteligencia colectiva de las comunidades se están reinventando industrias enteras y cambiando por completo las reglas de juego del mercado actual. 
Gracias a la Red Global Distribuida de Story Partners y a la plataforma de co-creación vamos a poder llevar los beneficios del crowdsourcing al lujo. Esto va a permitir que la comunidad CJoRe pueda ofrecer Lujo a la Carta personalizado bajo demanda de forma transparente. 




Beneficios del Crowdsourcing:
Todos ganan... Gracias al crowdsourcing el cliente recibirá mejores precios y un trato cercano personalizado con una experiencia de compra única, mientras que los detallistas no necesitarán amontonar stock en sus establecimientos, aumentarán su oferta y margen de beneficio, no correrán ningún riesgo y, los Autores obtendrán reconocimiento y mayor beneficio económico por su trabajo.
El crowdsourcing, ofrece un factor de diferenciación y ventaja competitiva a todos los profesionales de la comunidad CJoRe, sumando los beneficios relacionados con el método just in time; y por otro lado, una nueva experiencia de compra y un proceso de atención al cliente colectivo, innovador, cercano, abierto y transparente.


--------------------------




¿Por qué unirse a CJoRe?
Somos la primera y única empresa del mundo que ofrece a todos los profesionales y empresas del lujo independiente una estrategia de colaboración global y soluciones tecnológicas colectivas que les van a permitir sumar esfuerzos para adaptarse  mejor al cambio y avanzar juntos.

¿Qué va a encontrar en CJoRe?
En CJoRe dispondrá de herramientas y espacios de colaboración online (red social), con su propio perfil profesional, website, portafolio, blog, tienda online, herramientas de e-learning, un portal B2B para compra/venta de materias primas y herramientas... Todo lo necesario para colaborar y llevar su negocio a Interne de forma profesional.

¿Qué va a conseguir en CJoRe?
Alcanzar sus objetivos profesionales con menor esfuerzo.







La membresía para pertenecer a CJoRe para Autores y Profesionales será de $15 mensual o $180 anual, pero ahora en IndieGoGo usted puede beneficiarse de una membresía de un año por tan sólo $40 o de dos años por tan solo $80. Haciendo la reserva ahora va a estar entre los primeros profesionales de la comunidad y participará en la creación de la plataforma. 
Se le dará acceso en el periodo Beta de desarrollo tres meses antes del lanzamiento público, de esta forma va a participar y podrá ayudar a crear una herramienta que se adapte a sus deseos y necesidades. Durante este periodo inicial crearemos un foro de debate para discutir lo que le gusta y lo que no le gusta.






La membresía para PYMES e Instituciones será de $25 mensual o $300 anual, pero ahora en IndieGoGo pueden beneficiarse de una membresía de un año por tan sólo $80 o de dos años por tan solo $160. Haciendo la reserva ahora tambien va a participar en la creación de la plataforma. 






_______________________






Si es detallista de una joyería, propietario de una boutique premium o de una galería especializada en obras de Autor esto es para UD. - Sea el primer Story Partner de su ciudad.







La membresía como Story Partner será de $35 mensual o $420 anual, pero ahora en IndieGoGo usted puede beneficiarse de una membresía de un año por tan sólo $150 o de dos años por tan solo $300. 
Tendrá acceso a todos los servicios de la plataforma CJoRe en la nube durante todo ese tiempo y acceso privilegiado a la descarga GRATUITA del sistema operativo que hemos diseñado con software libre para que pueda instalar en su establecimiento tantos terminales y Escaparates Virtuales como desee (sin pagar ningun tipo de licencia adicional).










Como Story Partner va a disponer en la nube de todo lo necesario para llevar desde un cuadro de Mando online el control total de su negocio: Contabilidad y Finanzas, Ventas, RRHH, Compras, Proyectos, Stock, Almacenes, CRM, Campañas, Logística, Eventos, organizar equipos de Autores para crear joyas con Historia y otros Artículos de Lujo a la Carta personalizados bajo demanda para cada cliente sin necesidad de tener que disponer de apenas stock y mucho más...





Hemos diseñado un completo sistema operativo basado en tecnología libre LINUX, va a poder descargarlo de forma completamente GRATUITA.
Con este sistema operativo gratuito va a poder instalar en su establecimiento, sin dificultad y sin pagar ningún tipo de licencia adicional tantos terminales y Escaparates Virtuales como desee, de forma fácil y muy económica. Nosotros le ofreceremos todo el soporte técnico que necesite. 
El sistema operativo funciona con hardware convencional que podrá adquirir en su proveedor de confianza, nosotros le indicaremos el hardware más adecuado y le facilitaremos la información y el soporte para una correcta configuración.
Con este innovador sistema va a formar parte de nuestra Red Profesional Global Distribuida conectada a la comunidad CJoRe y va a poder ofrecer a sus clientes de forma segura obras de Autor únicas, nuevas Experiencias de compra y Lujo a la Carta Personalizado bajo demanda.

El 60% de la tecnología ya está desarrollada, pero todavía nos queda trabajo por hacer y necesitamos recursos económicos para poder continuar, por eso hemos lanzado la campaña de crowdfunding. Contamos con su apoyo!



PREGUNTAS?
Si usted tiene preguntas sobre cualquier cosa no dude en contactar con nosotros en:   cjore.help@gmail.com





Juntos podemos dar un nuevo significado al lujo para contribuir a mejorar la vida de millones de personas y hacer de nuestro planeta un lugar mejor para vivir.
Si desea saber más sobre mí, en esta nota original que publiqué en Facebook el 15 de marzo de 2011 le explico mejor quién soy y cómo empezó todo.




_______________________

story:
We pursue ethical fashion through the use of responsible practices and we need you to make this happen.

 

 

OUR STORY

We created Ankura to bring the latest fashion trends to stand out the eco lifestyle of our clients, that cares about the social impact that can make in their daily activities. We work every day to make you look effortlessly beautiful while helping our Peruvian artisans to grow personally. Being an ethical brand is our top priority.

 

 

WE BELIEVE IN

  1. Sourcing local materials: 

We use only the finest local products that not only result in the making of magnificent pieces of clothing but more importantly result in the well being of the Peruvian breeders, farmers and artisans.

  1. Using natural and organic fibers:

We create confortable and long-lasting design that doesn’t damage the environment in the way other materials like other fabrics do.

  1. Partnering with local workshops:

Our workshop is a place for experimentation and personal growth. Ankura works alongside a group of amazingly talented people like Joaquina, Olinda or Mari with years of experience in the field and a great love for the job they do. 

  1. Empower artisan communities:

We work to create a new, sustainable fashion industry that creates better job opportunities with fair wages and promotes responsible and ethical practices.

THE CROWFUNDING CAMPAIGN

 

We've created this campaign to foster our practices with artisans in rural communities, small workshops and  bring effortless design to a modern woman. To achieve this, we are raising $30,000. 


By ordering the pieces we've carefully curated for this campaign, you'll help us achieve the following:

  • Development and production of our next collection keeping our ethical standards.
  • Keep on working with Peruvian artisans in the creation of our pieces to help bring back the ancestral techniques of our country. 
  • Investigate and experiment with more sustainable materials produced in Peru. 

 

Giving back to local communities is the essence of Ankura.

 

 

OUR COLLECTION

Following Ankura’s efforts towards slow fashion, we design timeless and essential pieces that you can wear throughout all climates without losing focus on our country’s heritage. 

 

OUR FABRICS

 

 

PRESS FEATURES

Throughout this year we've been featured in different fashion and ethical fashion blogs, proving how the versatility of our pieces translates to their own aesthetic and style. The following publications and fashion weeks have featured our work and ideals. 

 

OUR ETHICAL REWARDS

 

Thank you Post Card from Peru!

Thank you for your support! As a reward, we will send you a beautiful Peruvian digital post card and you’ll be featured in a special publication on our website and social media after the campaign ends.  

Leave us your email address to keep you informed of all our upcoming campaigns and early access launches!

 

The Peruvian Amazon Bracelet

These bracelets are part of our Artisan Project in collaboration with a Peruvian Amazon community of artisans. Our bracelets are made from Amazonian seeds, Premium silver and the finest baby alpaca and silk by women artisans.

Available in 5 shades: Black, Black & Citron, Citron, Light Blue, Rose and Tan.

*We’ll contact you to confirm the color of your order after purchase.

 

The Handmade Alpaca Keyring

Our Caral Keyring is part of our Artisan Project initiative, in which we collaborate with different communities of artisan located in Peru. 

Our ethical pom pom keyring is hand made from the softest alpaca and silk blend with a repurposed natural leather strap. 

Available in three shades: Citron (pictured), Light Blue and Rose Pink.

*We’ll contact you to confirm the color of your order after purchase.

 

The Custom Handmade Wallet 

An exquisite and unique piece! This purse is made from Pima cotton by the Caral community. This limited edition mini purse is produced by employing ancient Inca weaving techniques and you can customize it by having your initials embroidered on it.

Measurements: Hx4" Wx5" // Hx10cm Wx13cm

*We’ll contact you to confirm the initials you want embroidered after purchase.

 

The Custom Handmade Clutch 

Do you need something bigger than a purse to carry your stuff? Then this clutch is perfect for you! As the mini purse, this limited edition clutch is produced by employing ancient Inca weaving techniques and you can customize it by having your initials embroidered on it.

Measurements: Hx8" Wx10" // Hx20cm Wx25cm

*We’ll contact you to confirm the initials you want embroidered after purchase.

 

 

The Pima Cotton Ribbed Top

Pre-order one of our favourite pieces from our Premium Cotton Collection. The Brody Top is knitted from 100% Pima Cotton cultivated and dyed in Peru. Its soft and fine feel makes it a luscious option to make your #ootd a Sustainable and ethical outfit.

Color available: Blue&Cream // Sizes: XS, S, M, L (see sizing guide below)

*We’ll contact you to confirm the size and color of your order after purchase.

 

 

Premium Alpaca Knit Skirt

Our Hannah skirt is made from the finest alpaca blend: Baby Alpaca and Mulberry Silk. Its incredible softness comes from an alpaca's first shearing, considered the best quality of alpaca knit available. Blend that with silk and you'll get a very fine and sophisticated knit that is also fresh and comfortable.

Colors available: Black/Cream (pictured), Light Blue/Cream or Citron/Cream 

Sizes: XS, S, M, L (see sizing guide below)

*We’ll contact you to confirm the size and color of your order after purchase.

 

 

Handmade Premium Cotton Skirt

The Georgia skirt, made entirely from hand-woven fabric in the finest Pima Cotton, is one of the key pieces of our collection. This is a great versatile choice for the women on the go.

Colors available: Blue/Olive Green/White (pictured) or Brick Red/Grey/White. 

Sizes: XS, S, M, L (see sizing guide below)

*We’ll contact you to confirm the size and color of your order after purchase.

 

Ethical Total Look (Top+Skirt)

Get your sustainable #ootd ready by wearing our Georgia skirt with the simple but sexy Ilana Organic Cotton Top! Be prepared to have all eyes on you!

Colors available:

Georgia Skirt: Blue/Olive Green/White (pictured) or Brick Red/Grey/White. 

Ilana Top: Beige (pictured)

Sizes: XS, S, M, L (see sizing guide below)

*We’ll contact you to confirm the size and color of your order after purchase.

 

Premium Cotton Handmade Skirts

Our Georgia skirt is so beautiful that having just one isn’t enough! That’s why we offer you two colorful pieces to be all in this season.

Colors available: Blue/Olive Green/White and Brick Red/Grey/White (both pictured)

Sizes: XS, S, M, L (see sizing guide below)

*We’ll contact you to confirm the size and color of your order after purchase.

 

REWARDS TIMELINE ESTIMATION

 

 

SIZE GUIDE

TERMS & CONDITIONS

Shipping Information

Our Crowdfunding Campaign closes by the end of January 2017. All orders will be shipped approximately 45 days after the campaign has ended. A notification email will be sent to you with a tracking number when your order has shipped.

UPDATE: We are now able to do worldwide shipping!

Exchanges Policy

To make an exchange effective please send us an email at sales@ankurabrand.com so we can guide you through it. 

Exchanges will only be accepted if the product is in intact condition and is shipped during seven (7) days after receipt of item. 

We have an Exchange charge that covers the shipping of the new item to you. It's a variable charge, depending on country of shipping. 

Accessories or color preference exchange are not available. 

Duty/VAT charges

You will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges that get applied during shipping.

 

***

 

 

SPREAD THE WORD!

 

Our revolution to change how the fashion industry operates won't change overnight. Stand up with us and help spread the word about Ankura.

We’d greatly appreciate your help by sharing our campaign on your social networks and using #ankuraethical 

You can also help us by signing up to our ethical community and by joining us on Facebook and Instagram 

 

Wear Sustainability, Wear Ankura

Its soft and fine feel makes it a luscious option to make your #ootd a Sustainable and ethical outfit.Color available: Blue&Cream // Sizes: XS, S, M, L (see sizing guide below)*We’ll contact you to confirm the size and color of your order after purchase.  Premium Alpaca Knit SkirtOur Hannah skirt is made from the finest alpaca blend: Baby Alpaca and Mulberry Silk. Its incredible softness comes from an alpaca's first shearing, considered the best quality of alpaca knit available. Blend that with silk and you'll get a very fine and sophisticated knit that is also fresh and comfortable.Colors available: Black/Cream (pictured), Light Blue/Cream or Citron/Cream Sizes: XS, S, M, L (see sizing guide below)*We’ll contact you to confirm the size and color of your order after purchase.  Handmade Premium Cotton SkirtThe Georgia skirt, made entirely from hand-woven fabric in the finest Pima Cotton, is one of the key pieces of our collection. This is a great versatile choice for the women on the go.Colors available: Blue/Olive Green/White (pictured) or Brick Red/Grey/White. Sizes: XS, S, M, L (see sizing guide below)*We’ll contact you to confirm the size and color of your order after purchase. Ethical Total Look (Top+Skirt)Get your sustainable #ootd ready by wearing our Georgia skirt with the simple but sexy Ilana Organic Cotton Top! Be prepared to have all eyes on you!Colors available:Georgia Skirt: Blue/Olive Green/White (pictured) or Brick Red/Grey/White. Ilana Top: Beige (pictured)Sizes: XS, S, M, L (see sizing guide below)*We’ll contact you to confirm the size and color of your order after purchase. Premium Cotton Handmade SkirtsOur Georgia skirt is so beautiful that having just one isn’t enough! That’s why we offer you two colorful pieces to be all in this season.Colors available: Blue/Olive Green/White and Brick Red/Grey/White (both pictured)Sizes: XS, S, M, L (see sizing guide below)*We’ll contact you to confirm the size and color of your order after purchase. REWARDS TIMELINE ESTIMATION  SIZE GUIDETERMS & CONDITIONSShipping InformationOur Crowdfunding Campaign closes by the end of January 2017. All orders will be shipped approximately 45 days after the campaign has ended. A notification email will be sent to you with a tracking number when your order has shipped.UPDATE: We are now able to do worldwide shipping!Exchanges PolicyTo make an exchange effective please send us an email at sales@ankurabrand.com so we can guide you through it. Exchanges will only be accepted if the product is in intact condition and is shipped during seven (7) days after receipt of item. We have an Exchange charge that covers the shipping of the new item to you. It's a variable charge, depending on country of shipping. Accessories or color preference exchange are not available. Duty/VAT chargesYou will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges that get applied during shipping. ***  SPREAD THE WORD! Our revolution to change how the fashion industry operates won't change overnight. Stand up with us and help spread the word about Ankura.We’d greatly appreciate your help by sharing our campaign on your social networks and using #ankuraethical You can also help us by signing up to our ethical community and by joining us on Facebook and Instagram  Wear Sustainability, Wear Ankura

story:
OR visit us online at www.bnorthfleet.com

Like us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/bnortfhleet

Follow us on Instagram at www.instagram.com/northfleet_inc

What is Northfleet Inc.?

Northfleet Inc. is a high-end jewelry brand based in Florida - USA focused on QUALITY over quantity, always.

Here at Northfleet Inc. we strive to create accessories & jewelry using only the finest leather, metal and gemstone creating a fashion forward style that will make you stand out from the crowd.

It’s a new era of fashion. There are no rules. It’s about the personal individual style. Stand out with our high-end craft material custom made accessories.

With your contribution to our campaign, we will be able to continue developing new products and expand our line so you can continue staying ahead of the crowd with custom pieces that are as unique as you are!

What will you get?

Gold Beaded Bracelet

Choose one gold bracelet! ($30, $35, $45 under retail!)

AN-323: Alternating stainless steel beads, real 18 karat yellow gold coating 

AN-322: Continuous stainless steel beads, real yellow 18 karat gold coating 

AN-324: Stainless Steel beads with one encrusted with Genuine Swarosvki CZ diamond center bead, real 18 karat yellow gold coating

Tiger Bead OM Bracelet

The natural blue Tiger Eye Bead Bracelets contains a s925 pure silver with 18 karat yellow gold plating ($80 below retail price!)

Leather Skull Bracelet

Hand crafted genuine black Nappa Leather cord with 316L SS hardware ($100 under retail!)

All 3 Gold Bracelets

Save $30 by purchasing three bracelets for the price of two!  With this deal, you receive all three gold beaded bracelets!  ($140 under retail!)AN-323: Alternating stainless steel beads, real 18 karat yellow gold coating. 

  • AN-323: Alternating stainless steel beads, real 18 karat yellow gold coating 
  • AN-322: Continuous stainless steel beads, real yellow 18 karat gold coating 
  • AN-324: Stainless Steel beads with one encrusted with Genuine Swarosvki CZ diamond center bead, real 18 karat yellow gold coating

Where is Northfleet Inc. heading?

We will use the funds from this campaign to grow our brand on a global scale and continue developing new products for years to come.  Our next two big projects are our custom high-end watches and polarized sunglasses.

Northleet Inc. Watches: Coming in the spring of 2017

Northfleet Inc. Sunglasses: Coming in the Summer of 2017

Who is the Northfleet Inc. Team?

Bruno and Eric met in early 2016 as they were working together at another company.  Both were very interested in high-end jewelry and accessories for men but knew that they could create better quality items for a more affordable price than what was on the market.  After extensive research and planning, Bruno and Eric launched Northfleet Inc.

Risks & Challenges

The challenges of Northfleet Inc. will be getting the word out and generating excitement for the Indiegogo community to participate. With so many great projects to choose from, we hope that Northfleet Inc. will stand apart from the rest. To reach as many people as possible, we are asking friends, families, and various blogs to help spread the word.

Other Ways You Can Help!

We are doing everything we can to spread the word in a variety of ways.  Using social media and blogs we can generate increased traffic to our page which will result in reaching our funding goal. We would appreciate it if you would share Norfleet Inc. on social media through Twitter and Facebook.  For additional information simply click the Facebook and/or Instagram link at the top ^ of the page located beneath the video.

Thank you in advance for your support as we launch Norfleet Inc.!

story:
We started working on Folk after failing to find a quality bag we liked at a decent price. We wanted a durable, lasting bag that had style and was suitable for everyday use. The past year we have been designing, testing, and refining. We now have a bag we are proud to brand with the Folk logo!

Our obsession with quality craftsmanship is rooted in the belief that you should only have to buy a leather bag once.

Folk Leather bags feature five custom compartments to store all your gear. There’s a place for (up to) a 15-inch laptop, tablet, notebook, phone, business cards, along with a large space for whatever else you might need for the day.

 

Folk bags are crafted from full-grain buffalo leather, prized for its durability and unique grain pattern. Full-grain leather is the most desirable grade out there because of its tight vertical grain pattern and high density. This is the same grade of leather that horse saddles and leather work boots are made from.

 

Our bags are assembled using only brass hardware and high-tensile polyester thread, the same stuff used in sails. You won't find any cheap zippers, weak fibers, or ugly cloth liners here - just quality materials that are known to last.

To bring Folk to life we partnered with an established leatherworks company that crafts their bags by hand using traditional techniques and quality materials. They are talented artisans who take immense pride in their work, and it shows.

 

Here is what folks are saying about our bags..

 

It’s an honor to finally share Folk with you! We are excited to spread the word and raise funds to craft our bags on a grander scale. Your support will guaranty you receive a well crafted bag at a fair price, and backed by a 100 year warranty. Thank you for joining us on this journey!

Doing things for the first time can be a challenge. We've made mistakes in the past and have learned from them along the way. We have built a great relationship with our talented leather artisans who are committed to bringing Folk to life. They are highly skilled in their craft and understand that every detail is critical.
 
Even with experience, unforeseen challenges or "acts of god" can slow down the process. These delays are always frustrating. To further limit any potential issues, we have completed a small test run of bags to check for any production problems and to estimate capacity before launching our campaign. It went flawlessly and we are confident that our next round will be just as smooth.

story:
The Design was created by ' love

ABOUT US 


My husband and I are Italian manufacturer of jewelry. When my daughter was born I decided to make a jewel that bind me to her and the day of his birth, a jewel that is binding forever, and that could also lead to growth. I decided to do a heart, unmistakable symbol of love. I created this jewel, and I made a collection called 
LOVE MOM.

Now she has almost completed four years and do not want to ever remove his necklace,because he says "that is the necklace for Mom, my mom gave it to me when I was little" 


The family is an important value




100% MADE IN ITALY


Maintain local production helps support the city where we are, as well,so 

they are observed in all parts of the individual quality.




HANDMADE
EVERY piece of the collection LOVE MOM is HANDMADE And Very thin thread weaves symbolize the unbreakable bond between a mother and daughter.
The collection includes of HEART OF MOM and MOM HEARS YOU.


 
YOU CAN ASK TO PERSONALIZE YOUR JEWEL WITH A DEDICATION or 
ONE DATE FOR YOUR REMEMBER or NAME.
after do you purchase you can tell what you want to write on your jewel



Hypoallergenic 925 with white Rhodium or Yellow gold plating of high quality for absolute resistance to oxidation .

White Swarovski for absolutely brilliant .

STANDARD sizes

( the child can wear from 2 years onwards, because you can adjust the size of the chain )

if the standard sizes not settle YOU CAN ORDER YOUR SIZE !

WE NEED YOUR HELP FOR CONTINUE

we belive in the peoples and by joining forces in What you can do,
 if the campaign will be fine, we present other items of the collection

FLYING LOVE and FLOWER MOM

After that we would like to achieve a 100 % Leather Bags made in Florence project Designed by M di Martina. Our desire is to do a lot but we need you to believe in us.

We need your support!

In order to make this our dream into reality , we need help from people like you to fund not only this country, but also to share with friends and family. We are trying to raise $ 10,000 USD to get this project off the ground.

In return for helping to finance our first production run, we offer our products with factory prices, without additional costs from distributors or retailers.

Like us on Facebook and Instagram to join by clicking the links at the bottom of the page !

Get the word out about the campaign is as important as the funds we raise. Even if you feel you can contribute financially , you can still help this campaign successful :

Share our link , m di martina campaign on Facebook , Twitter , and Google+ .

Forward this email to anyone who might be interested .

It transmits this information to all the magazines , writers , or bloggers covering fashion , small businesses or finance .


Risks and challenges

Although we are a small company , we are proud of our history of Exceeding Expectations.

  • Necklaces and bracelets What were BOTH of Success and delivered on time .
  • With the ' Help of Our co-workers , we organize production and SHIPPING WITH EASE , so that all our valued supporters connected walk away happy and Satisfied .
  • Crowdfunding CAN lead element of risk . Proponents often do not know what they themselves 're entering, and a Benefits Times did not materialize . NOT supporters can be assured that their benefits will be delivered immediately AFTER our campaign will end . WE PRODUCE Initiate an Our products in our own local factory , and having total control of all steps of the production means What You Can set certain that you are getting the ultimate in ride quality .


FAQ


  • When I receive my PERK? Unlike most of the campaigns where to wait months for your advantage. We will send your benefits right after the campaign closes and we receive your choice of color confirmed. Those who support the project at the beginning of the campaign and we get their choice of color before we get the benefit faster.
  • How do I choose a color? We will contact you when the campaign is over to confirm your choices.
  • I bought more PERKS I must add the perk international shipping for each? No, I do not. As long as you added an advantage international shipping.
  • How do I add more PERKS? This can only be done one at a time. Therefore, we add the first PERK go through all the stages of recording and then return to the campaigns main page select another advantage and check out again. You can do this as many times as necessary.


International shipping


We provide free shipping to USA and WORLDWILD

In any case we use DHL air shipment it will be very fast to delivery.


DUTY CHARGES / VAT


If you live outside of Italy or Europe , will be responsible for all expenses duty / VAT applicable .

CUSTOMS

Some customs policies of the countries may be longer than others, remember that you may experience unexpected delays .

Greetings and Thanks to those who inspired the Brand!

     


DO NOT HESITATE to contact us for any questions or for any special request!

story:
Would you risk your life to install warning triangle on the highway even though oncoming cars can crash into you at high speed? No one would. Even you dare to try it, Normal Warning Triangle has many drawbacks as you can see.

 

 

A lot of car accidents such as described in the photo below happen, because many drivers are not willing to risk their life to install warning triangle on the highway due its efficiency. It's possible that someone is facing death on the road right now, trying to place the warning triangle.

 

 

The world’s first

One Touch Warning Triangle “PULLi”

can stop this problem!

 

 

 

 

 
 
 
 

Setting up a normal warning triangle 300ft away (650ft at night) and attaching "PULLi" to the trunk has the same visual effect on the oncoming driver.

It is hard to find the normal warning triangle. However, "PULLi" can be found easily and quickly as soon as you open the trunk!!

 

 

 

 

Produced with small grain elements of glass, a glass-bead reflector has a greater reflection effect!

“PULLi” has a greater effectiveness on the road at night without lights.

”PULLi” has an excellent visual effect without batteries, because it has glass-bead reflectors which reflects the headlight of oncoming car effectively.

 
 

Dramatic temperature changes inside the vehicle due to weather and being unused for long periods may cause battery leakage of safety supplies that use LED.

”PULLi” does not need batteries, so it can be used semi-permanently. Also, it does not require any regular maintenance and replacement.

 

 

Photos above show strong and effective function of rotating 360 degrees when the wind blows, moving up and down / left and right due to the tilting function.

 
 

“PULLi” can be attached firmly because it has strong magnets with Anti Scratch Pad for protecting car painting.

 
 

“PULLi” can transform to an umbrella.

PULLi can be separated from the case when pulling in arrow direction as you press the buttons on the both side at the same time.

 

 

 

 

If you support us with 1 USD, PULLi donates additional 2 USD (total 3 USD) to help poor child patients from car accidents financially. Even though PULLi is made for preventing road collision, we want to provide financial assistance for medical bills to children who are injured in a car accident. We will post details about how donation worked on Facebook, after the crowdfunding ends.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

"BRING YOU TO BETTER LIFE”

We do our best to make a happy life with our ideas.

Base on the car accident experience of the creator of PULLi, we spent 5 years with lots of R&D, making One Touch Warning Triangle “PULLi”. It is faster, easier, and safer than any other normal warning triangle. We have produced 300 units and each unit was tested successfully on the actual roads for variety types of cars. (Beta Testing successfully completed)

We are currently fully ready for mass production.

Please help “PULLi” to protect people’s lives on the highway.

If you are looking for the best gift for whom you love, just do “PULLi”!

 

 

 

 

Q. Isn’t PULLi weak in the wind, because it is an umbrella?

     A.  An umbrella is weak in winds, but PULLi is wind resistant due to the tilting function in which it rotates 360 degrees, moving up and down / left and right. This movement also gives greater visual effects to the oncoming driver.

 

Q. Why does PULLi have a star shape?

     A.  Based on the actual experiment, a unique star shape gives a greater visual effect on oncoming drivers, leading them to slow down. 

 

Q. Isn’t the reflection of red color more effective?

    A.  Oncoming driver may misrecognize the reflection of red color on the road as a tail light of car, rather than a warning signal. PULLi has the reflection of white color, which is easily confounded with the color of the headlights of a car on the opposite side. Hence, it can warn oncoming driver effectively and get him to slow down.

 

Q. Is it possible to set up anywhere on the car?

    A.  PULLi has a strong neodymium magnet inside, so it can be easily attached on any iron part of the vehicle, outside or inside. (We also provide extra metal bracket for special car such as full aluminum body car.)

 

Q. Doesn’t the scratch occur by the powerful magnets?

    A.  No, an anti-scratch form sticker prevents scratch on the surface of the vehicle painting. 

 

Q. According to the Road Traffic Act, other safety supplies except the warning triangle are not allowed by law. Is it true?

    A.  PULLi is attached on the car, not on the road. It falls under the category of car accessary.
story_txt:
Would you risk your life to install warning triangle on the highway even though oncoming cars can crash into you at high speed? No one would. Even you dare to try it, Normal Warning Triangle has many drawbacks as you can see.
 


 


A lot of car accidents such as described in the photo below happen, because many drivers are not willing to risk their life to install warning triangle on the highway due its efficiency. It's possible that someone is facing death on the road right now, trying to place the warning triangle.
 


 
The world’s first
One Touch Warning Triangle “PULLi”
can stop this problem!
 


 

 
 


 
 
 

 


Setting up a normal warning triangle 300ft away (650ft at night) and attaching "PULLi" to the trunk has the same visual effect on the oncoming driver.

It is hard to find the normal warning triangle. However, "PULLi" can be found easily and quickly as soon as you open the trunk!!

 
 


 
 


Produced with small grain elements of glass, a glass-bead reflector has a greater reflection effect!



“PULLi” has a greater effectiveness on the road at night without lights.
”PULLi” has an excellent visual effect without batteries, because it has glass-bead reflectors which reflects the headlight of oncoming car effectively.

 
 



Dramatic temperature changes inside the vehicle due to weather and being unused for long periods may cause battery leakage of safety supplies that use LED.

”PULLi” does not need batteries, so it can be used semi-permanently. Also, it does not require any regular maintenance and replacement.
 
 



Photos above show strong and effective function of rotating 360 degrees when the wind blows, moving up and down / left and right due to the tilting function.
 
 

“PULLi” can be attached firmly because it has strong magnets with Anti Scratch Pad for protecting car painting.
 
 


“PULLi” can transform to an umbrella.
PULLi can be separated from the case when pulling in arrow direction as you press the buttons on the both side at the same time.



 

 

 
 


If you support us with 1 USD, PULLi donates additional 2 USD (total 3 USD) to help poor child patients from car accidents financially. Even though PULLi is made for preventing road collision, we want to provide financial assistance for medical bills to children who are injured in a car accident. We will post details about how donation worked on Facebook, after the crowdfunding ends.
 
 


 
 

 
 
 



 
"BRING YOU TO BETTER LIFE”
We do our best to make a happy life with our ideas.
Base on the car accident experience of the creator of PULLi, we spent 5 years with lots of R&D, making One Touch Warning Triangle “PULLi”. It is faster, easier, and safer than any other normal warning triangle. We have produced 300 units and each unit was tested successfully on the actual roads for variety types of cars. (Beta Testing successfully completed)
We are currently fully ready for mass production.
Please help “PULLi” to protect people’s lives on the highway.
If you are looking for the best gift for whom you love, just do “PULLi”!
 


 

 
 


Q. Isn’t PULLi weak in the wind, because it is an umbrella?
     A.  An umbrella is weak in winds, but PULLi is wind resistant due to the tilting function in which it rotates 360 degrees, moving up and down / left and right. This movement also gives greater visual effects to the oncoming driver.
 
Q. Why does PULLi have a star shape?
     A.  Based on the actual experiment, a unique star shape gives a greater visual effect on oncoming drivers, leading them to slow down. 
 
Q. Isn’t the reflection of red color more effective?
    A.  Oncoming driver may misrecognize the reflection of red color on the road as a tail light of car, rather than a warning signal. PULLi has the reflection of white color, which is easily confounded with the color of the headlights of a car on the opposite side. Hence, it can warn oncoming driver effectively and get him to slow down.
 
Q. Is it possible to set up anywhere on the car?
    A.  PULLi has a strong neodymium magnet inside, so it can be easily attached on any iron part of the vehicle, outside or inside. (We also provide extra metal bracket for special car such as full aluminum body car.)
 
Q. Doesn’t the scratch occur by the powerful magnets?
    A.  No, an anti-scratch form sticker prevents scratch on the surface of the vehicle painting. 
 
Q. According to the Road Traffic Act, other safety supplies except the warning triangle are not allowed by law. Is it true?
    A.  PULLi is attached on the car, not on the road. It falls under the category of car accessary.

story:
Welcome to our Lavo Box Campaign! We are three friends based in Denver who joined together to form a company based on two simple principles - to deliver artisanal, luxurious bath products from all ends of the earth to your doorstep and to give back to those in need within our communities.

The three of us have very different backgrounds and talents, and couldn’t be more excited to combine our variety of skills to bring our new company to life. Jordan works in the marketing biz and, as our resident polyglot, brings a global flair to Lavo Box. Lex, who currently lives in Taiwan, is the technical brain behind the company. And Maddie, the artist of the group, is focused on sourcing the most delightful products available.

Together, we are creating a company that will revolutionize the way you discover new bath and body products. Our subscribers will receive a set of carefully curated products that vary from month to month based on our featured locale. Every Lavo Box also contains a luxury loofah, replacing the old with the new each month! Our ever-evolving collection of natural, sustainable and luxurious sample size products will allow you to experience a variety of products without the full-sized commitment.

At Lavo Box, we are passionate about giving back to the communities that make our business possible. For every box you purchase, a portion of the proceeds will be given to charitable organizations focused on providing basic services to homeless individuals and those with the greatest need. Our first charitable partner is The Gathering Place in Denver, Colorado - offering basic and emergency services - such as showers, laundry facilities, clothing and nutritious meals - to women, children, and transgender individuals experiencing homelessness and extreme poverty in Denver. The Gathering Place also offers personal growth programs, including free GED courses, job readiness trainings, and arts enrichment activities. The population served by The Gathering Place is frequently invisible, but no less in need of access to these services and programs. We all deserve to feel clean - and by helping to provide basic human necessities and services to those in need, we at Lavo Box hope to empower our community members one small act of kindness at a time.

Please contribute to help bring our ideas to life. If we reach our funding goal, you'll make it possible for us to start delivering Lavo Boxes to your doorstep and help the community at the same time. If our goal is not met, all funds raised will be directed to The Gathering Place, in lieu of a refund to our contributors. Either way, we are excited for you to become part of the Lavo Box journey! 

Empowering our communities and bringing the world to your doorstep - one Lavo Box at a time.

story:
100%ORGANIC COTTON, NON CHEMICAL

 OSUNORGANIC.COM

OSUN, built up by Up Town Sport, wants to change how you think about not only what you put in your body but "Change What You Put On Your Body". We are dedicated to producing our yoga pants that not only make you healthier, but they can also help in the fight against global warming, reduce the use of nonrenewable resources...

Are You Ready?

Take care of your body: inside and outside

Most of us know that eating organic helps to reduce the toxins in your body. We work very hard to avoid the pesticides and herbicides from poisoning our bodies by eating foods developed organically. This positive stage in natural living brings us to not just concentrate on what we put into our bodies but what we put on our bodies. Your body needs to breathe! It's time to pay attention to the texture in our clothes that touch the biggest organ in our bodies, our skin.

OSUN ORGANIC COTTON LEGGINGS

Natural Green

Natural Red

Natural Blue

 

Organic Active Head Band

NATURAL COLOR W/O CHEMICAL DYES

ORGANIC IS MUCH BETTER

Organic Cotton Leggings is a possibility for the individuals who want to continue a natural, solid lifestyle on their body. Chemicals such as formaldehyde, bromines, urea tar and incandescent light, just to give a few a examples, can be assimilated through the skin through osmosis from wet, damp clothing that has absorbed sweat from a workout. Wearing organic clothing can kill and reduce that hazard. 

Other than shielding large groups of chemicals from reaching out skin, organic clothing is more durable and wears longer. 

OSUN Organic Cotton Legging Features

Feels Good, Looks Good, Good for You

 

 Who Are We...  

OSUN, powered up and built by Up Town Sports which has been with us for more than 20 years. Having designed, developed, produced and imported over Millions of clothes to the US manufactures. Clothing that sell at all the big retail stores, some you may be wearing now.

Over 65% of the US fashion market uses chemical fibers, fabrics like polyester, nylon, acrylic and so on. The use of these materials has contributed to the warming of the earth. We deeply want to change that, so rest assured that we will not stop at leggings.

Certifications

 Help Spread The Word  

We're on to something, however need your help to get the word out, so please help us by sharing the good news your friends and family. We thank you in advance and please check out our website at www.osunorganic.com

story:
ABOUT KARN GOODE

 I am a technical fashion designer for both men and women, proving my design abilities with outstanding scarves to start.  With our team’s creative talents, eye for detail and use of vivid colours, we design collections of scarves for all ages that put smiles on faces and warm the hearts and souls of all who wear them. We seek out innovative and intriguing fibres from the worlds’ award winners with a dedication to always achieving luxurious and superb quality. We know you will like them. We test all designs before they go to market.  My need for perfection comes from years of practice and experience of breathing in the life style of fashion. Our goal is to please our customers by giving them something truly special.

After launching over 2 years ago, we have managed to create seasonal collections of luxe scarves that are sold on our B2B site (wholesale) and our B2C (retail) site, shipping worldwide. The  brand is carried in luxury boutiques in Canada and the U.S.

Our desire to proceed with the introduction of our women's capsule collection 101 KARN GOODE for FW2016 came earlier than expected and was recently launched in New York City this past May. Investing all our resources, we hoped for the best.  We were thrilled by the positive response and request for multiple orders - many more than we can handle on our own and that is why we need your help. We need to go into production immediately to be on time to deliver for FW2016 orders that have already been placed and to get ready for re-orders. 

Collaborating with award winning mills worldwide, we are extremely committed to keeping quality items alive. We strongly believe in making valuable pieces using natural fibres that feel good against the skin. We honour old traditions and combine them with modern technology without using poor labour conditions and without overproducing. The world of fashion is changing. There is a new movement and awareness. Our youth care deeply about our environment and global working conditions. They are passionate about identifying problems and finding solutions.  We value and honour these ideals by using natural fibres that are produced sustainably without the use of harmful chemicals. 

As a contributor, you will also be promoting these same ideals and will benefit from a very special accessory that will make you feel incredible, keep you stylish, and keep our brand in demand. My goal is to be able to sustain my garment label that will launch in Fall 2016 while keeping  moving forward.  Our  clothing collection is sold out and we are awaiting funds for more fabric and when we achieve this goal we will take on more orders for the collection offering wonderful incentives for our contributors in thanks for your support. 

Against All Odds

 
 

Funding

We need $50,000 . The money will be used for production on orders already placed. The rest we have managed on our own from the previous seasons from our scarf collections. Since we are growing and our product is selling well, we constantly need larger amounts of funding. We took on orders for our new clothing collection so we need funding to make it happen and take up on all of the opportunities we received thus far including re-orders. 
 

 

Our 4F Standard

FABRIC must be valuable

FIT for comfort

FUNCTIONAL for various occasions

FEEL fabulous

 

Fabrics

Our fabrics are very special and much of our budget is spent on sourcing out the most intriguing ones. When we do find them, we test them and make sure they meet our 4F standard above which is often very challenging but well worth the outcome.   Here is a close-up of one we have added into the collection to give you a better perspective on the innovative fibres we use for the scarves and the clothing. Each and every fabric we choose has wonderful attributes. Making clothing is hard work that takes on many stages to achieve the final outcome so we never compromise when it comes to our fabrics. 
 
 

Sheer fabric that is an intricate weave with stripes of birch white and black virgin wool. The wool keeps you warm and the sheer allows the skin to breathe and feel comfortable.

 Perks

One of these wonderful perks, just choose one! OR If you would like to donate freely we will add your name to our list of investors that we are keeping for the future when we will offer investment percentages. You will receive letters of progress and be invited to invest larger amounts for bigger percentage earnings in the future as our company grows. Constant funding is needed to move forward and each season comes with new opportunities and financial challenges that must be met.

Check out the following list of perks which can be purchased through this campaign under PERKS. If you would like to donate larger amounts and receive a scarf as well simply donate the desired sum and write to services@karngoodescarf.com stating the perk you would like to receive and your shipping details.   

The Goode Character Icon

Just send us an image/photo of what you would like as an icon, and we will make it special for you. This icon can be used on your email or social media pages as an avatar. The better the photo, the better the outcome. You can use your cell phone, tablet or camera. It's fun! Check out how we use ours, and while you are there join the following pages for updates on my work. 

 https://www.behance.net/karngoode, 

https://www.facebook.com/karngoodescarf

https://twitter.com/karngoodescarf

Flower Neckerchief

Our neckerchief is perfect for adding colour and can be worn all year. Iridescent silk adorned with a 3D flower and finished with eyelash fringe.  Available in Lake Blue, Salmon, Sunshine Yellow, Cowboy Brown and Sand.

They are also washable! Available while quantities last.

Underfur Scarf

Something for the men, Okay guys we know you are handsome just the way you are but, these scarves turn heads, we promise. No matter how you wear it - sport, laid back or with a suit. They go with everything plus the fact that they are comfortable and feel like the underfur of a baby seal. Available in Polar Sky Blue and Shark Grey. Quality fibre - silk and viscose.

Silk & Suede Fringe Scarf 

Doubled iridescent silk scarf finished with laser-cut suede that is super soft. Hand washable and hangs to dry within minutes.

 Available in Lake Blue, Salmon, Sunshine Yellow, Cowboy Brown and Sand.

Silk & Suede Fringe Bandana

 Available in Lake Blue, Salmon, Sunshine Yellow, Cowboy Brown and Sand.

Silk & Suede Fringe Wrap

 

This wrap can be worn as a top, skirt-wrap, dress-wrap, evening shawl, and a scarf to name but a few wonderful ways to enjoy this piece. It is hand-washable and hangings to dry.  Available in Lake Blue, Salmon, Sunshine Yellow, Cowboy Brown and Sand.

Breakdown of Funding

This round of Funding will be used exactly for the following:
fabric and production for pending fall orders 
the new label 101 karn goode and the content labels 
packaging and new website www.101karngoode.com
trade shows - fees and samples
ALL THE REST we managed on our own through our karn goode scarf collection! 
The fashion industry is a tough one because designers must come up with funding each season so raising money is just another part of it. We are going to start out with two seasons per year until we work up to 4 seasons.

                     

Your Contribution Will

MAKE A BIG DIFFERENCE big or small. Yes even 5$ or $10

From a very early age I was told that the business of fashion was one of the toughest sectors out there to succeed at. This is true and I have dedicated most of my life to this with many struggles along the way,  but the joy and satisfaction of my successes always push me forward. Your contribution helps us to get to the next step. Honestly, that is my secret - step by step. I have never stopped moving forward because of a lack of funds.

  • We make quality garments that are sustainable to our environment, we use companies that care about what they make and care for the people who make them - offering good working and living conditions. 
  • We will be in our third year this November, and ahead of schedule launching our womenswear collection. Our plan is a 10 year plan that will eventually include menswear along with other products such as shoes, bags, and home decor. Spend the next 7 years with us and watch us grow. Let's celebrate together!
  • We want to build slowly and accurately into a brand of trust. 
 

Risks & Challenges

The hardest thing has been cash flow as we have had to earn a living with our business from the get go. Each season we have needed a minimum of $30,000 + just to keep moving along. Each season comes around quickly with many opportunities, most we have had to decline because of a lack of funds or a lack of time to raise the funds. We needed to start our womenswear collection late in the season because we had trouble financing it in such a hurry while maintaining our scarf collection at the same time. But even so, we managed to get to New York to present the collection and we did get orders. I just wish we could present on time to see our full potential so that is a goal for the Spring collection which we will show in September in New York and Paris. People get very excited when they see our product and this is what urges me to get it out there. 

  • What qualifies us to overcome these hurdles is sheer drive, patience, and perseverance. That and my experience and love for design that keep me going. I have worked with luxury fabrics that are truly difficult to handle at times but the puzzle of it all intrigues me to no end. My niche is that I love working with difficult fabrics and making luxury items that are more affordable. The challenge of getting these expensive fibres and keeping production costs lower will be to eventually build an in-house team of special ateliers. This will be a challenge we must overcome.  
  • Our plan to hire people to help us with sales and production as well as e-commerce and social media will allow us to have our company run while we are away at trade shows, trunk shows,  and presentations.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you absolutely can't contribute, no worries, here are some other ways to support us:

  • If you like what we do but simply cannot contribute we will give special promotions for following us on Face Book and Twitter,  so follow us!
  • Also we have the Goode Character Icon that allows you to donate $20.  
  • Feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Follow us on Instagram, we just joined when we started this campaign!

And that's all there is to it. Thank you for your support, it truly MOVES me and I know it is a privilege that you have read the campaign and taken the time to care........

Our plan is a 10 year plan that will eventually include menswear along with other products such as shoes, bags, and home decor. Spend the next 7 years with us and watch us grow. Let's celebrate together!
We want to build slowly and accurately into a brand of trust. 


 

Risks & Challenges
The hardest thing has been cash flow as we have had to earn a living with our business from the get go. Each season we have needed a minimum of $30,000 + just to keep moving along. Each season comes around quickly with many opportunities, most we have had to decline because of a lack of funds or a lack of time to raise the funds. We needed to start our womenswear collection late in the season because we had trouble financing it in such a hurry while maintaining our scarf collection at the same time. But even so, we managed to get to New York to present the collection and we did get orders. I just wish we could present on time to see our full potential so that is a goal for the Spring collection which we will show in September in New York and Paris. People get very excited when they see our product and this is what urges me to get it out there. 

What qualifies us to overcome these hurdles is sheer drive, patience, and perseverance. That and my experience and love for design that keep me going. I have worked with luxury fabrics that are truly difficult to handle at times but the puzzle of it all intrigues me to no end. My niche is that I love working with difficult fabrics and making luxury items that are more affordable. The challenge of getting these expensive fibres and keeping production costs lower will be to eventually build an in-house team of special ateliers. This will be a challenge we must overcome.  
Our plan to hire people to help us with sales and production as well as e-commerce and social media will allow us to have our company run while we are away at trade shows, trunk shows,  and presentations.



Other Ways You Can Help
If you absolutely can't contribute, no worries, here are some other ways to support us:

If you like what we do but simply cannot contribute we will give special promotions for following us on Face Book and Twitter,  so follow us!
Also we have the Goode Character Icon that allows you to donate $20.  
Feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools!
Follow us on Instagram, we just joined when we started this campaign!

And that's all there is to it. Thank you for your support, it truly MOVES me and I know it is a privilege that you have read the campaign and taken the time to care........

story:
About FIFTEENZEROFIVE


Have you ever destroyed your glasses because you put it into the neckline of your t-shirt?

Probably it happened to everybody.

Some day I had the idea for the first feature and so I integrated a string in the t-shirts and hoodies where you can hook your glasses in.


FIFTEENZEROFIVE was born. A smart streetwear label which gives you more fun in urban life with its smart features.

Whether you are skateboarding, cycling, inlineskating, hanging around or work in the office, through the integrated glassholder your glasses will always be safe with you and you are not going to be a "glasshole"


By the way!

Dear Google!

Please feel free to send me your new google glass 2.

Thanks in advance



The second feature is against long hair problems. I have long hair and I like to wear caps outside. But not in the office during the day.
I often can't find a hair tie when I needed one. And you don't think about it until you need one.
So I integrated a hair tie holder in the caps and you will ever have your hair tie with you.



About the clothes


The clothes are all made of organic cotton. Currently the upgrading and finishing of the t-shirts, hoodies and caps is handmade. The prints are made of flock film.
But with increasing amounts I will switch to screen printing.


Here are the t-shirts in white and grey




Here are the poloshirts in white and navy





Here are the Zip Hoodies in grey and black




Why I need Indiegogo


The money you pledge will help me to distribute my label to shops in Germany and Austria for now. For worldwide shipping there will be the FIFTEENZEROFIVE onlineshop.
This means, I will take a roadtrip through Germany and Austria for a few weeks and the onlineshop will be relaunched. But to do this, I have to take a break from my daily job.
Part of the money will go directly into manufacturing these t-shirts, hoodies and caps.
If I am able to stretch the funding goal, I will also be able to introduce new smart stuff.

It also helps a lot when you share the project with your friends. Some of them would be very happy about that.


About the Rewards


When the campaign is over, I will contact you to confirm shipping details, style and size.
I will give you sizing details before you make your sizing choice so that it is a great fit.

5 Euro
big virtual high five

10 Euro
big virtual high five + 25% discount voucher for a later online-shopping

t-shirt Early bird 30 Euro  75x
one t-shirt, free choice, + 25% discount voucher for a later online-shopping,
5 Euro shipping EU, 10 Euro shipping worldwide

poloshirt Early bird 35 Euro  75x
one poloshirt, free choice, + 25% discount voucher for a later online-shopping,
5 Euro shipping EU, 10 Euro shipping worldwide

zip-hoodie Early bird 50 Euro  75x
one zip-hoodie, free choice, + 25% discount voucher for a later online-shopping,
5 Euro shipping EU, 10 Euro shipping worldwide

t-shirt 35 Euro
one t-shirt, free choice, + 25% discount voucher for a later online-shopping,
5 Euro shipping EU, 10 Euro shipping worldwide

poloshirt 40 Euro
one poloshirt, free choice, + 25% discount voucher for a later online-shopping,
5 Euro shipping EU, 10 Euro shipping worldwide

zip-hoodie 60 Euro
one zip-hoodie, free choice, + 25% discount voucher for a later online-shopping,
5 Euro shipping EU, 10 Euro shipping worldwide

25 Euro
one cap, + 25% discount voucher for a later online-shopping,
5 Euro shipping EU, 10 Euro shipping worldwide




Thank you for your support!



If you have a question, please contact me: robert.halmer@fifteenzerofive.de

story: We have all been a witness to the annoying yet stressful ordeal Shae has been put through over the past month or so. We have all probably also been a witness to the incredible lengths Shae has gone for his friends and clients with his impeccable attention to detail that one would be hard pressed to find elsewhere. However, with Shae, this attention to detail does not stop with the garment he is producing as he is incredibly sensitive and intuitive to the person. It's no wonder you see Shae post pictures of not only designing the clothing, but taking on other responsibilities that basically shape the entire look of whichever event he is working with and not only that, but he'll be invited to attend the event as friend to top it all off. It's time we let Shae know that we notice the details and so therefore we would like to help out with this detail. Typically it would be easy to just say "forget it" but for the SAKE OF ART and something beautiful about to be lost to the closets in the skies, lets all chip in for our dear friend and the very talented and hardworking Shae to get his item back without having to also suffer the senseless financial loss at the hands of a misguided corporation who clearly does not put the same care into it's customer as Shae has into his. And if for some reason the return is not to be and we are too late with our attempt at rescue, then Shae at the very least can take these funds to possibly do something creative that will leave a lasting and positive outcome to this unfortunate month in our wonderful friends year.
