story:
THE AZZO SALVI VISION

(Founded 2013)


In today's retail market, one often finds himself needing to make a choice between paying a premium price for top end designer luxury goods, or shopping at a more affordable price in the lower high street retail shops ultimately compromising on quality and uniqueness
So we say, why cant you have both? A product with the best quality, a product with unique and distinctive features, all at an honest price.

At Azzo Salvi, the vision is simple.

Create the best products ever made at a price that is much more affordable.

How do we do it?
We dedicate a lot of time to our manufacturing process. This ensures that our products are "as good (often better)"  as anything from the top brands.

However, we are able to keep our prices respectable by simply cutting the multi million pound cost of celebrity ad campaigns used by the top fashion houses.

Furthermore, we do not have the ultra expensive costs of elaborate high end stores and  prime real estate costs   (with all the maintenance & staff overhead that go with it). 
We are able to sell the same quality products as the top designers but offered at a fraction of the price.

We have a strong belief that style and fashion should be accessible to all. With this in mind, we have dedicated to launch our collection of High end, High quality fashion shoes designed with a bit of a twist, a full focus on quality and a keen attention to detail & design.

 All this while keeping the cost at a reasonable price.

 



From Conception to Creation
All our designs start on our drawing board at our offices in England. Here the sketches and the technical details are done, the materials and colour themes are matched and created.




Our Chelsea Boots

Once we have gone through the process of design creation, pattern drawings, material and colour selection, the initial samples are made to very  strict specification.

Our products are exclusively made in Europe. Our carefully selected production partners in the United Kingdom, Italy, Spain and Portugal make up our 4 manufacturing locations.

We work with the best local craftsmen and Artisans using the best materials and fabrics in an effort to create true works of art.



The result is a collection of beautiful crafted products with the same quality as the best items of any top brand…, But at a fraction of the designer premium prices.

Every care and attention is taken in the manufacturing of all our products.

With our Chelsea boots all made using 100% Italian calf skin leather.




We pride ourselves in the knowledge that the quality of our items,  

The beauty and flow of our designs,

And durability of our products can compete with anything in today’s market.

We often like to put a little bit of a twist into our designs to give it that extra uniqueness.




Quality
We have a strong focus on the quality and finish of our products. We pay attention to every material, fabric and fittings, ensuring that their is perfection in every cut and every stitch. 
Highest quality products at an affordable price. that is what we aim to achieve.

Ethics
By using Manufacturers based in the EU (mainly the United Kingdom, Italy, Portugal and Spain), we ensure that all our products are made ethically and with respect to human working conditions. We advocate for better working conditions for everyone, and take a strong stance against child labour or inhumane working conditions sometimes used by some other manufacturers in a bid to maximise their profits. it is important to us that all the members of our production team work under very decent conditions and are paid well for their skills.

Material
All our leather shoes are made using the best European top grain leather. all produced treated and processed in Italy. With a strong network we are able to source these materials and then process them in-house using our European leather manufacturing partners. this ensures we have the highest quality material for all our leather shoes.

The Challenges we face
We have been able to create a dedicated customer base and sufficient interest from the public.
 We have recorded very good sales and demand for our products is on the rise. The feedback that we have received for or products have been fantastic.
But like any other new business, we face the problem of cash flow and this affects our production circle. Meaning we are having a lot of unfulfilled demands and potential loss of sales.
In the 2 years that we have been in business, we have found that we often have to wait for some products to sell before we can commit the funds into developing other products
We are hoping to raise the funds that will enable us turnover higher production units. Higher production units will also mean we can ring our prices down even further and ultimately generate higher sales.
We aim to make our mark within the industry through our unique designs, the quality of our products, and most importantly our price bracket.
With your help, we can make this happen.



Be a part of our vision
We need your help in raising the funds to take Azzo Salvi to the next level.
In the last 2 years since the business was set up, we have spent a lot of time creating our designs, mastering our processes and building our manufacturing network. 
However, we are not able to afford the cost of a full production run which will help to bring our cost down to the level we want it to be.
We therefore need to raise the money to ease the pressure on our production runs.
At the moment , with good sales and continuously growing demand, we are unable to meet our potential high sales mark due to our inability to invest cash into larger production runs, and due to the production/turnover time scale.
 We need an  infusion of cash to balance the demand and supply of our products.
With your help, we hope to raise the funds needed to go into larger scale production.
We are also aiming to commit some of the money raised to hosting our high level fully functional eCommerce website (www.azzosalvi.co.uk).
We already have the domain name registered and just need to get the website designed to our specification and also get the products to go onto the website to steadily increase our presence in the market.
There is a plan to launching our brand officially once the website is in place.
We have collaborated with some reputable institutions in the UK to offer their students work experience and an opportunity to gain credits for their educational qualifications by doing certain projects with us.
We have specifically identified the area of publicity as the best area to work with these carefully selected partners.
We have planned a clever social media campaign that will ensure that we are noticed within the industry.
We have thought about ways to make our campaigns low budget and precise. By partnering with a handful of university undergraduates and college students who are happy to work with us on our campaigns as part of their academic credits, and also for the work experience, we strongly feel we have found the perfect format.
The arrangement suits our business model perfectly as we will be involving young people within the community by giving them the experience that will be useful to them in the future.
Furthermore, we will have access to high technology gadgets to run our campaigns as these are available at the universities and colleges that we have partnered with.
This will keep our advertising campaign and marketing to a minimal cost, it will also be beneficial to our youths who will be gaining huge experience and exposure through the project
Working with these students will also be beneficial for our long term goals as today's students are potential life long customers.
Our initial marketing campaign will be centred on a huge push on social media and how to maximise the use of the platforms that we have proposed to use 
(Mainly Facebook, Twitter and Instagram)


We intend to create video Campaigns on social media using some of our catchy phrases and slogans


Your Impact

With your contribution, we will be able to have our products ready for our official launch and to meet the demand of our ever growing customer base.

We will keep you informed as to the progress and growth of our company and you would have been a part in establishing something great and everlasting.

and hype following our social media campaign. 

The impact of your contribution will not only be beneficial for us, but as we have made contact with some college students in the media sector, we feel that this will also be beneficial to them in giving them useful experience in the working and branding campaign of a fast growing business.


Other Ways You Can Help

There are other ways that you can help us achieve our vision. By simply spreading the word of our company, our products and our campaign, you will be doing us a whole lot of good.

Please take time to inform your friends and networks about us, and share this link on your social media pages. 

Even by simply following us on instagram, Facebook or twitter you will have done something to move us in the direction we wish to go, and eventually we will reach a larger audience.

(Our Social media handle is @azzosalvi)

Also remember to use the Indiegogo share tool.

We can not achieve this target without you.

We invite you to e a part of our vision.

We appreciate the time you have taken to read this.


Our Perks

We value your help in trying to assist us in reaching our goal. We have listed some perks that we given out as a thank for your support.

Chelsea Boots: Choose one of our Chelsea Boots. Made in Italy. 100% genuine leather, including sole and insole. (Please see perks for details).












The Socks Package: Choose from our package of fashionable socks. These are probably the best socks you will ever buy.  (Please see perks for details)






SOME OF OUR OTHER PRODUCTS

Suits: Our Collection of suits have been made using some of the bbest cotton fabrics in the world. Finely cut for a modern sophisticated look to give that perfect gentleman image. Great for work and Play ! 

The Cool Blues


The Pinstripe Gent


The Dinner Jacket





The Camel


Summer Blue


Dare To go Pink


OUR OTHER FOOTWEAR

Larry: Our Larry has become very popular. These shoes are made from recycled material using a fine technique to ensure that they are stylish, durable and modern.

These are probably the most comfortable shoes you will ever wear.


Larry Collection Boat Shoes

Accessories

Eyewear


Belts

Socks






WHEN DO I GET MY ITEMS?

Our Manufacturing partners are standing by and are ready to start production. 

Shortly before our campaign ends, we will get to work. First we will collate all items, and contact all backers to provide mailing addresses, pack choices e.t.c.  then we will start to get all necessary preparations in place for the manufacturing process to begin.

By the time the funds clear at the end of the campaign we will have been ready to immediately start production.

1 week Before end of campaign:  Backer survey (choose packs, provide mailing address, e.t.c.)

 Week funds clear: Production starts.

4-12 weeks: Final packaging and shipping

We will do everything in our power to expedite this process and get you your items in the shortest time possible.

PLEASE NOTE

Duty/VAT charges: If you live outside of the European Union, you will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges.

Customs: Some countries are known for being very slow with customs, and you probably know if you live in one. We're sorry that we can't put a magic stamp on our packages to help them get through faster. 

We'll update you frequently about our progress, and if there are any blips along the way, we'll let you know! 


This is what Azzo Salvi hopes to establish. This is what we stand for, and hopefully with your help, we shall.


We are Azzo Salvi. Welcome to our world.
story_txt:
THE AZZO SALVI VISION

(Founded 2013)


In today's retail market, one often finds himself needing to make a choice between paying a premium price for top end designer luxury goods, or shopping at a more affordable price in the lower high street retail shops ultimately compromising on quality and uniqueness

So we say, why cant you have both? A product with the best quality, a product with unique and distinctive features, all at an honest price.

At Azzo Salvi, the vision is simple.

Create the best products ever made at a price that is much more affordable.

How do we do it?

We dedicate a lot of time to our manufacturing process. This ensures that our products are "as good (often better)"  as anything from the top brands.

However, we are able to keep our prices respectable by simply cutting the multi million pound cost of celebrity ad campaigns used by the top fashion houses.
Furthermore, we do not have the ultra expensive costs of elaborate high end stores and  prime real estate costs   (with all the maintenance & staff overhead that go with it). 
We are able to sell the same quality products as the top designers but offered at a fraction of the price.


We have a strong belief that style and fashion should be accessible to all. With this in mind, we have dedicated to launch our collection of High end, High quality fashion shoes designed with a bit of a twist, a full focus on quality and a keen attention to detail & design.

 All this while keeping the cost at a reasonable price.

 


From Conception to CreationAll our designs start on our drawing board at our offices in England. Here the sketches and the technical details are done, the materials and colour themes are matched and created.

Our Chelsea Boots

Once we have gone through the process of design creation, pattern drawings, material and colour selection, the initial samples are made to very  strict specification.
Our products are exclusively made in Europe. Our carefully selected production partners in the United Kingdom, Italy, Spain and Portugal make up our 4 manufacturing locations.
We work with the best local craftsmen and Artisans using the best materials and fabrics in an effort to create true works of art.








The result is a collection of beautiful crafted products with the same
quality as the best items of any top brand…, But at a fraction of the designer
premium prices.
Every
care and attention is taken in the manufacturing of all our products.
With our
Chelsea boots all made using 100% Italian calf skin leather.





We pride ourselves in the knowledge that the quality of our items,  
The beauty and flow of our designs,
And durability of our products can compete with anything in today’s
market.
We often like to put a little bit of a twist into our designs to give
it that extra uniqueness.







Quality

We have a strong focus on the quality and finish of our products. We pay attention to every material, fabric and fittings, ensuring that their is perfection in every cut and every stitch. 

Highest quality products at an affordable price. that is what we aim to achieve.
Ethics

By using Manufacturers based in the EU (mainly the United Kingdom, Italy, Portugal and Spain), we ensure that all our products are made ethically and with respect to human working conditions. We advocate for better working conditions for everyone, and take a strong stance against child labour or inhumane working conditions sometimes used by some other manufacturers in a bid to maximise their profits. it is important to us that all the members of our production team work under very decent conditions and are paid well for their skills.
MaterialAll our leather shoes are made using the best European top grain leather. all produced treated and processed in Italy. With a strong network we are able to source these materials and then process them in-house using our European leather manufacturing partners. this ensures we have the highest quality material for all our leather shoes.
The Challenges we face
We have been able to create a dedicated customer base and sufficient interest from the public.
 We have recorded very good sales and demand for our products is on the rise. The feedback that we have received for or products have been fantastic.
But like
any other new business, we face the problem of cash flow and this affects our
production circle. Meaning we are having a lot of unfulfilled demands and
potential loss of sales.
In the 2 years that we have been in business, we have found that we often have to wait for some products to sell before we can commit the funds into developing other products
We are
hoping to raise the funds that will enable us turnover higher production units. Higher production units will also mean we can ring our prices down even further and ultimately generate higher sales.
We aim to make our mark within the industry through our unique designs, the quality of our products, and most importantly our price bracket.
With your
help, we can make this happen.




Be a part of our vision
We need your help in raising the funds to take Azzo Salvi to the next level.
In the last 2 years since the business was set up, we have spent a lot of time creating our designs, mastering our processes and building our manufacturing network. 
However, we are not able to afford the cost of a full production run which will help to bring our cost down to the level we want it to be.
We therefore need to raise the money to ease the pressure on our production runs.
At the moment , with good sales and continuously growing demand, we are unable to meet our potential high sales mark due to our inability to invest cash into larger production runs, and due to the production/turnover time scale.
 We need an  infusion of cash to balance the demand and supply of our products.
With your help, we hope to raise the funds needed to go into larger scale production.

We are also aiming to commit some of the money raised to hosting our high level fully functional eCommerce website (www.azzosalvi.co.uk).

We already have the domain name registered and just need to get the website designed to our specification and also get the products to go onto the website to steadily increase our presence in the market.
There is a plan to launching our brand officially once the website is in place.
We have collaborated with some reputable institutions in the UK to offer their students work experience and an opportunity to gain credits for their educational qualifications by doing certain projects with us.
We have specifically identified the area of publicity as the best area to work with these carefully selected partners.
We have planned a clever social media campaign that will ensure that we are noticed within the industry.
We have thought about ways to make our campaigns low budget and precise. By partnering with a handful of university undergraduates and college students who are happy to work with us on our campaigns as part of their academic credits, and also for the work experience, we strongly feel we have found the perfect format.
The arrangement suits our business model perfectly as we will be involving young people within the community by giving them the experience that will be useful to them in the future.
Furthermore, we will have access to high technology gadgets to run our campaigns as these are available at the universities and colleges that we have partnered with.
This will keep our advertising campaign and marketing to a minimal cost, it will also be beneficial to our youths who will be gaining huge experience and exposure through the project
Working with these students will also be beneficial for our long term goals as today's students are potential life long customers.
Our initial marketing campaign will be centred on a huge push on social media and how to maximise the use of the platforms that we have proposed to use 
(Mainly Facebook, Twitter and Instagram)

We intend to create video Campaigns on social media using some of our catchy phrases and slogans



Your Impact
With your contribution, we will be able to have our products ready for our official launch and to meet the demand of our ever growing customer base.
We will keep you informed as to the progress and growth of our company and you would have been a part in establishing something great and everlasting.
and hype following our social media campaign. 
The impact of your contribution will not only be beneficial for us, but as we have made contact with some college students in the media sector, we feel that this will also be beneficial to them in giving them useful experience in the working and branding campaign of a fast growing business.

Other Ways You Can Help
There are other ways that you can help us achieve our vision. By simply spreading the word of our company, our products and our campaign, you will be doing us a whole lot of good.
Please take time to inform your friends and networks about us, and share this link on your social media pages. 
Even by simply following us on instagram, Facebook or twitter you will have done something to move us in the direction we wish to go, and eventually we will reach a larger audience.
(Our Social media handle is @azzosalvi)
Also remember to use the Indiegogo share tool.
We can not achieve this target without you.
We invite you to e a part of our vision.
We appreciate the time you have taken to read this.

Our Perks

We value your help in trying to assist us in reaching our goal. We have listed some perks that we given out as a thank for your support.
Chelsea Boots: Choose one of our Chelsea Boots. Made in Italy. 100% genuine leather, including sole and insole. (Please see perks for details).



















The Socks Package: Choose from our package of fashionable socks. These are probably the best socks you will ever buy.  (Please see perks for details)












SOME OF OUR OTHER PRODUCTS
Suits: Our Collection of suits have been made using some of the bbest cotton fabrics in the world. Finely cut for a modern sophisticated look to give that perfect gentleman image. Great for work and Play ! 

The Cool Blues



The Pinstripe Gent




The Dinner Jacket







The Camel





Summer Blue


Dare To go Pink


OUR OTHER FOOTWEAR
Larry: Our Larry has become very popular. These shoes are made from recycled material using a fine technique to ensure that they are stylish, durable and modern.
These are probably the most comfortable shoes you will ever wear.

Larry Collection Boat Shoes







Accessories
Eyewear


Belts


Socks

Our Manufacturing partners are standing by and are ready to start production. 
Shortly before our campaign ends, we will get to work. First we will collate all items, and contact all backers to provide mailing addresses, pack choices e.t.c.  then we will start to get all necessary preparations in place for the manufacturing process to begin.
By the time the funds clear at the end of the campaign we will have been ready to immediately start production.
1 week Before end of campaign:  Backer survey (choose packs, provide mailing address, e.t.c.)
 Week funds clear: Production starts.
4-12 weeks: Final packaging and shipping
We will do everything in our power to expedite this process and get you your items in the shortest time possible.PLEASE NOTEDuty/VAT charges: If you live outside of the European Union, you will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges.Customs: Some countries are known for being very slow with customs, and you probably know if you live in one. We're sorry that we can't put a magic stamp on our packages to help them get through faster. We'll update you frequently about our progress, and if there are any blips along the way, we'll let you know!

We are Azzo Salvi. Welcome to our world.

story:
Check the UPDATES tab above to discover where our tulle skirts are featured!


How to

  1. Select your perk from the column on the right of the page.
  2. Place the order.
  3. Once we receive confirmation of your payment we will send you an email asking you all about the details regarding your order (style, color, dimensions etc.).
  4. Sit back and relax as we will send you another email before sending your order!


Comment faire 

  1. Sélectionnez votre avantage (perk) dans la colonne de droite sur la page d’accueil.
  2. Effectuez la commande.
  3. Après la confirmation de votre paiement, nous vous adresserons un email en vous demandant tous les détails de votre commande (style, couleur, dimensions) 
  4. Asseyez-vous et détendez-vous ! Nous vous ferons parvenir un e-mail avant la livraison votre commande !


This is GONA!

and if you take a closer look, these are its' features!         

   Give a girl some tulle and she'll become a princess! 

                 Who is Ella Patro? and why GONA?


First of all, if you were wondering, GONA in translation from basque is skirt and doubles as the name for the first designer collection signed by me. 


Hello everybody, my name is Ella Patro and this is my story!  I grew up in a small village near Timisoara, with 3 siblings and ever since I can remember I loved to draw, sketch, sew, to sum it up: create! When I started school, my talents started to get some kind of recognition and my drawings were constantly being praised by my professors.  By the time I was 16, I had already designed the interior of a kindergarten. That was my first job as an artist and the tipping point for my future career. I worked as a kindergarten teacher for 6 years in order to afford college and learn how to be a designer. I graduated at 22 and immediately left for Bucharest to become the fashion designer I always wanted to be. Things did not really go as planned at first, I hit a few bumps but I couldn't give up. I went back to school for 6 months and attended a fashion design class. GONA was one of the pieces I created for the final exam and it was also the piece that got me an A.

This was the spark that started the fire and it was the first moment I actually believed I could do big things. I called some friends, we brainstormed a lot of ideas and the rest is history. Check out our team below!


Risks & Challenges


Every start-up comes with risks attached and we are a start-up. But, we think we have matured in the last 9 months, we have a strong supply chain, an experimented and professional team and can overcome any challenge that comes our way. If orders are overwhelming we will invest in assuring a larger production team to meet our deadlines. All the funds received during this campaign will go towards upgrading our equipment, securing our suppliers, recruiting young designers and tailors in order give them a professional medium to work in and of course producing the perks for our supporters.


Return Policy


You can return the skirt within 30 days from delivery for any adjustments regarding measures. We can assure you that, from our side, we will deliver your GONA in the exact measures you provided. We will not assume any error(s) you made when measuring yourself or if you change your mind after your skirt has been produced.


Frequently Asked Questions (F.A.Q.)

 

1.  What kind of tulle are you using for the skirts?

We only use premium materials, so the softest tulle out there.  Just to share an interesting fact with you: we can use for the Cocktail GONA up to 15 sqm (~162 sq feet) of tulle and still keep the weight of the skirt under 350 gr (~0,78 pounds).

2.  Where are the skirts designed and manufactured?

The GONA concept was born in Bucharest, Romania and this is where all the perks will be manufactured.

3.  When do I get to choose the style, color and measures?

After you submit your payment you will receive an email from us asking those exact questions; usually within 5 business days after you place your order.

4.  When do I receive the perks I ordered?

Depending on the perk you chose, shipping starts in June.

5.  How long does shipping take?

For Romania, shipping usually takes 1-2 business days, for the EU allow up to 5-8 business days and for the rest of the world, allow 5-12 business days for delivery.

6.  How much does shipping cost?

Shipping is free in Romania. For the EU shipping is 12 USD and for the rest of the world 18 USD.

7.  What taxes do I need to pay when picking up my perks?

To our knowledge, there is no extra cost when you pick-up your perk.

8.  What if I want a personalized perk? How do I get it?

Just drop us an e-mail at me@EllaPatro.com and we will work together on meeting your requests.

story:
Short Summary

  • My name is Elijah Morey, I am a 20 year old college sophomore working toward a double major in financial economics and supply chain management. Running this business from my dorm room is an exciting challenge I am ready to face head on! I have four years of experience in business as my dad and I started a hot sauce company called Elijah's Xtreme. Through this I have learned about inventory management, networking, sales, and so many other things that have propelled me into my eSleeve venture. I have dreamed for this day to come since I was 12 years old selling products on eBay, that I bought wholesale from China.
  • I have an experienced, dependable team to help with packaging and distribution of eSleeve along with a legal team to help guide me. We are raising money to help expand our product line to different colors, including school colors, graphics and glow in the dark. In addition, we will expand our products to cover similar e-cig products such as the Juno and Phix. I have an extensive background in CAD and 3D design. This allows us to keep the design and refining process all in-house, saving money, and in the end, lowering the overall cost. We will be able to show the next set of colors over the next few weeks when we reach our goal!
  • Every purchase will help us get one step closer to achieving our goal. One step at a time is how we plan to get to this goal, taking it in small pieces to be manageable and contained.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are looking for $2,500 to give us a good start in the venture of better quality 
  • For this campaign we are releasing two colors: Black & White
  • Included in this we will be doing 100 limited edition spattered paint versions 
    • 50 Pink and Purple 
    • 50 Blue and Green 
  • Over the next few weeks as we reach our goal I will be releasing the newest colors adding them to the line up for later sales on our website which should be up within the next month or two. We will let you know in updates to come.
  • We can make this work, I know how big the market is for JUUL products and it is only a matter of time before this gets traction.

Risks & Challenges

  • The main challenges we will face is balancing the quantity demanded and getting the price point to an equilibrium. Achieving a price under $10 will happen over time as we build relationships with our outside resources and start our venture into wholesaling to distributors, pushing the product throughout the United States. 
  • I am excited to have this opportunity to make eSleeve the next big thing for JUUL and will try my best to make this the best product through quality, support and ease-of-use!

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you think this product is as cool as I do please shout it out, share it, post pictures. Do whatever you want just as long as the pictures are getting out and being shared. I am a believer that this product will sell itself once it is seen and understood.

story:
Hello Indiegogo community! I am Jean-François Ducros, the founder and team leader of Papa, Maman et Moi. I officially launched Papa, Maman et Moi in 2017 and have received amazing reviews for our first products. Today, I am here to introduce the smartest and most thoughtful diaper bag you have ever seen. Trust me, this backpack will change your everyday life as a parent!

  • medically verified products that were tested by parents
  • 100% French expert consultancy and a product that is certified by independent labels
  • comfort, security and well-being of the whole family

The Jule‘s bag is a diaper bag for men, which combines the needs of men as business men as well as while being fathers. Coming in an elegant and practical design, it is the most comfortable diaper bag on the market with a changing mat ticker than 0,4 cm. The bag opening system has enabled us to win the 2017 Innovation Award, which is further proof of our commitment to innovation and quality.

It has independent compartments for all members of the family: baby, parents and older brothers or sisters. Being compact and very organized, its dimensions are adjusted to contain everything you need for everyday life and even traveling with your baby. Clever, easy and quick to convert, the back padding can be transformed into a comfortable and washable changing table.

This diaper bag is both a shoulder bag and a backpack. Wipes and the bottle pocket are directly accessible through well thought openings, even while walking and the removable trash pocket can also be used in every configuration.

Thanks to its multimedia pocket, every dad can put away his computer or tablet easily, to be connected everywhere he goes. And also aesthetically, our elegant and simple bag will finish every look – no more diaper bags with teddy bear prints, flowers and ribbons!

Back pack and shoulder bag Convertible in no time, worn as a backpack, the Jule’s Bag gives you enough freedom to take care of your children and not having your hands occupied. The handles adjust to every type of pram.

Multiple pockets Our backpack is equipped with multiple stow spaces to never forget anything during your walks. There is enough space for the baby’s and parents belongings, diapers and baby bottles.

Tissue wipes access Cleverly devised, the bag has an easy access on it’s sides to reach tissue wipes without even opening the bag. It is even so simple you won’t see it among the stitching.

Isothermal pocket The bag is equipped with an isothermal pocket of 1.5L, perfect for long family walks. An opening on the side of the bag permits to reach a baby bottle without the need to put down the backpack.

Multimedia pocket Two pockets are just for parent’s use. One for the keys, smart phone, wallet and another for the laptop or tablet. It is detached for the safety of your belongings.

Clothes rack The interior of the backpack is developed to organize the baby’s clothes. There is also a rack at the top of the backpack to store the jacket of a bigger sibling.

Comfortable changing mat The backpack can be opened easily to be transformed into a changing mat. Your baby will benefit from a soft comfort due to a thick back part.

Bin pocket A bin pocket is located at the bottom of the bag. It is removable and washable, just like the whole interior of the backpack.

Pocket for care products This ingenious pocket is created to contain everything you need to take care of your baby. It is detachable to put it on the table while changing diapers and when you’re ready to go it is easy to fix in the bag.

Shoulder pad Comfortable shoulder pad that is reinforced for your ultimate wearing comfort. It is suitable in every wearing situation, as a backpack as well as a shoulder bag.

The Jule's Bag was the winner of the Innovation Award 2017 in the category “travel accessories” at the international fair of baby and child care “Kind + Jugend”. At the Hong Kong innovation award in 2018 the bag has won the "Merit Award". It has also the verified label of “Via parents”, tested and approved by a high demanding parental audience.
story_txt:
Hello Indiegogo community! I am Jean-François Ducros, the founder and team leader of Papa, Maman et Moi. I officially launched Papa, Maman et Moi in 2017 and have received amazing reviews for our first products. Today, I am here to introduce the smartest and most thoughtful diaper bag you have ever seen. Trust me, this backpack will change your everyday life as a parent!


medically verified products that were tested by parents
100% French expert consultancy and a product that is certified by independent labels
comfort, security and well-being of the whole family



The Jule‘s bag is a diaper bag for men, which combines the needs of men as business men as well as while being fathers. Coming in an elegant and practical design, it is the most comfortable diaper bag on the market with a changing mat ticker than 0,4 cm. The bag opening system has enabled us to win the 2017 Innovation Award, which is further proof of our commitment to innovation and quality.

It has independent compartments for all members of the family: baby, parents and older brothers or sisters. Being compact and very organized, its dimensions are adjusted to contain everything you need for everyday life and even traveling with your baby. Clever, easy and quick to convert, the back padding can be transformed into a comfortable and washable changing table.

This diaper bag is both a shoulder bag and a backpack. Wipes and the bottle pocket are directly accessible through well thought openings, even while walking and the removable trash pocket can also be used in every configuration.

Thanks to its multimedia pocket, every dad can put away his computer or tablet easily, to be connected everywhere he goes. And also aesthetically, our elegant and simple bag will finish every look – no more diaper bags with teddy bear prints, flowers and ribbons!




Back pack and shoulder bag Convertible in no time, worn as a backpack, the Jule’s Bag gives you enough freedom to take care of your children and not having your hands occupied. The handles adjust to every type of pram.
Multiple pockets Our backpack is equipped with multiple stow spaces to never forget anything during your walks. There is enough space for the baby’s and parents belongings, diapers and baby bottles.
Tissue wipes access Cleverly devised, the bag has an easy access on it’s sides to reach tissue wipes without even opening the bag. It is even so simple you won’t see it among the stitching.
Isothermal pocket The bag is equipped with an isothermal pocket of 1.5L, perfect for long family walks. An opening on the side of the bag permits to reach a baby bottle without the need to put down the backpack.
Multimedia pocket Two pockets are just for parent’s use. One for the keys, smart phone, wallet and another for the laptop or tablet. It is detached for the safety of your belongings.
Clothes rack The interior of the backpack is developed to organize the baby’s clothes. There is also a rack at the top of the backpack to store the jacket of a bigger sibling.


Comfortable changing mat The backpack can be opened easily to be transformed into a changing mat. Your baby will benefit from a soft comfort due to a thick back part.
Bin pocket A bin pocket is located at the bottom of the bag. It is removable and washable, just like the whole interior of the backpack.
Pocket for care products This ingenious pocket is created to contain everything you need to take care of your baby. It is detachable to put it on the table while changing diapers and when you’re ready to go it is easy to fix in the bag.
Shoulder pad Comfortable shoulder pad that is reinforced for your ultimate wearing comfort. It is suitable in every wearing situation, as a backpack as well as a shoulder bag.







The Jule's Bag was the winner of the Innovation Award 2017 in the category “travel accessories” at the international fair of baby and child care “Kind + Jugend”. At the Hong Kong innovation award in 2018 the bag has won the "Merit Award". It has also the verified label of “Via parents”, tested and approved by a high demanding parental audience.

story:
Welcome to the eco-revolution you wear!

We are so excited to announce the launch of a new clothing line, Liquid Light Apparel, a unique line of garments dedicated to showcasing the beauty and impermanence of Earth's biosphere.

Our leggings are entirely unique, our patterns are derived from imagery taken by our founder, Louie Wray, in places like the Florida Keys, The Bahamas, and Belize. These unique garments are destined to start powerful conversations and make you POP with color and textures from the sea.

Sublimare cares about the health and well being of all Earth’s inhabitants which is why our apparel is Designed in Key West, Florida and handcrafted from recycled materials in Denver, Colorado. Are you ready to Wear Your World?


Dye-sublimation printing has given us radical access to transferring our favorite patterns from nature onto our garments. Check out our 4 completely unique patterns.

Not only will you look as hot as hun, but you will also be wearing a reminder of some of Earth’s richest biomes. These biomes will have a greater chance of survival if we can spread awareness of its decline. 5% of funds raised will go to aid Project Hiu, helping slow the alarming pace of commercial shark fishing in Indonesia.

 

 

 

1. Direct Message us @sublimare

2. Venmo Purchase Amount to @visualsactuary
 

3. Wait paitently for product to arrive! <3

 

Share

story:
Dezzys is a street inspired children's lifestyle brand that has sold thousands of kid shoes over the last 2 1/2 years. We are now ready to take the business to next level by applying our experience and success in footwear and combine it with streetwear apparel to initiate a Curated Subscription Model business.

What is Streetwear? Everyone from Odell Beckham Jr to Hip Hop stars and international celebrities are driving the streetwear movement.

 

 

 

According to Piper Jaffray and Bain & Co., Kids Streetwear market is set to grow to over $300 Billion by 2025.
 

Kids streetwear apparel does not exist in the mass market.

Through our consulting experience with apparel companies we have discovered the vacuum that exists for parents to find and purchase streetwear for their children. 

We see the opportunity of providing a one stop shop for parents to be part of the streetwear movement to keep their kids in style.

Currently there are no kids apparel subscriptions that include footwear and a streetwear style.

Dezzys designs affordable trendy shoes and apparel with street inspired designs while also focusing on quality. Every parent wants their child to look good. Instead of having to spend hours online visiting multiple online shops, and paying multiple shipping costs, we have come up with a one stop shop subscription model that delivers curated outfits right to your door.

story:
Introducing DTing

 

DTing is world's first easy-start gesture-controlled robot and toy series. It's the most interesting and innovative toys in the world. Several already-connected toys and robots are offered on this campaign. And a developer kit is offered as well to realize anything you could dream of.

We hope to give a brand-new user experience to customers of all ages. We believe users from different ages will be able to find their own kinds of fun. Hopefully, users will discover more types of creative, fun use by themselves. Our team cooperated with world-class toy and robot manufacturers, guaranteeing the products are well-made. So, a variety of already-connected toys are provided in this campaign, from trucks to drones and battling tanks.

 

Features

DTing Gesture Wristband

All these gesture control experiences are realized by the help of the kernel of the robots: the “DTing Gesture Wristband”. The wristband is an all-in-one solution to detect all of your gestures, including forearm movement, hand gestures and even finger movements. The wristband detects surface electromyographic signals, gyroscopic signals, accelerometer signals and more related signals to recognize gestures with high precision.

 

Multi-Gesture Support

To satisfy the different habits and styles of users, the product does not limit the variety of hand gestures. In other words, the user can try hand gestures as they like. to the user can try it on and find the most comfortable or coolest gestures for them.  You can be the hero you like, such as “Magneto”, "Star-Lord”, “Spider-Man” or whoever you like. We offer several recommended gestures to initiate your exploration, such as “thumb up”, “index finger pointing” and “gun gesture”.

 

Both Hands Playing

Gesture control is not only an absorbing interaction style but also offers traditional toys and robots an imaginary space. This may activate the user’s creativity, such as manipulating toys with both hands or establishing a gesture control battlefield.

 

Force Awareness

To enhance the perceptive connection between robot and user, the force awareness is added as a function of wristband. That is to say, user could control the speed of any connected robot via changing the intensity of hand gesture. Robot will stop moving if user loses the force of hand gesture. In this case, user’s behavior will not affect on any movement of robot.

 

Developer Tools

Our team believes that imagination is limited by developers themselves for most products. If we look into history, all the great masterpieces in interaction are user-generated. So, we have insisted on making the DTing Gesture Wristband develop-able. A developer kit is offered as well with the wireless protocol and wireless module included, enough for developers. This enables the DTing gesture control method to be capable of controlling all kinds of electronics.

 

SYMA Drone

SYMA has been an innovator and industry leader in the manufacture of high quality radio controlled Drones and Quadcopters for over 10 years. Syma has taken an innovative and visionary approach to advancing flight experience for kids. To provide “Fantasy, Fun and Inspiration” throughout Syma products, it makes Syma becomes “the leading Innovator in Drone and Quadcopters”.

  • Strong stability
  • Hover/Altitude mode
  • Strong wind resistance
  • One-gesture 360 degree roll

 

HENGLONG Battle Tank:

HENGLONG is established in 1999 and located in Shantou City. The company is a large comprehensive enterprise with developing, producing and trading. They produce wireless electronic remote control series products, including plane models, boat models, tank models, oil truck models and tram models.  They have been sold all over the world and are greatly welcomed by our customers. The business principles of "Honesty first and equal cooperation" gained consumer's trust and praise. 

  • High-quality imitation Pershing and Sherman Tanks
  • 320-degree turret rotation range
  • Real shooting recoil effect
  • Infrared battling

 

Press

 

Watch the Latest Review:

 

Watch the Latest Play：

 

Snapshot 

 

How It Works

DTing robots and toys have launched a brand-new, interactive method never before seen in the market, while making sure the user can get used to it quickly and keeping it friendly to newbies. We have done a great deal of work on making it quick to use and able to be mastered within just a few minutes.

  • Step 1 : Wear

 Just treat it as a normal watch. Wear it on your wrist and keep it tight. Make sure the main part (the black shell) is located at the back of your wrist. The only difference with wearing a watch is to make sure that the three metal contacts are fixed to your skin well.

  • Step 2: One button connecting

After turning on both wristband ( the wristband automatically turned on when you touch) and robot, just press the only button on wristband to connect them. The indicator of robot stops blinking if successfully connected.

  • Step 3: Gesture to start

Stretch your finger and make a hand gesture to start your control. Making sure to hold the hand gesture while controlling the robot. The connected robot stops moving when you loose the gesture. For first time using, we recommend to stretch your index finger.

  • Step 4: Move to command

Move your forearm to deliver command to robot while holding your hand gesture. The robot goes left and right, up and down or do other behaviors following your forearm movement.

 

What You Get

 

Fulfillment Timeline

We have gone through all product test. All software and hardware are finalized. The overall design is very solid and confirmed by our early testers.

We have already arranged for pilot production and will have small quantity ready to ship right after the campaign.  The risk should be minimum and we expect to ship on time.

 

Tech Specs

 

Our Story

Team

We are a team consisting of passionate scientists and engineers. The members of our team have dedicated themselves in bio-signals and human-machine interaction over 10 years. We believe that a revolutionary HMI improvement must take place to make a product attainable and interesting to new users, no matter how difficult or complicated the technology behind the product may be. This idea has brought us together to explore a proper product based on bio-signals and HMI techniques that help people.

Product

Besides this DTing toy series we are currently offering on Indiegogo at this time, we have already made prototypes and products, such as prosthetic, exclusive mice for the disabled, rehabilitation assessment tools and even more. Even a child without one or both hands can play with these toys.

 

DTing on Indiegogo is already the 3rd generation of DTing. The 1st generation of DTing was made in the form of an armband designed to manipulating PC games and educational robots. The 2nd generation was an armband connected with the Parrot Jumping Drone and Parrot Airborne.  Dozens of prototypes were made, hundreds of user feedback were collected. We’ve been successfully funded on JD crowdfunding (a Chinese crowdfunding platform). These experiences have left us with a plethora of customer feedback on previous products, and we are confident to offer a product with a user-friendly experience to you now.

We need your help to kick our mass production and bring these revolutionary and interesting products to life.

 

 

Referral Program

If you refer a backer to our campaign, and they pledge more than one perk, you will get an additional wristband strap and stickers for free.

There is no share time limits, and the more you share, the higher chance you have of winning the free items.

Method:

Log in to indiegogo, visit DTing indiegogo page: http://igg.me/at/dting

Find the share button and share directly.

FAQ

1. How to control the connected toy or robot with the wristband on?

For tank control: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W8dt5b9QL8A&t=8s

For drone control: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KEhBivM_owI&t=49s

For developer kit, user could use the default gestures shown above, Or customize gestures with real time data.

2. How long is the warranty?

The DTing gesture wristband comes with a 12 month limited warranty for Indiegogo backers. We also ensure that every unit is free from manufacturing defects and handled with the utmost care during shipment.

3. Are there any restrictions on gesture when controlling toys?

We don't limit the variety of hand gestures. In other words, You can try any hand gestures as you like. When you first use it, You’d better use several recommended gestures to have a easy start.

4. Can the DTing Gesture Wristband control all drones directly ?

DTing Gesture Wristband can directly control the drone made by the manufacturer who have cooperated with us. If you are robot or drone manufacturer don’t hesitate a order a suite to experience first.

5. In the demo video, I have seen the control of military truck with DTing gesture wristband, when and where I can order it?

We canceled the truck offer just for giving more effort to optimize the user experience of drone and tank. The truck will be offered after this campaign. If you like it, pay attention to DTing official website: http://www.dtingsmart.com/.

6. How to use DTing Gesture wristband control any other electronics?

You can get the DTing Developer Kit suite, A developer kit is offered as well with the wireless protocol and wireless module included, enough for developers. 

7. Are there any restrictions on the age of the users?

DTing Gesture wristband is designed for all ages. The only need is that you can wear it properly.

8. When can I receive my product?

The shipment of the first batch of DTing Gesture Wristband will begin in May 2018 after the campaign ends. Actual ship dates will vary depending on your country, your location, and when you’ve placed your order. We will keep you up to date on every step of the process. 

9. Why order now? 

You will be first batch of users in the world who experience our product. For promotion purpose we launched this crowdfunding campaign at a remarkable discount in return for all your support.

10. Change of address?    

If you need to update your address, please send email to: support@dtingsmart.com.

11. Why is the shipping seems high?
We spent a lot of time deciding on the right shipping partner and cost. We are afraid to choose a shipping company that is cheaper as we would be left with the bill if the product is damaged or lost, and we don’t want you the customer to receive damaged goods or even lose it. So we chose DHL or TNT express to ship the product.

12. If my question is not promptly answered, what should I do?

If your question is not promptly answered, please refer to the following contact information:

For technical questions, usage questions and product delivery progress, please send email to: support@dtingsmart.com.

For distribution or agency issues, please send email to: contact@dtingsmart.com.

For press release, download the press kit here: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1zmpHFO9w8JCOTyAkwxS7Li7pOpoBabkT

When sending emails to us, please make sure to use the email address that you used for your purchase on Indiegogo, our team will reply to you as soon as possible.

Clearance: Many user mentioned about the "gun gesture" shown in the video and image. We use this gesture to demonstrate the project only because it is simplest to posture and easiest to hold. No violence and war symbolic meaning involved. Many other gestures are supported as well.

story:
We are proud to be a FEATURED CAMPAIGN on Entrepreneur Magazine's Elevator Pitch!

NEWS!!! Season 2 Episode 1 released today, 4/25. Make sure to watch, we will be rooting for all the great people we met while filming the show. Stay tuned for our airdate on 6/6! Help us reach our goal... contribute and you will be updated via email on our progress and beyond...

 

DID YOU KNOW???

Article from Fitness Magazine- Germs at the Gym (read more)

Your fitness club's dirty little secret: Bugs that cause colds and flu, athlete's foot, and skin infections are everywhere. Here's how to protect yourself.

Hot Spot: Towel

Germ Meter = High

You grab a "clean" towel from the pile at the gym. What you can't see is that the fibers may be teeming with E. coli or MRSA. "Most gyms use the same hamper to transport dirty towels and clean ones," Tierno says.

Germ Warfare

Bring your own towel, marked with an X on one side with a permanent marker, Tierno advises; only that side should make contact with gym machines. Use the unmarked side to wipe sweat off yourself. Bring a separate towel if you're showering at the gym. Try an antimicrobial one, available at sporting goods stores, to reduce your risk for infection.

Take a stand on Triclosan: The Truth about fabrics containing antimicrobial technology:

Health concerns:

Because of potential health concerns spanning from antimicrobial resistance to endocrine disruption, Triclosan has been designated as a "contaminant of emerging concern (CEC)", meaning it is under investigation for public health risk. 

Triclosan is thought to accumulate in wastewater and return to drinking water, thus propagating a buildup that could cause increasing effects with ongoing use.

In the United States, after a decades-long review of the potential health issues from this contaminant of emerging concern, the FDA ruled on September 6, 2016, that 19 active ingredients including triclosan are not generally recognized as safe and effective. (read more)

Cotton vs. Microfiber:

We believe in natural materials. Our towels are 80% cotton and 20% poly (neeed for stretch)  Cotton breathes and is safer for the skin.

'Cotton is the most common material for workout towels — and for good reason. Cotton fibers are absorbent and dry quickly, and cotton continues to play an important role in American economy.'

Anywhere you need a towel... Where do YOU Sweat? 

Dance, Yoga/Hot Yoga, Spin, Pilates, Boxing, Kickboxing, MMA, Cycling, Outdoor Concert or Festival, Spa, Sauna, and many more! Let us know... #wheredoyousweat

                                       

                    

                                               From left to right: Sarah, Laura and Melissa 

We had a great experience... and we are going to be featured on entrepreneur.com for our campaign! View our interview with Entrepreneur Magazine's Dan Bova HERE.                                     

Who we are:

Nice to meet you all on Indiegogo!  We are a mother daughter entrepreneurial team based out of Long Island, New York.  We currently work from our home office, packing, shipping, and fulfilling orders.  HoodiFit is our Patented Design product that has been in the works since our first hand-made, knit design in 2011. The best way for you to know a little bit about us personally is to view our featured article on entrepreneur.com. Melissa, Sarah and I headed out to LA last month to do our 60 second pitch to investors on Entrepreneur Magazine’s 2nd season of Elevator Pitch, and although we can’t tell you what happened (you will have to see for yourself) this is by far our biggest opportunity to date in our business and we are very excited. We would love to tell you that we had such a great experience with the producers, the investors and the team at Entrepreneur. They really are ‘Shark Tank with a soul’!  It’s fair to say that being an entrepreneur is a tough road, and the people here all understand that, whether you are a big company talking big numbers, or a start-up, we all have similar struggles. In our wait for our turn at pitching, we met such wonderful people with great ideas that were all in, heart, soul and money. We all practiced our pitches with each other while waiting, and one guy gave us an exercise class to shake off the nerves!

Our Mission:

We believe in design with purpose and creating new and innovative pieces rather than flooding the industry with more of the same.  What we offer is a unique and truly one-of-a-kind headwear accessory that can be used for a multitude of purposes and improves convenience for the consumer.  

Our Personal Belief System:

We believe that in this world, we cannot be truly happy unless we give back.  Some can give monetarily, some can give of their time, and some can give a simple smile and a kind word. We as a family and as a team have always done what we can, whenever we can. We all have causes that we are passionate about, and although we are struggling financially, we still find a way. For over 10 years now, we have forgone our Christmas gifts and chosen to adopt a local family instead of buying for ourselves. We may not have all that we want, but we have more than we need.

We are also very passionate about animals and on preserving wildlife and donate our time and a portion of our proceeds to these causes as well. 

The vision for our business as far as giving back would be to donate a portion of our future sales to causes that our customers are passionate about.

Press links:

November 1, 2017 Money and Main $treet  by Christa Lauri

Sept. 7, 2017 - Innovate LI 'Small Steps, All Good, For Girls In The Hood' by Gregory Zeller

Sept. 7, 2017 - The Long Islander 'Mother, Daughters Promote Product On ‘Funderdome’ by Connor Beach

Sept. 10th, 2017 - Newsday 'FUNDERDOME’ APPEARANCE BY LI STARTUP WAS MONTHS IN THE MAKING' by HOWARD SCHNAPP

August 2017 - Local News 8 ABC Video Interview with Melissa Wandursky - HoodiFit/ Infinity Sport Towel, Laura Alison Design and Post Steve Harvey’s ‘Funderdome’

August 2017 - LIBN Long Island Business News 'Scarf gifts keep on giving, spawn new business' by Kristie Kam

Jul 27, 2016 - Trend Hunter 'Must See Infinity Sport Scarves - The 'Hooded Infinity Sport Towel' Lets Gym-Goers Carry Towels with Ease by Erica Francis

JULY 15, 2016 - Innovate Long Island 'Infinity, 'Where Fashion And Function Collide’ by Gregory Zeller

Our Competitive Advantages:

Our patented design gives us a large advantage against any competition.  While there is certainly no shortage of basic scarves available to consumers, none offer the additional head cover and protection that ours does.  Our high-end piece is composed of 80% wool, 20% silk making it extremely high quality and a piece that will last.  We have the only wearable sport towel on the market, and the fact that it is extremely brand friendly make it perfect for any gym, spa, yoga studio, or the like to offer their customers something unique while promoting their business as well. With our Fleece Prototype our plan is to get into Sports and Entertainment licensing.  (below are examples of our vision for our design)

                                        

What we are offering you:

-The Hooded Infinity Scarf (below)

We currently have stock left of our Wool/Silk luxury piece beautifully embellished with a genuine leather label and twisted beads, and since the season is over for this year, we are offering these pieces at a substantial discount to make room for next season’s order. 

 

-'HoodiFit' Personal Sport Towel (below)

Wearing your towel to your workout should not be an afterthought! Simply add your HoodiFit Personal towel to your workout attire (don't worry, it won't fall off like an ordinary sport towel). The hood is available if and when your need it to provide sun and wind protection outdoors or at the gym after showering. (Photo below courtesy of Harman International/JBL)

                                         

About our Fleece Spirit FanWear (below)

We are still in the prototype stage as we hope to be adding and offering these pieces soon, so please look for our updates as to when they will become available! We are looking into all fleece and also with a waterproof hood. Our main idea with these pieces is to offer to licensing companies that hold sports and entertainment licenses because they make a perfect logoed/embellished piece for stadiums and college bookstores as well as any outdoor concert or activity.

                                         (photo is for prototype only and not for sale)

 

So you know.. Our plans for use of Funding:

Aside from getting the word out and bringing our pieces to you to wear and enjoy, we also need additional funds to secure our ‘HoodiFit’ to trademark. We have been knocked off already and it is very important for us to brand ourselves as we are very committed to the quality of our pieces and want to protect our design. 

We also need funding for marketing expenses, purchase orders and trade shows (ie: The Licensing Expo, PPAI and Sports Licensing and Tailgate Show)

The three of us are currently working full time in our other jobs/careers and do not plan to take a salary until we make it and can give up the 9/5 for the 24/7.

        

We Pitched.. Watch video here to see how it all unfolds!

You can make a difference. You can help us build our brand. And our promise to you is that you will have a unique quality piece to enjoy. We will never forget the people who helped us to grow our business and our dream. Every piece that every one of you wear and enjoy helps us spread the word and bring us closer to our dream of introducing this new design to the world.

Social Share = Love!

Many thanks in advance for your support!

Laurie, Melissa and Sarah <3

story:
These days, claiming that a watch can be used underwater doesn’t mean much per se. If you’re a scuba diver who loves wristwatches or who simply need a good dive watch, then you shouldn’t be worried about whether your watch will withstand the impact of your diving adventures or not.

 

The whole point of a dive watch is to allow you to clearly and easily check the time whenever you’re diving—no matter how deep you go. The challenge there, of course, is that sunlight does not reach the depths of the ocean when you’re diving and going way down.

 

Fiber Propeller Watch’s dials and hands with Swiss Super-LumiNova C3, which delivers a stellar and bright afterglow performance. Through exposure to sunlight or artificial light, this material is automatically charged, after which it displays continuous light even when it is immersed in the darkest depths that scuba divers go to.

 

Bronze is the earliest alloy in the history of metal smelting. The addition of tin or lead to pure copper (Red copper) has special importance and historical significance. Compared with pure copper (Red copper), bronze has higher strength and lower melting point (With 25% tin smelting bronze, the melting point will drop to 800 ° C. The melting point of pure copper (Red copper) is 1083 ℃). Bronze has good castability, wear resistance and stable chemical properties.

 

After the invention of bronze, it immediately became popular, and human history has entered a new stage since then-the Bronze Age.

On March 28, 2015, a burial group from the Warring States Period to the Eastern Han Dynasty was discovered in Zhoukou City, Henan Province, and a group of exquisite funerary objects were unearthed. One of the bronze swords is well preserved and very rare. In 1965, a Sword of Goujian was unearthed at the tomb No. 1 in Wangshan, Jiangling County, Hubei Province. This sword has crossed the history of more than two thousand years. But the sword body has no rust spots, and it’s still shimmering and sharp. It is known as "the world first sword. "

 

Bronze is the representative of the metallurgical culture of ancient civilization and history, However, bronze has a strong toughness, there will be sand holes if manufactured by melt casting. Therefore, in the modern manufacture of watch shell or parts, we use CNC to the manufacturing process each Fiber Propeller Watch was made one by one. Yes, extraordinary quality is demanding! 

 

Fiber Propeller Watch: A perfect combination of ancient metal culture, modern technology and mechanical watch technology.

 

Let’s face it: without a stable movement, no matter how beautiful it is, no wristwatch is good enough for you. Fiber Propeller Watch features a highly stable Miyota Machine Core, which ensures that the movement is absolutely perfect.

Woking with XINGXIN WATCH CO., LTD. we have the world's first mass-produced, modified three-needle, one-line (Regulator) automatic movement based on Miyota Machine Coret, which also has Japan, Taiwan, China invention patents! 

On the other hand, this incredible timepiece that we’re offering you uses a patented regulator and a Xingxin 3617 Regulator with Automatic Movement.

Being an icon of personal style as much as it is a diving tool, and considering that divers enjoy moments of meditation and relaxation underwater, the faceplate of Fiber Propeller Watch is hollow at 8 o’clock. That way, you can calmly marvel at how the seconds and minutes go by as you see the running of the balance wheel at a glance. 

Since tastes vary but preference for elegance, quality, and timeless timepieces are a permanent wish of watch lovers and of divers who want excellent dive watches, we’re presenting the Fiber Propeller Series. Fiber Propeller Watch comes in a series of fine automatic mechanical dive watches with 22mm Handcrafted Italian Cowhide leather straps available in colors which you can choose below.

 

ADDS-ON 

Established in Taiwan in 2007, Fiber Watch Co., Ltd. Is a watch-making company. We focus on matching beautiful design with excellent performance. We make great quality in watches become something that you can easily afford, and now we’ve gone one step further by developing a dive watch that is as stylish and aesthetically impressive as it is robust, resistant and reliable.

2-Year Internal Warranty (Non-artificial damage)

The after-sales service that we offer covers the provision of spare parts and repair. The spare parts that need to be replaced due to quality issues of the FIBER Propeller WATCH shall be provided free of charge and repair by the company during the warranty period. You could mail the watch to the factory. It should also be noted that, If the artificial damage is found during the guarantee time, our company will answer for the maintain and will charge the maintain costs generated by this.
