story:
We are pleased to introduce NOWA Superbe, our NEW collection for busy men and women who travel and stay active. A beautiful classic hybrid smart watch with a sleek and unique design, that you won’t find in a corner at the next shopping mall.

Featured in GQ, Le Figaro Magazine, Deezen, Asos, Ocarat as one of the most beautiful hybrid smart watches.

Finding inspiration in the Contemporary Decorative Arts, Eric Gizard and his team designed the New Petite collection with the desire to find the perfect balance between aesthetic and functionality. 

The result is a true French-inspired watch with impeccable construction that pays tribute to traditional watchmaking. Superbe is smart and looks fantastic while being less than 10mm thick.

 

 

Learn more about our design studio in Paris 

 

The luxury feel is in the details of the design: from the custom-made “cushion” case, the indigo blue special colour, the Eric Gizard signature and the unique serial number engraved on the back of each unit. 

The NOWA hybrid smartwatch runs up to 8 months on a standard CR2025 watch battery. Superbe does not need to be charged. If you are not using the smart features, the battery life can last up to 2 years with a single battery. To replace the battery, bring your NOWA to a qualified specialist.

Our new NOWA Watch App was recently released on the Google Play Store and will be available to download on the App Store before August. All our apps are designed and developed in France.

 

Download the app here

 

How does it work?

 

The NOWA Superbe works like with the technology of activity tracker without displaying the information on the watch. It simply and seamlessly connects to your phone via Bluetooth to sync your data. You can use the app, to set your watch, display your daily goals and record your data to the fitness cloud.

 

 
 
One watch reward - Superbe 36 mm Rose Gold by NOWA
 
2 watches reward - Superbe 36 mm Classic Black and Rose Gold by NOWA
 
2 watches reward - Superbe 36 mm and Shaper 40 mm smart watches by NOWA.

 

Discover the Shaper collection here. 

The NOWA Superbe is our second collection and it will be ready for worldwide delivery in August 2019. We have just produced 100 pieces for a pilot run, that is currently under intensive evaluation and testing by our reviewers, influencers, journalists and fans. Your rewards will come with a 24-month warranty.

 

All characteristics in Short

Timepiece:

  • Water resistance: 3 ATM
  • Case size: 36 mm (without the crown)
  • Case thickness: 10 mm
  • Case material: 316L stainless steel
  • Mouvement: Swiss Parts Quartz Ronda
  • Glass material: Mineral with sapphire coating
  • Strap width: 18 mm (165 to 205 mm circumference)
  • Strap material: Genuine Italian leather / stainless steel milanese mesh
  • Clasp material: Stainless steel
  • Light indicator
  • Interchangeable straps with quick release spring bars
  • CR2025 battery
  • Weight: 44 g (leather), 69 g (mesh) 

Smart features:

  • Push control. Classic crown style
  • Time zone analog watch: Time set by smartphone
  • Activity tracking (steps, distance, and calories burned) 
  • Sleep quality monitoring
  • Camera control for selfies
  • Call notifications through light indicator
  • Reject call with a push to the crown
  • Find your phone with a double push to the crown
  • Connects wirelessly to smartphone
  • One-week memory without having to sync 
  • Connect to Apple Health and Google Fit
  • Battery life: up to 8 months in smartwatch mode

Compatibility:

  • IOS8 / Android 8 and newer versions
  • CE, FCC and RoHS certified

 

Risks and challenges

This is our second project on Kickstarter under the NOWA brand. The first was quite a success at the same there are a lot of valuable feedbacks that help us to improve on this new project.

But all projects face challenges so we are taking every step possible to minimize delays and risks for our backers and future customers.

As watchmakers we have a deep understanding of the complexity of projects such as this. This is why we began work on the concept and prototype over one year ago. We didn’t come to market, until we knew we were ready for mass production.

We have been working with our manufacturers and suppliers for years and have an excellent relationship with them as well as a clearly defined supply chain and production schedule. Our materials are ready, the test runs have been completed and we are ready for production.

The NOWA Superbe smart watch is ready! We are now in the process of testing about 100 watches with reviewers, influencers and distributors to get their feedback and fine tune the apps. We won't ask you to become an influencer for the brand if we are not ready!

However, even with the best of preparation delays can sometimes occur. Please know that in the event of any possible issue, we will provide full transparency and keep you updated as to the problem, the solution and the steps necessary to solve it.

Thanks for all the support!
story_txt:
We are pleased to introduce NOWA Superbe, our NEW collection for busy men and women who travel and stay active. A beautiful classic hybrid smart watch with a sleek and unique design, that you won’t find in a corner at the next shopping mall.


Featured in GQ, Le Figaro Magazine, Deezen, Asos, Ocarat as one of the most beautiful hybrid smart watches.Finding inspiration in the Contemporary Decorative Arts, Eric Gizard and his team designed the New Petite collection with the desire to find the perfect balance between aesthetic and functionality. The result is a true French-inspired watch with impeccable construction that pays tribute to traditional watchmaking. Superbe is smart and looks fantastic while being less than 10mm thick.

 
 Learn more about our design studio in Paris  The luxury feel is in the details of the design: from the custom-made “cushion” case, the indigo blue special colour, the Eric Gizard signature and the unique serial number engraved on the back of each unit. The NOWA hybrid smartwatch runs up to 8 months on a standard CR2025 watch battery. Superbe does not need to be charged. If you are not using the smart features, the battery life can last up to 2 years with a single battery. To replace the battery, bring your NOWA to a qualified specialist.Our new NOWA Watch App was recently released on the Google Play Store and will be available to download on the App Store before August. All our apps are designed and developed in France. Download the app here How does it work? The NOWA Superbe works like with the technology of activity tracker without displaying the information on the watch. It simply and seamlessly connects to your phone via Bluetooth to sync your data. You can use the app, to set your watch, display your daily goals and record your data to the fitness cloud.   One watch reward - Superbe 36 mm Rose Gold by NOWA 2 watches reward - Superbe 36 mm Classic Black and Rose Gold by NOWA 2 watches reward - Superbe 36 mm and Shaper 40 mm smart watches by NOWA. Discover the Shaper collection here. The NOWA Superbe is our second collection and it will be ready for worldwide delivery in August 2019. We have just produced 100 pieces for a pilot run, that is currently under intensive evaluation and testing by our reviewers, influencers, journalists and fans. Your rewards will come with a 24-month warranty. All characteristics in ShortTimepiece:
Water resistance: 3 ATM
Case size: 36 mm (without the crown)
Case thickness: 10 mm
Case material: 316L stainless steel
Mouvement: Swiss Parts Quartz Ronda
Glass material: Mineral with sapphire coating
Strap width: 18 mm (165 to 205 mm circumference)
Strap material: Genuine Italian leather / stainless steel milanese mesh
Clasp material: Stainless steel
Light indicator
Interchangeable straps with quick release spring bars
CR2025 battery
Weight: 44 g (leather), 69 g (mesh) 
Smart features:
Push control. Classic crown style
Time zone analog watch: Time set by smartphone
Activity tracking (steps, distance, and calories burned) 
Sleep quality monitoring
Camera control for selfies
Call notifications through light indicator
Reject call with a push to the crown
Find your phone with a double push to the crown
Connects wirelessly to smartphone
One-week memory without having to sync 
Connect to Apple Health and Google Fit
Battery life: up to 8 months in smartwatch mode
Compatibility:
IOS8 / Android 8 and newer versions
CE, FCC and RoHS certified
 Risks and challengesThis is our second project on Kickstarter under the NOWA brand. The first was quite a success at the same there are a lot of valuable feedbacks that help us to improve on this new project.But all projects face challenges so we are taking every step possible to minimize delays and risks for our backers and future customers.As watchmakers we have a deep understanding of the complexity of projects such as this. This is why we began work on the concept and prototype over one year ago. We didn’t come to market, until we knew we were ready for mass production.We have been working with our manufacturers and suppliers for years and have an excellent relationship with them as well as a clearly defined supply chain and production schedule. Our materials are ready, the test runs have been completed and we are ready for production.The NOWA Superbe smart watch is ready! We are now in the process of testing about 100 watches with reviewers, influencers and distributors to get their feedback and fine tune the apps. We won't ask you to become an influencer for the brand if we are not ready!However, even with the best of preparation delays can sometimes occur. Please know that in the event of any possible issue, we will provide full transparency and keep you updated as to the problem, the solution and the steps necessary to solve it.Thanks for all the support!

story:
Key Features and Benefits

  • Easy:  Installs in minutes using only basic hand tools.
  • Convenient:  Recessed Design Keeps Supplies in Reach but Out of the Way
  • Discreet: Double Doors Keep Stored Items Protected and Out of Sight
  • Customizable:  Dividers Partition Storage Area into Custom Compartments
  • Elegant:  Hidden Trash Pail Replaces an Unsightly Open Trash Can on the Floor
  • Smart:  Keeps Trash Out of Sight and Away from Pets & Toddlers
  • Clean:  Trash Pail Accepts Ordinary Grocery Store Plastic Bags as Liners
  • Stylish:  Can be Produced in a Wide Variety of Colors and Finishes

A Best New Product of Home + Housewares Show

We unveiled the Handy Hideaway at the 2015 International Home + Housewares Show in Chicago.

While at the show, we pitched the invention to a panel of experts led by Kevin Harrington - an original "shark" from the hit television show "Shark Tank".

Kevin loved the Handy Hideaway; calling it a "no brainer" for success.  He and his panel subsequently named the Handy Hideaway "One of the Best New Products of the International Home+Housewares Show."

Since then, we have been engaging representatives from three key sales channels:

  • Direct Response Television (DRTV)
  • E-Commerce
  • Large-Scale Brick and Mortar Retail Chains

WE NEED YOU

We've done our research, completed product design, built prototypes, and successfully demonstrated those prototypes to consumers and retailers in a variety of venues. We have our supply chain in-place and firm quotes in-hand for tooling and manufacturing. The next step is clear:

It's time to manufacture the Handy Hideaway

We're committing a tremendous amount of our own personal resources to fund these next steps, but we need your help to move forward. We're not asking you to fund the entire next phase. Instead, your contribution will simply HELP cover the costs of the first production run. In essence, you can help us "break the barrier" that innovators face when trying to transition from prototype to production.

In gratitude of your contribution, we have prepared a menu of available perks.

Thank you for your interest and your contribution!


Use of Funds

Your contributions will be used to help bring this product to market. To do so, we must first have an expert tooling shop build the plastic injection molds for each of the piece-parts of the Handy Hideaway. Then, a production facility uses those molds to produce and package the product. Afterward, we transport the packaged product to a warehousing and distribution center. Wholesale and retail orders are then fulfilled from that location.

In addition to the supply chain costs, contributions will also be applied to sales and advertising expenses. Examples include air time and an expert host for TV shopping channels, production and airing of TV commercials such as "As Seen On TV", and online promotion associated with E-commerce websites.

Additional Information

Here, we provide additional detail on a variety of topics.


Who We Are

We are a small start-up company founded in 2014 to create real solutions to real frustrations of real people. Our name reflects the reaction we seek when you use one of our products:  "Simply Ingenious!"

Storage Woes and Trash Troubles

#1 Problem (No Pun Intended!)

You're using the toilet and suddenly realize...

  Ugh!  You're out of toilet paper.

And toilet paper is just one of many essentials we can find ourselves lacking. Other examples include:

  • Moistened Wipes
  • Feminine Pads and Tampons
  • Air Freshener / Deodorizer
  • Personal Creams, Sprays, and Medications
  • Urinary Catheters, Adult Diapers, and other Incontinence Products
    •

#2 Problem (Again, Pun Not Intentional!)

Chances are, the trash can in your toilet room looks like this:

Yuck!

  • An open container of some sort sitting on the floor next to the toilet
  • Filled with a variety of unpleasant items we'd rather not think about
  • Wide open for you, your family, and guests to see what's inside
  • Way to easy for pets and toddlers to get into that disgusting mess
  • Completely in the way when you try to sweep and mop the floor

Survey Says

We commissioned a professional market research firm to conduct an independent survey to find out how many people had the same frustrations as you and I in their toilet rooms. Watch the video below to see the astonishing results:


Key Results:

  • 67% Agree:
    Toilet rooms in my home lack sufficient convenient storage for personal items
  • 73% Agree:
    It's difficult to reach stored personal items while actually sitting on the toilet
  • 50% Agree:
    Sometimes I feel embarrassed that personal items are visible to others
  • 50% Agree:
    I am concerned that some items in my toilet room are easily contaminated
  • 61% Agree:
    Sometimes I feel uncomfortable that items in the trash are visible to others
  • Parents & Pet Owners Agree:
    It concerns me that a pet or young child could get into the trash

Reasons for Storage Woes and Trash Troubles

So why is it that we often we find ourselves without the personal supplies we need...when and where we actually need them? The Answer is that most of us currently stock such items:

  • Under the bathroom sink or in a towel closet for instance

    Here, we have to get up off the toilet and venture to the storage location. How awkward and embarrassing! Plus, there's no guarantee that we will actually find the item we need...we may be "out". If so, then what?

  • Above the toilet water tank on an open shelf or in a cabinet with glass doors

    Here, we have different issues. First, do we really want our most private supplies on-display for whoever happens to use that restroom? And second, it would take a contortionist to reach above and behind to that shelf or cabinet while sitting on the toilet. So that means we're standing up and turning around, right? Again, not a great situation.

  • On the lid of the toilet's water tank, or perhaps in a toilet paper caddy sitting on the floor near the toilet

    This so-called solution has all the same problems as the cabinet or the shelf above the toilet water tank, plus one more. It's not pleasant to think about, but open storage of results in "contamination" of those items by the inevitable splash and splutter of: A) simply flushing the toilet, and B) males using the toilet while standing. How GROSS!

Innovative Solution

Stylish and unobtrusive, the Handy Hideaway turns unused space behind the wall into useful new storage area for toiletry supplies or trash.

Tremendous Consumer Response

We again hired the professional market research firm to measure consumer response and quantify the market. The results were dramatic and positive. Watch the video below to see for yourself:

Key Results:

  • Nearly 9 out of 10 like it or like it very much
  • 82% want at least one unit for their home
  • 63% want more than one unit, averaging 2 per household
  • Domestic sales potential of 85 million units
    •

Tooling and Manufacturing Process

If you're interested in the tooling (molds) and the plastic injection molding process, see the informational videos below:

  • Informative Video #1: Plastic Injection Molding
  • Informative Video #2: Plastic Injection Molding

Thank you for visiting this page.

story:
Our Mission

The mission of Eco Fashion World is to promote ethical fashion brands and stores through informing consumers of their options and linking them to where they can find ethical fashion products. Our NEWS portal provides our readers with inspiring and educational feature articles, interviews, industry updates, new store launches, event information, contests, and much more! EFW is also a comprehensive resource to members of the eco fashion industry, offering an extensive glossary listing industry terms, an organization section, a book section, videos, and an easy-to-use search system.

The first website of its kind, Eco Fashion World was founded in 2007, and has outlasted similar publications by remaining consistent and dedicated. With continued NEWS updates, and a fast-growing international GUIDE featuring a wide variety of talented eco fashion designers and online shops, EFW aims to be the number one resource for sustainable style. Our collective mission is to make the world a better place through fashion.

Behind the scenes, EFW carefully selects stores and brands to work with based on what we call “eco criteria.” Our eco criterion includes work with artisans, the use of organic materials, the use of vegan materials, fair trade practices, made-to-order, ethically-sourced, vintage, recycled, and more.

The fashion industry is known as one of the top industries in creating pollution. The fashion industry is also known for an exorbitant number of cases of exploitation of workers. These are just some of the problems we aim to put in the spotlight, in hopes of educating the masses and also continuing to gain momentum and support to incite action in every person we come in contact with through our website, articles, images, and the designers and companies we support.

The EFW team wholeheartedly believes that we can change the world through fashion. We believe in supporting slow fashion, handmade, organic materials, artisans across the globe, fair treatment of workers, and fighting to reverse the damage of the industry. We have been watching the transition and ask you to support us in growing so that we can continue to feed this positive change. Let's continue to build this eco*ethical*sustainable fashion community - together!


Where You Come In

The goal of the campaign is to raise funds so we can be more timely, go more in depth on the most compelling topics and have the ability to more easily interact with our readers. To accomplish this goal, we need to build a more advanced website and enhance our directory to further foster the success of our members who pay a monthly membership fee, and enable us to deliver free news to everyone. We also want to introduce discussion forums, re-launch our newsletter, offer a mobile-friendly version of EFW, and expand our promotional offerings.

Our current website is so old that updates for it no longer exist and tasks take 10 times longer than they should. EFW is run by a very small but extremely dedicated and passionate team, including the Editor-in-Chief, contributing writers, and a few interns and volunteers. EFW is also run on very limited resources. A new website is absolutely crucial for the future of EFW.

What We Need

We're asking for $20,000 so that we can build and launch our NEW STATE-OF-THE-ART WEBSITE, ONLINE 'GUIDE' DIRECTORY and NEWSLETTER! The funds will cover extensive web design, graphic design costs, and the costs related to our campaign perks. Changes you will see upon re-launch include:

• More Timely: increase in the number of posts per week – industry news, product reviews, events, feature articles, interviews, and more, covering all aspects of the ethical fashion industry

• Hot Topics: additional dedicated content areas to spotlight the most recent and/or most talked about news in ethical fashion

• More Interactivity: additional and improved commenting features and moderated forums on both the reader/community level and the paid subscriber level

• Enhanced GUIDE/directory features: integrated software to make it easier for subscribers to edit their directory page and other features to make it even easier for visitors to the site to search for ethical fashion products and/or information they are looking for

If we exceed our goal, fantastic! Extra funds will allow us to integrate more advanced multimedia features, which will further support the growth and success of our GUIDE members and further enthrall our readers across the globe, while accommodating all of our backers with the perks associated with their pledge amount.

What You Get (View our Gallery tab for images of the perks)

KARMA

$5 Thank you, thank you, thank you for choosing to support our campaign. Instant good karma going out to you ...

GRATITUDE

$10 Every contribution helps! We are so grateful you want to be a part of this. You will receive a thank you shout out on Facebook and subscription to our newsletter upon relaunch.

FRIENDSHIP

$15 Thank you for being a friend of EFW. To express our appreciation of your friendship, you will receive a handmade cotton string friendship bracelet, a thank you shout out on Facebook and a subscription to our newsletter upon relaunch.

BLESSINGS

$25 We are so blessed to have you in our corner! You will receive all five color-ways of our handmade cotton string friendship bracelets, a thank you shout out on Facebook, a subscription to our newsletter upon relaunch, AND your name will be listed on a Contributors page on the new website.

NEW LIFE

$40 Our hearts are brimming. We feel the love!! We will plant a tree in your name. You will also receive all five color-ways of our handmade cotton string friendship bracelets, a thank you shout out on Facebook, a subscription to our newsletter upon relaunch, AND your name will be listed on a Contributors page on the new website.

LOVE AND LIGHT

$50 Wow! You are amazing! We are sending loads of love and light out to you in appreciation for your generosity and support. You will also receive all five color-ways of our handmade cotton string friendship bracelets, a thank you shout out on Facebook, a subscription to our newsletter upon relaunch, an organic cotton tee designed especially for this campaign, AND your name will be listed on a Contributors page on the new website.

PASSION

$75 You have true passion for the ethical fashion industry and all of the causes tied into it, and it shows! For your shining support, you will receive a Pashen Collection wristlet designed especially for this campaign, a handmade cotton string friendship bracelet, a thank you shout out on Facebook, a subscription to our newsletter upon relaunch, AND your name will be listed on a Contributors page on the new website.

SIGNED, SEALED, DELIVERED

$100 You are obviously committed to contributing to positive change. To express our gratitude, you will receive signed copies of both of Sass Brown’s books, Eco Fashion and Refashioned, a subscription to our newsletter upon relaunch, your name will be listed on a Contributors page on the new website, and you will also receive a personalized thank you card from EFW Editor-in-Chief, Magaly Fuentes, on plant-able seed paper.

FEATHERS AND SUCH

$150 Peacock feathers have been known to represent many different things. Among these things are watchfulness, love, compassion and goodwill – all of which are intertwined in the roots of ethical fashion. Thank you for sharing the vision with us and for supporting us so we can continue to help the industry grow! For your loving generosity, you will receive a sterling silver necklace (your choice of 18" or 24" in length) with a peacock feather pendant in recycled stainless steel by daphne olive via eco lustre. The pendant was designed especially for this campaign by daphne olive, in collaboration with EFW’s Editor-in-Chief. You will also receive a subscription to our newsletter upon relaunch, your name will be listed on a Contributors page on the new website, and a personalized thank you card on plant-able seed paper from EFW Editor-in-Chief, Magaly Fuentes, will be on its way to you.

WRAPPED UP IN ECO

$150 Thank you for showing us so much love. To show you some love in return, you will receive a stunning GreenLinebyK wrap maxi dress in bamboo jersey knit, a subscription to our newsletter upon relaunch, your name will be listed on a Contributors page on the new website, and you will also receive a personalized thank you card from EFW Editor-in-Chief, Magaly Fuentes, on plant-able seed paper!

BAG OF BLISS

$200 It is hard to put how thankful we are into words and we can’t bag a giant hug, BUT for your kindness and generosity, you will receive a Limited Edition Pashen Collection handbag designed especially for this campaign, a magical crystal and personalized message inside the bag, an organic cotton tee designed especially for this campaign, a Miakoda mala bracelet, a subscription to our newsletter upon relaunch, your name will be listed on a Contributors page on the new website, and you will also receive a personalized thank you card from EFW Editor-in-Chief, Magaly Fuentes, on plant-able seed paper!

SLICE OF WISDOM AND STRENGTH

$350 We (almost) have no words for how appreciative we are of your support. To express our gratitude, you will receive a limited edition green tourmaline slice pendant, prong set and anchored on an 18” sterling silver cable chain, by contemporary ethical jewelry designer Emilie Shapiro via eco lustre. Tourmaline represents wisdom and strength of mind. You will also receive an organic cotton tee designed especially for this campaign, a subscription to our newsletter upon relaunch, your name will be listed on a Contributors page on the new website, and we will mail you a personalized thank you card from EFW Editor-in-Chief, Magaly Fuentes, written on plant-able seed paper!

ETHICAL THREADS

$400 Stunning, stunning ethical threads, made-to-order, just for you! For your hands down dedication to EFW and all that we represent, you will receive a Mission Park Trouser and Copley Wrap Top from Singlestream Collection, a subscription to our newsletter upon relaunch, your name will be listed on a Contributors page on the new website, and you will also receive a personalized thank you card from EFW Editor-in-Chief, Magaly Fuentes, on plant-able seed paper!

CONVERSE WITH A MASTER

$1,500 (Limited quantity: 2) Would you like to have a personal one-on-one conversation with a Master Tailor who truly represents the epitome of ethical fashion? For your contribution at this level, you will receive a Skype conference (unless you live in the Cape Cod area and are able to meet in person) with master tailor Kathryn Hilderbrand who will design and create a custom 2 piece outfit just for you.

SWEET BUNDLE

$1500 You are an ethical fashion ROCKSTAR!  For your contribution, you will receive ALL OF THE ABOVE perks within the $5 to $400 contribution levels!

EFW ANGEL

$4,000 ALL OF THE ABOVE PERKS PLUS a 2 night stay at the Omphoy Ocean Resort in Palm Beach, Florida, and 2 seats at the celebration dinner for the website launch.

The Impact

Nowhere else can you discover the same range of ethical fashion culture. If you follow EFW then you know the instrumental role we play. EFW has managed to grow to this point and still maintain a grassroots feel. Our wish and objective is to always have the same grassroots feel, while continuing to raise the bar on what we can offer to our community.

By supporting this campaign, not only will you receive the perks offered at your contribution level, but you are playing an important part in supporting the future of ethical fashion and all of the components that represents: fighting fast fashion, fighting the exploitation and endangerment of fashion industry workers, fighting pollution, fighting unnecessary excess, supporting quality, supporting handmade, putting a spotlight on artisans and their centuries-old traditions and techniques, supporting natural dyes and the use of organic and natural materials.

Through your support of this campaign, YOU are an integral part of this necessary and positive change.

Risks & Challenges

One of the biggest obstacles we have faced in the last couple years is with our website being so out of date and needing the financial support to upgrade to a more advanced platform. Another difficulty we have faced is in not wanting to raise our membership fees or our advertising fees. We want to keep fees down because we know how many ethical fashion start-ups count on us to help them grow and we want to remain within their reach.

With your help, we can upgrade to the new site, continue to offer the news portal and all other sources of information we have offered, keep our membership and advertising fees within reach for startups, and even offer more options within our membership levels and promotional offerings.

We estimate the new site will take 4 months to design and get up and running. Of course, production can take longer than expected so this time could be extended, but we will do everything in our power to have it up and running as soon as possible.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand some of you may not be in a position to contribute financially. There are other ways to help. Please help us get the word out to the world. You can share to social media by copying and pasting the link to our page onto your page(s) OR by using the Indiegogo share tools.

Thank You!!!

Thank you so much for any and all help you can offer. Your support is critical to our growth and to our ability to continue to support the ethical fashion movement!

With Peace, Love, and Gratitude,

The EFW team


What some of the most known names in the industry have to say about EFW:

"Magaly and the EFW team have a constant thumb on the pulse of what's happening and what's new in ethical fashion. EFW regularly introduces me to new and pioneering brands proving that fashion can have a positive social and environmental impact."

~Sarah Ditty, Editor-in-Chief – Ethical Fashion Forums’s SOURCE Intelligence


"Eco Fashion World is one of the premier sites for sustainable designers, online eco fashion stores and lifestyle brands, passionately supporting green fashion with an easy to use web-based resource."

~Sass Brown, Author and Associate Dean for the School of Art and Design at the Fashion Institute of Technology, New York

"EFW has been a pioneering resource and global initiative for all of the latest news in eco and ethical fashion. It was also one of the first online fashion publications that I proudly wrote for. I fully support their future efforts and outreach, as so many young designers and labels got their start with EFW. I can only imagine that their next chapter will be even more impactful and vital."

~Abigail Doan, Environmental Fiber Artist and Writer


"Since EFW came on the scene, the wealth of the site's content and features has greatly added to the sustainable fashion scene. We get to know designers more intimately, have access to a real comprehensive A-Z glossary of terms and organizations prevalent on the scene, as well as have the opportunity to shop from a list of online e-tailers and brands organized by country. Having a site like this that acts as a sort of switchboard for what is current and cool is unique and necessary and I look forward to seeing how it progresses."

~ Amy DuFault, Writer, Consultant, Activist, Sustainable Fashion Strategist, Brooklyn Fashion + Design Accelerator 


"The cool thing about EFW is that it has successfully managed to create a virtual community of businesses, consumers, and activists who have a very real interest in a different kind of fashion industry where being stylish doesn't mean doing a lot of damage to the environment, animals, and people. EFW occupies a unique niche, that should be acknowledged and cultivated."

~Oceana Lott, Editor-in-Chief Oceana's Canvas and Board Member for Fashion Revolution Day USA


"EFW was one of the first sites I looked to, back in 2008 when I was running a start up fair trade fashion brand.  Now, 6 years later, Faire Collection has evolved and so has EFW!  EFW is really the go-to place for all things related to eco-fashion, and a great resource for new brands, and established ones alike. I'm a huge supporter."

~Amanda Judge, CEO, Faire Collection


"Eco Fashion World was the first platform to deliver the latest news, trends, and designers of the global ethical fashion movement, and has helped bring eco fashion into mainstream consciousness. We love Ecofashionworld and hope it's around for years to come!"

~Bianca and Michael Alexander, Conscious Living TV
story_txt:
Our MissionThe mission of Eco Fashion World is to promote ethical fashion brands and stores through informing consumers of their options and linking them to where they can find ethical fashion products. Our NEWS portal provides our readers with inspiring and educational feature articles, interviews, industry updates, new store launches, event information, contests, and much more! EFW is also a comprehensive resource to members of the eco fashion industry, offering an extensive glossary listing industry terms, an organization section, a book section, videos, and an easy-to-use search system. 
The first website of its kind, Eco Fashion
World was founded in 2007, and has outlasted similar publications by remaining
consistent and dedicated. With continued NEWS updates, and a fast-growing
international GUIDE featuring a wide variety of talented eco fashion designers
and online shops, EFW aims to be the number one resource for sustainable style.
Our collective mission is to make the world
a better place through fashion.
Behind the scenes, EFW carefully selects stores and brands to work with based on what we call “eco criteria.” Our eco criterion includes work with artisans, the use of organic materials, the use of vegan materials, fair trade practices, made-to-order, ethically-sourced, vintage, recycled, and more. The fashion industry is known as one of the top industries in creating pollution. The fashion industry is also known for an exorbitant number of cases of exploitation of workers. These are just some of the problems we aim to put in the spotlight, in hopes of educating the masses and also continuing to gain momentum and support to incite action in every person we come in contact with through our website, articles, images, and the designers and companies we support. The EFW team wholeheartedly believes that we can change the world through fashion. We believe in supporting slow fashion, handmade, organic materials, artisans across the globe, fair treatment of workers, and fighting to reverse the damage of the industry. We have been watching the transition and ask you to support us in growing so that we can continue to feed this positive change. Let's continue to build this eco*ethical*sustainable fashion community - together! Where You Come InThe goal of the campaign is to raise funds so we can be more timely, go more in depth on the most compelling topics and have the ability to more easily interact with our readers. To accomplish this goal, we need to build a more advanced website and enhance our directory to further foster the success of our members who pay a monthly membership fee, and enable us to deliver free news to everyone. We also want to introduce discussion forums, re-launch our newsletter, offer a mobile-friendly version of EFW, and expand our promotional offerings.  Our current website is so old that updates for it no longer exist and tasks take 10 times longer than they should. EFW is run by a very small but extremely dedicated and passionate team, including the Editor-in-Chief, contributing writers, and a few interns and volunteers. EFW is also run on very limited resources. A new website is absolutely crucial for the future of EFW. What We Need We're asking for $20,000 so that we can build and launch our NEW STATE-OF-THE-ART WEBSITE, ONLINE 'GUIDE' DIRECTORY and NEWSLETTER! The funds will cover extensive web design, graphic design costs, and the costs related to our campaign perks. Changes you will see upon re-launch include:•	More Timely: increase in the number of posts per week – industry news, product reviews, events, feature articles, interviews, and more, covering all aspects of the ethical fashion industry•	Hot Topics: additional dedicated content areas to spotlight the most recent and/or most talked about news in ethical fashion•	More Interactivity: additional and improved commenting features and moderated forums on both the reader/community level and the paid subscriber level•	Enhanced GUIDE/directory features: integrated software to make it easier for subscribers to edit their directory page and other features to make it even easier for visitors to the site to search for ethical fashion products and/or information they are looking forIf we exceed our goal, fantastic! Extra funds will allow us to integrate more advanced multimedia features, which will further support the growth and success of our GUIDE members and further enthrall our readers across the globe, while accommodating all of our backers with the perks associated with their pledge amount.  What You Get (View our Gallery tab for images of the perks)KARMA$5 Thank you, thank you, thank you for choosing to support our campaign.  Instant good karma going out to you ... GRATITUDE$10 Every contribution helps! We are so grateful you want to be a part of this. You will receive a thank you shout out on Facebook and subscription to our newsletter upon relaunch.FRIENDSHIP$15 Thank you for being a friend of EFW. To express our appreciation of your friendship, you will receive a handmade cotton string friendship bracelet, a thank you shout out on Facebook and a subscription to our newsletter upon relaunch.  BLESSINGS$25 We are so blessed to have you in our corner! You will receive all five color-ways of our handmade cotton string friendship bracelets, a thank you shout out on Facebook, a subscription to our newsletter upon relaunch, AND your name will be listed on a Contributors page on the new website.NEW LIFE$40 Our hearts are brimming. We feel the love!! We will plant a tree in your name. You will also receive all five color-ways of our handmade cotton string friendship bracelets, a thank you shout out on Facebook, a subscription to our newsletter upon relaunch, AND your name will be listed on a Contributors page on the new website.LOVE AND LIGHT$50 Wow! You are amazing! We are sending loads of love and light out to you in appreciation for your generosity and support. You will also receive all five color-ways of our handmade cotton string friendship bracelets, a thank you shout out on Facebook, a subscription to our newsletter upon relaunch, an organic cotton tee designed especially for this campaign, AND your name will be listed on a Contributors page on the new website.  PASSION$75 You have true passion for the ethical fashion industry and all of the causes tied into it, and it shows! For your shining support, you will receive a Pashen Collection wristlet designed especially for this campaign, a handmade cotton string friendship bracelet, a thank you shout out on Facebook, a subscription to our newsletter upon relaunch, AND your name will be listed on a Contributors page on the new website. SIGNED, SEALED, DELIVERED$100 You are obviously committed to contributing to positive change. To express our gratitude, you will receive signed copies of both of Sass Brown’s books, Eco Fashion and Refashioned, a subscription to our newsletter upon relaunch, your name will be listed on a Contributors page on the new website, and you will also receive a personalized thank you card from EFW Editor-in-Chief, Magaly Fuentes, on plant-able seed paper. FEATHERS AND SUCH$150 Peacock feathers have been known to represent many different things. Among these things are watchfulness, love, compassion and goodwill – all of which are intertwined in the roots of ethical fashion. Thank you for sharing the vision with us and for supporting us so we can continue to help the industry grow! For your loving generosity, you will receive a sterling silver necklace (your choice of 18" or 24" in length) with a peacock feather pendant in recycled stainless steel by daphne olive via eco lustre. The pendant was designed especially for this campaign by daphne olive, in collaboration with EFW’s Editor-in-Chief. You will also receive a subscription to our newsletter upon relaunch, your name will be listed on a Contributors page on the new website, and a personalized thank you card on plant-able seed paper from EFW Editor-in-Chief, Magaly Fuentes, will be on its way to you. WRAPPED UP IN ECO$150 Thank you for showing us so much love. To show you some love in return, you will receive a stunning GreenLinebyK wrap maxi dress in bamboo jersey knit, a subscription to our newsletter upon relaunch, your name will be listed on a Contributors page on the new website, and you will also receive a personalized thank you card from EFW Editor-in-Chief, Magaly Fuentes, on plant-able seed paper! BAG OF BLISS$200 It is hard to put how thankful we are into words and we can’t bag a giant hug, BUT for your kindness and generosity, you will receive a Limited Edition Pashen Collection handbag designed especially for this campaign, a magical crystal and personalized message inside the bag, an organic cotton tee designed especially for this campaign, a Miakoda mala bracelet, a subscription to our newsletter upon relaunch, your name will be listed on a Contributors page on the new website, and you will also receive a personalized thank you card from EFW Editor-in-Chief, Magaly Fuentes, on plant-able seed paper!SLICE OF WISDOM AND STRENGTH$350 We (almost) have no words for how appreciative we are of your support. To express our gratitude, you will receive a limited edition green tourmaline slice pendant, prong set and anchored on an 18” sterling silver cable chain, by contemporary ethical jewelry designer Emilie Shapiro via eco lustre. Tourmaline represents wisdom and strength of mind. You will also receive an organic cotton tee designed especially for this campaign, a subscription to our newsletter upon relaunch, your name will be listed on a Contributors page on the new website, and we will mail you a personalized thank you card from EFW Editor-in-Chief, Magaly Fuentes, written on plant-able seed paper!  ETHICAL THREADS$400 Stunning, stunning ethical threads, made-to-order, just for you! For your hands down dedication to EFW and all that we represent, you will receive a Mission Park Trouser and Copley Wrap Top from Singlestream Collection, a subscription to our newsletter upon relaunch, your name will be listed on a Contributors page on the new website, and you will also receive a personalized thank you card from EFW Editor-in-Chief, Magaly Fuentes, on plant-able seed paper!  CONVERSE WITH A MASTER$1,500 (Limited quantity: 2) Would you like to have a personal one-on-one conversation with a Master Tailor who truly represents the epitome of ethical fashion? For your contribution at this level, you will receive a Skype conference (unless you live in the Cape Cod area and are able to meet in person) with master tailor Kathryn Hilderbrand who will design and create a custom 2 piece outfit just for you.SWEET BUNDLE$1500 You are an ethical fashion ROCKSTAR!  For your contribution, you will receive ALL OF THE ABOVE perks within the $5 to $400 contribution levels!EFW ANGEL$4,000 ALL OF THE ABOVE PERKS PLUS a 2 night stay at the Omphoy Ocean Resort in Palm Beach, Florida, and 2 seats at the celebration dinner for the website launch. The ImpactNowhere else can you discover the same range of ethical fashion culture. If you follow EFW then you know the instrumental role we play. EFW has managed to grow to this point and still maintain a grassroots feel. Our wish and objective is to always have the same grassroots feel, while continuing to raise the bar on what we can offer to our community.  By supporting this campaign, not only will you receive the perks offered at your contribution level, but you are playing an important part in supporting the future of ethical fashion and all of the components that represents: fighting fast fashion, fighting the exploitation and endangerment of fashion industry workers, fighting pollution, fighting unnecessary excess, supporting quality, supporting handmade, putting a spotlight on artisans and their centuries-old traditions and techniques, supporting natural dyes and the use of organic and natural materials. Through your support of this campaign, YOU are an integral part of this necessary and positive change.  Risks & ChallengesOne of the biggest obstacles we have faced in the last couple years is with our website being so out of date and needing the financial support to upgrade to a more advanced platform. Another difficulty we have faced is in not wanting to raise our membership fees or our advertising fees. We want to keep fees down because we know how many ethical fashion start-ups count on us to help them grow and we want to remain within their reach. With your help, we can upgrade to the new site, continue to offer the news portal and all other sources of information we have offered, keep our membership and advertising fees within reach for startups, and even offer more options within our membership levels and promotional offerings.We estimate the new site will take 4 months to design and get up and running. Of course, production can take longer than expected so this time could be extended, but we will do everything in our power to have it up and running as soon as possible. Other Ways You Can HelpWe understand some of you may not be in a position to contribute financially. There are other ways to help. Please help us get the word out to the world. You can share to social media by copying and pasting the link to our page onto your page(s) OR by using the Indiegogo share tools.Thank You!!! Thank you so much for any and all help you can offer. Your support is critical to our growth and to our ability to continue to support the ethical fashion movement! With Peace, Love, and Gratitude,The EFW team What some of the most known names in the industry have to say about EFW:
"Magaly and the EFW team have a constant
thumb on the pulse of what's happening and what's new in ethical fashion. EFW
regularly introduces me to new and pioneering brands proving that fashion can
have a positive social and environmental impact." 
~Sarah Ditty,
Editor-in-Chief – Ethical Fashion Forums’s SOURCE Intelligence

"Eco Fashion World is one of the premier sites
for sustainable designers, online eco fashion stores and lifestyle brands,
passionately supporting green fashion with an easy to use web-based
resource."

~Sass Brown, Author and Associate Dean for the School of Art and Design at the Fashion Institute of Technology, New York
"EFW has been a pioneering resource and
global initiative for all of the latest news in eco and ethical fashion. It was also one of the first
online fashion publications that I proudly wrote for. I fully support their
future efforts and outreach, as so many young designers and labels got their
start with EFW. I can only imagine that their next chapter will be even
more impactful and vital."
~Abigail Doan,
Environmental Fiber Artist and Writer

"Since EFW came on the scene, the wealth of
the site's content and features has greatly added to the sustainable fashion
scene. We get to know
designers more intimately, have access to a real comprehensive A-Z glossary of
terms and organizations prevalent on the scene, as well as have the opportunity
to shop from a list of online e-tailers and brands organized by country.
Having a site like this that acts as a sort of switchboard for what is current
and cool is unique and necessary and I look forward to seeing how it
progresses."
~ Amy DuFault, Writer,
Consultant, Activist, Sustainable Fashion Strategist, Brooklyn Fashion
+ Design Accelerator 

"The cool thing about EFW is that it has
successfully managed to create a virtual community of businesses, consumers,
and activists who have a very real interest in a different kind of fashion
industry where being
stylish doesn't mean doing a lot of damage to the environment, animals, and
people. EFW occupies a unique niche, that should be acknowledged and cultivated."
~Oceana
Lott, Editor-in-Chief Oceana's Canvas and Board Member for Fashion
Revolution Day USA

"EFW was one of the first sites I looked to,
back in 2008 when I was running a start up fair trade fashion brand.  Now, 6 years later, Faire
Collection has evolved and so has EFW!  EFW is really the go-to
place for all things related to eco-fashion, and a great resource for new brands, and established
ones alike. I'm a huge supporter." 
~Amanda
Judge, CEO, Faire Collection"Eco Fashion World was the first platform to deliver the latest news, trends, and designers of the global ethical fashion movement, and has helped bring eco fashion into mainstream consciousness. We love Ecofashionworld and hope it's around for years to come!" ~Bianca and Michael Alexander, Conscious Living TV

story:
About this project

 

A 340 mAh battery makes the best battery life which lasts up to 2 days. With low-power consumption, the Hagic loop will last up to 15 days. Normally, a typical smart watch usually is left behind after running out of power. With the Hagic loop it keeps telling time. There is also a reminder for you to charge you smart watch, every time you lift your wrist.

 
Customize your watchbands
 
 
 
 

 

 

 
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

We are a team of designers and engineers and also outdoor lovers. During the process of R&D, we didn't compromise on details; we looked into every small step, improved and re-worked, striving for perfection. 

We blend into sense of fashion into smart watch. Our team of designers keep promoting the design script of each generation.

 The development process has no guaranteed results and it requires a lot of iterations, trials and errors, testing – all combined with even more efforts, resources, dedication and nerves from the founding teams. 

We are immensely grateful for your amazing support over all this time – it's been invaluable during our journey and we would never have gotten this far without you!

 

Risks and challenges

As a well-known company, we have a good handle on the risks associated with the project. Still, creating a Hagic smart watch is an extremely complex process. Each specimen in it has its own unique challenges and the scale of the project may also lead to unexpected delays. We've taken every step possible to mitigate potential issues. As with our last two projects, we plan to provide detailed and timely project updates to keep backers advised, informed, educated, and at times entertained.

story:
Adirag is a fashion company empowering community artisans. By partnering with artisans across the country, we are not only preserving the rich and diverse culture of India, but also offering contemporary-chic and sophisticated fashion products. 

Adirag is creating a stylish social statement. In a world where fashion and design are often seen as excess, Adirag is proof that style and sustainability can coexist

With your support, we will be able to continue this amazing this journey with more artisans. 

It isn't just a piece of art; it is a living reflection of the culture, customs and traditions of a community. Most traditional artists consider their art a form of worship, and the act of creation comes directly from the heart.

The base of creativity is the codes of the brand and We, in Adirag intend to make these codes iconic. We let these creative people, i.e, the artisans and craftsman, go to the next step in designing the collection and do what they are good at; and, on the other hand, we maximize the impact of the collection at every point of sale. The challenge is to be able, 6 months from now, to recreate that and to keep this same energy and to align all our people — from our suppliers, craftsmen as well as clients— on this creative energy. For that, first, we need to support creativity and we need to respect creativity. 

                   


WHY DO WE NEED GBP 6000?

In addition to reviving 2 more traditional crafts, GBP 6000 will allow us to:

  1. Increase our resources : a) purchase materials at a wholesale cost b) begin partnership with local artisans  c) participate in an incubator program 
  2. Pay for a complete branding & marketing overhaul by participating in events and hiring a PR.

YOUR IMPACT: 
By working towards this cause of revival, together, we can provide a sustainable source of income for artisans and craftsmen, and the opportunity for them to make their own choices and live with financial independence, pride, and dignity. 

                         


We Need Your Support!

In order to turn this dream of ours into a reality, we need your support. Not only does this mean pledging for one of our awesome rewards, but sharing the story with a friend. 
#RevivingLegacy

story:
Now You And Your Devices Are One!

The Air Power Glove, is a wireless Bluetooth hand and finger tracking device, coming in the 1st Quarter of 2018, and is the next generation of the Nintendo Power Glove, which was released over 27 years ago by Mattel, and sold over 1 million units in its first year.

 

 

The Nintendo Power Glove that we invented and licensed over 29 years ago, was a wired unit that worked only with the Nintendo Entertainment System, and sold over 1 million units in its first 12 months with a retail price of $89.00, and based upon inflation, would be $169 today.  For the past 27 plus years, the Nintendo Power Glove has been hack and reused for computers, games, animation creation, music, drone flying, robots and much more.  You can see the full life history of the Power Glove at http://publiclifepath.com/powerglove

 

 

The new Air Power Glove is a wireless input device that will connect with any platform, from computers to smartphones to tablets and much more, and will retail under $99.00.  A Software Development Kit will be available for the Air Power Glove, so any software developer can easily create programs and applications to work with the Air Power Glove.  The Air Power Glove will naturally interact with any digital device, from easily controlling and flying drones, to video games, to even controlling your TV with just the bend of a finger and the movement of your hand, and will also provide you with a natural interaction with the new Artificial Reality apps coming out.

 

 

The Air Power Glove will expand to many markets, and will launch with music, games and art creation applications.  The below video demonstrates some of the applications currently being developed, utilizing the first Air Power Glove working prototype.  The video will show some quick demonstrations of the Hand of the Band music app, which is basically Garage Band on steroids, and a demonstration of the Air Music Studio app, which allows you to play different virtual instruments, such as a keyboard, drum, trumpet, guitar and many more, by identifying which instrument you are playing based upon the location and orientation of your hand.  Also, at the end of this video, we demonstrate the diagnostic tool showing the real-time data capture of the finger bend movements, along with the 6 degrees of hand positioning.

 

 

The Powerglove, LLC executive management and development team has a history of inventing successful products and services that has generated over $20 billion in retail sales for the past 40 years.

Christopher T. Gentile - COO / CTO

Here is information about Christopher Gentile and his background, that will let you see the success that is coming for the Air Power Glove.  Mr. Gentile has Bachelor of Science Degrees in Mechanical, Nuclear and Solar Engineering, and designed Nuclear Power Plants for his first 5 years out of college.  He then jumped into the Toy Industry where he invented state of the art toys, that were licensed to the major toy companies and did over $5B in retail sales in his first 8 years in the Toy Industry.  These included Visionaries, which utilized the first consumer market holograms, the first talking Barbie doll, and many others.  In 1989, he invented and licensed, with his current partner Marty Abrams, the Nintendo Power Glove, which sold over 1 million units in its first 12 months.  Mr. Gentile also invented and produced the first 6-Person Virtual Reality Theme Park Ride, "Ride-the-Comix," for Walt Disney that launched in 1998 in Orlando, FL, and ran for 18 years.  He invented and launched the first computer game to use behavioral animation, was instrumental in thelaunch the first HDTV satellite delivery system, invented and launch the first virtual music awards platform for MTV Networks, and many more.  You can see Mr. Gentile's full career history at http://publiclifepath.com/cgentile

story:
In short...

This campaign is so we can raise money to cover the costs associated with designing and developing our Wicked Workwear clothing line. Wicked Workwear will consist of classic business casual items with a twist. Each item will be embellished artwork depicting poisonous plants, like death cap mushrooms and deadly nightshade:

Long form...

Valkyrie Apparel is run by Jennifer Iannaconi and Laurel Newman in Western Massachusetts. Our webstore opened in 2014 and we've been growing steadily ever since. In that time we have discovered that there was a gap in the market for the goth with a career and we extended our size range to cover regular AND plus sizes. However to stay true to our original mission we only offers clothing that comes in BOTH. It's not fair to anyone, no matter the size, to fall in love with a top only to find it doesn't come in your size.

In the fall of 2016 we discovered that we've exhausted our options for size inclusive vendors and it was time to get into the manufacturing side of fashion.

The Journey So Far:

There may be a number of things we haven't considered yet, but we are confident that we're prepared to meet these challenges. The Wicked Workwear product line has been in development for almost a year and we waited until NOW to start crowdfunding.

You see, there is a variety of apparel out there that is just, BLAH. This stuff is well made but it has no character, not even a licensed one.

We've been experimenting with taking those items and making them better. Last summer, we bought and tested a heat press and some transfer medium AND we've made some garments and they have survived the wash test. (Even the one that was washed on the wrong setting survived!)

 
 

 

And for the garments we can't find, we already have 2 or 3 seamstresses ready to build them for us!

Environmental impact: Our approach of making products on demand will save us money AND help prevent landfill waste. Making more items than we actually need is a risk. When something doesn't sell it ends up taking up space. We can certainly recycle this material but we'd rather not waste unworn products. Instead we want to put our efforts (and cash) into products that we KNOW people want.

What We Need

  • Our ultimate goal is to purchase a garment printer. These will let us print our designs on anything we want and on any part of the garment we want. Our favorite is the Epson SureColor F2000 Color Edition Printer. 
  • We'd also like a bigger heat press  and more transfer mediums. Heat press vinyl comes in an amazing selection of colors including metallic and glow in the dark.
  • Our seamstresses will need to build some clothing for us to have in stock at the start, so we'll want to pay them their time and materials.
  • And anything left over will go towards covering the background costs of maintaining an online store. (Web hosting, site security...etc.)

How you can help:

Donate to our campaign. No brainer. But if you can't do that you can...

  • Share this campaign far and wide. Get friends and family to donate and give you their gift certificates.
  • Buy something directly from Valkyrie-Apparel.com.
  • Talk to us! Ask us questions. Let us know what makes you crazy about fashion. (We know about pockets in women's clothing. Trust us WE KNOW.)

The Perks
story_txt:
In short...
This campaign is so we can raise money to cover the costs associated with designing and developing our Wicked Workwear clothing line. Wicked Workwear will consist of classic business casual items with a twist. Each item will be embellished artwork depicting poisonous plants, like death cap mushrooms and deadly nightshade:



Long form...
Valkyrie Apparel is run by Jennifer Iannaconi and Laurel Newman in Western Massachusetts. Our webstore opened in 2014 and we've been growing steadily ever since. In that time we have discovered that there was a gap in the market for the goth with a career and we extended our size range to cover regular AND plus sizes. However to stay true to our original mission we only offers clothing that comes in BOTH. It's not fair to anyone, no matter the size, to fall in love with a top only to find it doesn't come in your size.

story:
ABOUT THE BRAND

Shapes of Things is an innovative childrenswear brand, designing to inspire children and allow them to be creative whilst supporting their development. Influenced by the structure of geometry and the universal language of shapes, we set out to change childrenswear forever. 

Launched in 2015 by Jamie Bruski Tetsill, our focus lies in creating quality products for newborns, through to children, helping them to find their own style and personality. Our mission is to use our unique approach to traditional print techniques and bold imagery, to encourage children to engage and interact through our clever use of textures, shapes and colours.

As creative thinkers and textile designers, innovation is at the forefront of everything we do. 

BE PART OF IT

We currently design and manufacture everything from our small print studio in Glasgow. At the moment, Banks are just not investing in small creative businesses like Shapes, but with your support, we will invest in a partnership with a manufacturing company and start to export to new and interested suppliers in the US.

You can support us in our crowdfunding campaign by buying one of our limited-edition products:

- Logo Shapes T-shirt 
- Polka Shapes Baby Romper
- Stand Out From The Crowd Colour In T-shirt 

- Long Sleeve Colour In T-Shirt
- Iconic Logo Shapes Sweatshirt
- Pre-season launch Polka Shapes Mint backpack.

- Alphabet Colour In Sweatshirt
- Animated Triangle Colour In sweatshirt 
- Shapes Product bundle 
- Baby bundle
- Downloadable colouring in book 
- Personalised backpack
- Professional Shapes Styled Photo Shoot
- Creative Silk Screen Printing Workshop 
- Shapes of Things Subscription 
- Luxury 5-day expedition to the Mull of Kintyre

We aim to start shipping orders to our backers as soon as the campaign ends, with our very last shipping date on the 17 December. 

All of our packages have been carefully designed with you in mind and we think there is something there for everyone. Choose from a photo shoot inspired by our award-winning marketing campaigns or get together with friends and family to be the designer for the day. 


THE STUDIO
Shapes of Things was founded by Jamie Bruski Tetsill, a former womenswear fashion designer, and London Fashion Week alumni. Studying at The Glasgow School of Art, he then went on to gain a 1st class MA in Fashion from the prestigious Central St Martins fashion school in London. With recognition for his creative vision, Jamie has been nominated for numerous awards and accolades for his unprecedented creativity and fearlessness with modern texture, colour and style. 

After spotting an opportunity to do something different in a saturated market, Jamie decided to make the bold switch into childrenswear. Using his creative background, a lot of spirit and perseverance, Jamie set about bringing his brand to life. And so Shapes of Things was formed. A gender-neutral childrenswear clothing line with a mission to push the boundaries of innovation in textiles to set them apart from the rest.

Today, Shapes of Things is a growing global brand where our values are as important as our designs. The brand is now stocked in more than 35 stores and 11 countries worldwide below are some of our current stockists.

SHAPES OF THINGS TO COME
After an overwhelming response to our newest collection whilst exhibiting at Playtime New York, we have firmly managed to make our mark in the childrenswear market. We now wish to start designing producing a new collection which will push the boundaries of innovation in clothing further, with even more interactive elements, imagery and textures.

That's why your support is so important. 

This Indegogo funding will allow us to bring all of these exciting ideas to life and we hope that many of you will join us to try to change children's clothing forever.

 

THE SCHEDULE 
In return for backing this campaign, we will ensure that all product based orders will be manufactured and dispatched in time for Christmas 2017.

We aim to start shipping orders to our backers as soon as the campaign ends, with our very last shipping date on the 17th of December. 

We understand that there is always the possibility of small delays but we will do our utmost to avoid setbacks in the coming weeks. We will contact backers with regular updates about the progress of their pledges and if there are any queries with regards to their order which may delay shipment.

Join the Shapes Team and "BE PART OF IT!" by following us @weloveshapes on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter and Linkedin to check out all the latest campaign news and updates. 

Let's change kids clothes forever!
